1413221111.content:
*cough cough* you wake up and immediately turn to your side, water pouring out of your mouth. You heave a couple more times, removing the remaining water from your body. "feeling better?" a light and female voice speaks softly.

You look around, you seem to be in some sort of cave, and alone. "Hello?" You call "Hello human"

"h-human? You say it like you aren't one." You respond as you stand up. The cave has a spacious ceiling adorned with stalactites(trust me those are the ones that point down). The slightly uneven ground kept several puddles of water trapped and there was a small hole in the ceiling allowing light in.

"I'm not" "you're not a human?" You say incredulously as you turn around, still looking for the source of the voice. "No, I'm a Pokémon" "that's not possible, Pokemon don't speak English" "I do" you grunt and rub your head. "Alright show me you're a Pokémon, where are you?" The voice was silent for a moment. "Hmm alright I guess I can show you" you were about to question her when a slight shimmer in the air moved past your face. The shimmer suddenly changed into a small pale grey and blue creature.

You nearly fall backwards as the small being appears in front of you. It giggles and spins I the air. "I am Azelf, Arceus created me to be the embodiment of willpower" You take a closer look at Azelf as she floats in front of you.

Her head was almost triangular in shape with a crest extending a short ways downward on each side. The top half of her head was blue while the rest of her body was a uniform grey. She had a small red gem on her forehead, with matching gems placed in the ends of her two tails that curved up behind her.

"Your will awoke me from my slumber" "My will?" Azelf nods happily "Yes, your will to survive. When you were in the water. I awoke and helped you fight off the Golduck, then when you passed out I brought you to my cave. I was only supposed to wake up if some one with enough willpower arrived" her smile widened "and you finally have!"

You sit down, taking in all the information. "So I'm like some sort of chosen one?" "No you were not chosen, you just fit the requirements" "okay so what now?"
1413221111.title: wake up

14132211112.content:
Upon hearing your question, Azelf hovers backwards, placing one of her small paws over her mouth, apparently thinking.

Silence falls between the two of you as she ponders her answer. Which doesn't take long to come.
"I think we should talk to Arceus." she finally says.

You take a step back. Arceus? The pokemon who created the world? The literal god... or goddess of all pokemon?

You ask Azelf about it. She nods her head, before hovering closer, extending her tiny paw.

Reluctantly, you close it in your bigger hand.
"Hold on." Azelf warns. Then, in a flash of light, the cavern disappears from your sight.

Roughly, you materialize and fall flat on the ground. Shortly after, you feel something pulling your shirt. You figure that it must be Azelf, trying to help you up. With little success.

Slowly, you get back on your feet.
"Eh, sorry." Azelf apologizes. You shake your head.
"Don't worry." you dizzily reply as you take your first look around.

You notice that you're standing on a plain, white surface. And, in front of you, an immense, white ladder of marble that leads upwards, to an unknown destination.
"Go ahead." you hear Azelf from beside you. She grabs your hand with both her paws and floats in front of you, encouraging you to go on.

Swallowing, you start climbing up the ladder. You are somewhat afraid of what - or who - you'll find once you got to wherever Azelf is leading you.

--

It takes an incalculable amount of time to get past this ladder. But, finally, you take your first step on a white, plain surface.

And your eyes shut open as you notice a tall, equine figure. It has pure, white fur, golden hooves, and a weird, golden wheel around its waist. It also has green and red eyes, which are currently staring both at you and your small companion.

Arceus.

The god of all pokemon itself is literally standing there before you.

Ignoring you for a moment, it turns its attention on Azelf first.
"Azelf," its voice sounds deep. Powerful. Divine.
"Weren't you supposed to be asleep at the bottom of Lake Valor?" it asks her.

Azelf bows respectfully.
"My lord," she starts, confirming you that Arceus is actually a male.
"I was asleep. But this human I brought here with me - he had it. The willpower necessary to wake me from my slumber." she explains, answering to his question.

At this point, Arceus gazes at you.
"And that's, I believe, the reason of your being here?" he asks. Thinking that he's talking to you, you bow as well.
"Y-Yes, my lord." you stammer.

Arceus seems to stare at you more intently as those words escape your mouth.

Not you, Azelf or Arceus himself break the silence for a while. You occasionally glance at the blue pokemon beside you, who looks back at you with indecipherable looks.

But, finally, Arceus speaks up.
"Azelf," he says.
"I'd recommend that you stick with this human." Azelf rises her head.
"What?" she asks, seemingly confused.

Arceus nods his head.
"If this human had proved himself equipped with enough willpower to wake you up, you should stick with him. I feel no negative intentions in him - and I trust that he hasn't any," at this point, he looks at you somewhat sternly.
"N-No, sir." you quickly reply.

The white pokemon gives a slight nod, before turning to Azelf again.
"Of course, the choice is up to you, Azelf," he adds.

The small, blue pokemon looks at Arceus. Then, her golden eyes move on you. She gives a big smile.
"Well... I'd like to. If the human is fine with it..." she says.
"Uh, no problem... I guess," you reply, showing a small smile.

Azelf giggles, and floats in circle around you.

But she abruptly stops as Arceus talks again.
"Alright then," he speaks.
"Azelf will be staying with you, human. But - of course - there will be no hurting her in any possible way..." you sweat drop.
"I wouldn't even dream about it, my lord," you say, earning another nod.
"I'll believe that. Now, you both can go," he says.

You silently look at Azelf, who grabs your hand in response.
"Alright. Thanks, Arceus," Azelf says, bowing again. You imitate her.

And then, you brace yourself as you once again experience teleporting.

--

This time, you manage to stand tall as Lake Valor appears around you and Azelf. You notice that you're not in her cave, you're actually on the same cliff you fell from earlier.

"So, ehm... guess we're staying together now?" Azelf asks you.
"Uh... I guess..." you reply. The small pokemon smiles, and floats over your shoulder, lazily sitting down on it, tails resting on your other shoulder.

Before you even know it, she had wrapped her tiny arms around your neck. You blush a bit.
"Er... now what?" you awkwardly ask.
"I don't know." is Azelf's simple reply.

"Ehm, you know, I was actually camping with a... friend," you suddenly remember how you met Azelf earlier.
"... Maybe we should go back to the campsite," you suggest.

Azelf's golden eyes open up as an idea springs up in her mind.
"Or, maybe, we can stay around my Lake. I could show you around a bit as we... you know, we get to know each other better..." she suggests.

"That... sounds good?" you say, uncertain. Azelf gives a giggle.

You give a sigh as you decide what to do next...
14132211112.title: A word with a God

choices: Azelf awakens you in the middle of the night
141322111121.content:
"Let's go back to the campsite," you say, suddenly remembering how you met Azelf. You grin sinisterly.
"I have some unfinished business." you add.

The small pokemon sitting on your shoulder nods her head.
"Alright. As you wish." she simply replies, unaware of your intentions of imminent payback.

So, you turn your back to Lake Valor and start walking away, soon disappearing into the thick vegetation.

--

You stop behind some bushes and peek through the leaves. As expected, you finally reached the campsite. And, standing there, Derrick. With a worried expression on his face.

You distinctly hear him talk.
"It's been awhile now. He should have been here by now," he says.
"Oh, so you're worried about what you did, aren't you?" you rhetorically ask, thinking about all the nice ways to pay him back for his prank.

Azelf seems to notice your sudden change of mood.
"Is everything alright...?" she asks.

You flinch, having totally forgotten about her presence.
"Yes," you whisper.
"But that guy over there - I fell into the lake because of him. I almost drowned, and it was his fault. If it wasn't for you..." you mutter gratefully.

Azelf smiles.
"I think I get it. You want to payback him, am I right?" she asks. You nod.

Her smile shifts into a smirk.
"Then, let me help you. I do know a few tricks." she states.
"Like?" you ask.

In response, Azelf closes her eyes. Slowly, a translucent figure very similar to her floats out of her body and hovers in front of you. You place your hands over your mouth to keep yourself from screaming.
"Like this." you hear your new companion's voice coming from the shade.

"A-Azelf?" you whisper.
"Precisely. My spirit can leave my body. I think this will be useful for our purpose," she says. You quickly remember the reason of this.
"I have an idea..." you say, delicately grabbing her unmoving body and placing it down.

--

You peek out of the bush again. Derrick is now walking around the clearing where you both set up camp.
"Now." you whisper to Azelf... Azelf's spirit, who, obeying to your command, floats out of the bushes.

Right in front of Derrick.

You see your friend leaping back, startled.
"What the-" he doesn't even finish his phrase.

Choking back a laugh, you start talking with a deep voice, following your plan.
"Derrick," you speak so that your voice can be heard from him.
"I am the soul of your friend. The same friend you left into the lake. The same friend that got attacked by a Golduck. And the same friend that drowned in the waters of Lake Valor because of your actions!" you say, noticing him starting to tremble as he takes a few steps back. However, Azelf just hovers closer.

Eventually, he stumbles and falls on his butt. You stifle a laugh.

"Y-Y-You... Y-You're..." he tries to say, but no other sound comes out of his mouth.
"I am here... to punish you...!" you shout, again emulating a deep voice.

At this point, Azelf rises her paws. Derrick starts to float off the ground as well, lifted by what could be mistaken for ghostly activity, but is in reality a simple psychic attack.

Your friend starts to scream at top of his lungs... and he falls straight back to the ground, hitting it with a thud.

Shortly after, your laughter fills the whole clearing. You notice Azelf's spirit floating back in her body, and she soon starts laughing as well.
"Come on." you say, shedding a tear and picking her up, grabbing her in a hug.

You step into the clearing, where your still startled friend is.
"Hey Derrick." you call with a smirk.

He turns to face you.
"Y-Y-You...!" he exclaims.
"Yup. Me." you say.
"And meet my friend, Azelf," the legendary in your arms waves her paws.
"Hi there!" she chimes playfully, giggling.

--

Once you explained everything to Derrick, and once he made you swear you wouldn't repeat this kind of jokes (you and Azelf exchanged eloquent looks in that particular point) he finally calms down.

"So," he says.
"This pokemon-"
"Azelf." you correct.
"... Azelf... she's going to stay with us... with you?" he asks.

"That's correct." the blue legendary, who is currently sitting on your lap, chimes happily.

Your friend nods, before casually looking at the sky.
"Hey, will you look at that? Sun is setting already," he notes.

He's right, you notice. It was around 4 PM when you met Azelf; now, the sun is disappearing over the horizon.
"We need to start a fire," you state.

--

No sooner said than done, and with Azelf's psychic help, you gather a decent amount of wood and start a fire. The sun completely sets in the meantime.

A bowl of soup is the dinner for both you and Derrick; Azelf hovers upwards, soon returning, holding a berry. She sits down on a stump next to you. Before she can grab the first bite, though, you stop her.
"Why don't you try some of this?" you say, pointing to the bowl.

The pokemon looks at it, then at you, looking unsure. Then, she reluctantly lowers her head into the bowl, taking a sip. Immediately, she springs back up, her cheeks red and her eyes sparkling.
"Tasty!" she cries, starting to flutter around you gleefully. You laugh. You guess pokemon don't often eat something different from berries. That would explain Azelf's excited behavior.

You notice Derrick, who is sitting in front of you, with a hand over his mouth, trying to keep himself from laughing.

--

Dinner settled, you and Derrick walk to the tent, you carrying Azelf along.
"That is where we'll sleep," you explain her. She nods.

You crawl inside your sleeping bag with a satisfied smile.
"See you in the morning Derrick. And no more water-related pranks." you warn. He laughs from his own sleeping bag beside you.
"See you in the morning." he replies.

You notice Azelf hovering over your sleeping bag.
"Well... goodnight, Azelf. Uh, sleep tight..." you awkwardly say as she descends near you.

You then close your eyes. This day was full of surprises, you think. What was meant to be a simple camping trip turned into something more... special. Meeting Azelf and Arceus... that was something you'd never see coming. And you already bonded with her...

Your thoughts are interrupted as you feel something crawling in your sleeping bag.

You shut your eyes open and notice the small blue pokemon crawling her way beside you.
"Azelf?" you whisper upon noticing Derrick snoring, suggesting he's asleep.

The blue pokemon stops once she's fully inside your bag.
"What?" she asks.
"Er... what are you doing?" you ask.

She blushes a bit, though you can't see it.
"Uhm, I thought... I could... is it a problem?" she asks.
"Uh... n-no, if you want, you can sleep with me... you just surprised me." you say.

The willpower pokemon smiles, and wraps her arms around your chest.
"Goodnight then..." she says closing her eyes.
"Sleep tight." you reply, closing yours as well.

You actually find that it is pretty comfortable to have the pokemon sleeping beside you. Her body carries a comforting warmth. Plus, she looks adorable.

Giving a last, tired smile, you relax, and your mind slowly drifts off, tugged to dreamland.

I try, mind you i really am, to open my heavy, tired eyelids and, expecting to be blinded by the strong light of the sun coming from the window, i try to look towards my door in the, as always, vain hope to not feel the fastidious hitch that come from being waked up so rudely up front the strongest source of light of this world.

I ready myself from the pain and start to greet mother, why i am so tired? What....what time is it?

"God...yawn, good morning mom" i try to remove the paste that is my semi-solidified saliva in my mouth: "How are you doing today" small talk, yeah, try not to greet her with at least some affection and you Will regret it the whole day, been there

My eyelids, finally reply to my direct command, and what i see..

"MOM! It' 5:30 in the Morning! What in Tartarus...."

Mom: "Honey, it's for your own good. I want that my son have the chance to get the best pokemon that professor Jeremy has to offer" I see that she has that dreamy look on her face again...shouldn't be i that...wait a minute

"MOM! The professor already promised me a pokemon, there is no need to get up this early!"

Mom slowly walk away towards the kitchen i presume: "Rubbish sonny, come down for breakfast and don't forget you gear!" I hate you mom

Mom with a mischievous tone: "I have prepared your favorite, with Lot's of chocolate, just for you.." I love you mom!

I grab the gear and i dress at supersonic speed, presenting myself in front of the kitchen table, i notice the empty chair and a tear caught me by surprise, mom of course notice it

Mom with a concerned tone: "Dear, it' everything alright?" No mom, it's nothing is alright since...

I try to sound convinced of what i am saying, but the result is less then decent"No mom it's..nothing" Since dad death last year i....

Mom: "Don't worry sonny, it will pass" Of course she got it, no enough

My voice return full of confidence: "Mom, really 5:30?" she laugh: "Yes 5:30, although i have tried to uselessly wake you up for a good half hour..." Mooooooom!
1413222221.title: The wake up of your new life

14132222211.content: "Mom that's enough stuff" you groan "Any more and I won't be able to carry it!" your mother stops her frantic packing and calms down slightly as you speak "Ohh your right honey, I'm just so excited for you!" she wraps you in a big hug, crying slightly. "Aww c'mon mom don't cry. I'll come and visit." she just nodded tearfully. You give her onset squeeze before you step through your doorway and into the world. Mere minutes later you are standing in front of professor Jeremys' lab, it was a futuristic building with lots of lights. You step inside and are greeted by one of the lab assistants behind a desk. "Oh hello(____) I'm sorry but the professor is a little preoccupied right now" "preoccupied? Why?" the assistand seemed worried and somewhat disheveled. "Well there's been an incident" the assistant trailed off nervously. "Well? What happened?" you demand slamming your hands on the desk. "S-someone has stolen all the starter Pokemon." "What!? Stolen?" at that moment the professor walked through the door to the storage room. The professor was a man in his mid- thirties, brown hair, lab coat, your average Pokemon professor. "I'm afraid so (_____) they were all stolen." the professor said as he entered the room. "But who would do that professor?" you inquire as you set down your bag. "Haven't all the criminal teams disbanded?" the professor grabbed a small object out of his pocket. "We don't know if it was a team(_____). But whoever they are they dropped this." in his hand he held a small black pin with an S engraved in the face. "A pin?" you grab the pin gingerly "anything else?" the professor shook his head. "no and we're lucky to have found this. If Alakazam hadn't been here we might've missed it entirely" "So will I still get a Pokemon?" "Hahaha of course! I made a promise and I intend to keep it! In fact I was saving you a special Pokemon. I had her with me at home so she didn't get stolen." reaching into his pocket, this time he pulled out a small red and white capsule. "Come out Abra!" he shouted as he tossed the ball into the air. At the peak of its arc the ball exploded open in a flash of light revealing a small yellow and brown figure. "Hi Abra, I'm (_____). You reached your hand out to pet her. How does She react?
14132222211.title: A Journey and a Breakfast. Wrong order?

choices: Abra is willing but reluctant to leave
141322222112.content:
Jaden try to delicately put his right hand on the sitting Abra, but as soon as the hand touch her fur, her green eyes suddenly open and an unknown force, push you away towards the wall!

Bam

Professor: "Abra! No!"

Your senses are all screwed up, but the stinging ache coming from you back is crystal clear. A flash or something blind your already blurred vision, and a few moment later a warm, motherly feeling wash over you, the pain receding.

You have never felt this way before, it's so...good.

The feeling leave you, and reluctantly, your eyes open. As soon as the vision clear, a surprised expression appear on your feature as Jeremy Alakazam, Sina, look at you with a sweet smile. You quickly get up, and remind yourself that Sina is the professor favorite pokemon, and also one of your friends as well

"Hello Sina" your smile sheepishly "So..how are you?" Sina look at you with amusement, and nod: "I am fine, thank you Jaden. But how do you feel? Did my unruly daughter harmed you?" You shake you head for a moment, you don't think that the fastidious feeling of having a pokemon speak at you thought telepathy will ever cease no matter how many times..wait daughter? Ah, yes. Sina had an egg a few months back, although you was never able to know who is the father, you always assumed one of Jeremy subject

Your tone return normal, even if a glimpse of sadness can be caught in it: "I am ok now, thanks by the way, did you heal me?" She nod: "Yes, i have used recover on you, normally that would be quite difficult but me and Jeremy experimented the possibility of using specific pattern of energy for improving human physical...." geez, she is even worse than Jeremy sometimes, why those two are a perfect match

I pretend to hear what she is saying, is not that is uninteresting it's just..i have waited long enough for this journey, and now that finally i can depart, some bitches with an S engraved pin stole all the starters pokemon, and as soon as another opportunity present itself, the Abra launch me around like a rag doll to the wall, what a day.

Sina stop ^talking^ and i notice her smile return, oops, i forgot that some psychic pokemon like Alakazam can feel emotion...

Sina: "Do not worry Jaden, i am not angry at you, after all you already waited long enough for this, come, i will speak to my daughter and make her apologize."

She start to lead me towards the seated Abra, that right now is..embracing Jeremy, don't tell me that I have scared her

Sina: "I am afraid that my daughter can't ^speak^, per say, fluently to anyone telepathically yet, so don't worry about it" I am not, seriously just make sure i don't get psychically propelled in another wall and i will be fine, thank you.

Suddenly a small doubt surge in my thoughts: "Sina, may i ask why your daughter eyes are green?" Sina stop, she seems over thinking on something, then she turn towards me with a worried expression: "I..am not really sure why, does this bother you?" No, no reason

"Why it should? I am just curios that's all" The worry leave her feature, and her smile return: "I am not sure Jaden, maybe..no it's unimportant, come"...alright

I guess i will never knew why.
141322222112.title: Good things come to those who can wait

1413222221121.content:
You approach the proffesor slowly keeping an eye on Abra. She also watched you with her piercing green eyes. As you got closer she shrank away from you, hiding in the professors lab coat.

"What now proffesor? She doesn't like me"

"Well Jaden" the proffesor began "I might suggest getting to know each other. How about that Abra? Will you go with Jaden?" Abra shook her head and grasped the proffesor tighter.

"It's okay proffesor I can wait for another starter if she doesn't want to" you say dejectedly.

"Nonsense!" the proffesor cried "You have been waiting ages for this day and now you will let it go because of a rocky start? I thought your father taught you better." you were about to protest bu the mention of your father froze you. You glare at the proffesor who was dead serious.

"Fine I'll give her another chance" you turn to Abra and sit down cross-legged. "Will you give me a chance Abra?" Abra watches you suspiciously as you extend your hand palm facing up. Abra takes a small step forward and looks at the proffesor, who nods reassuringly. She then takes another and another and another until she is directly in front of you. Tentatively she sniffs your hand and then proceeds up your arm to your shoulder, eventually moving past your neck and to your head.

You didn't move a muscle, despite how much it tickled. After smelling your ear she moved to your face where she got very close, her bright green eyes staring into your blue ones. After a moment she nodded and looked at Sina, who had been silent through the whole conversation. A quiet moment passed, before Sina spoke into your mind.

^She wishes to apologize for her actions^ she stated ^you startled her and she misjudged your intentions.^ you looked at Abra.

"I forgive you, and I'm sorry for scaring you" Abra nodded before sitting down in your lap and leaning against you. It wasfaintbut you thought you heard a sigh of contentment before she fell asleep.
1413222221121.title: Abra is a little scared

choices: Abra Wake Up during your starting travel
Abra Remain Asleep while you start to travel
14132222211211.content:
As soon as Abra fall asleep, you notice that your grip on her become a little tighter, you don't exactly realize why but this little bundle of fur is making you quite happy, and contentedness expression slowly appear on your feature.

Sina capable of sensing emotion, and looking at your smile happily speak: "It's seems that in the end my daughter took a liking into you, you know that you are the first she seems to trust? Beside Jeremy of course"

Jeremy: "Ah, so adorable isn't she? I am sure that your bound will grow strong in time, not unlike Sina and me" You would have swear that the professor was meaning something with his tone, but discard the idea quickly, Jeremy has always been a joker at hearth

Now that you finally had your very first pokemon, names start to scroll in your mind, and while the idea of naming her is appealing, you decide that she should be able to choose which name she want, so a good dose of patience are required, especially because Abras can sleep even 18 hours at day, luckily this number diminish dramatically after their first evolution.

Gripping your starter a little tighter and delicately lifting her to your chest, you start to walk towards the exit when Sina stop you: "A moment Jaden, Jeremy has your basic equipment ready for you and.." You interrupt her, speaking as quietly as possible: "Maybe she should sleep outside the balls? Does she sleep better in?"

Sina is touched by your consideration of her daughter, and she reply with an euphoric tone: "Do not worry Jaden, she can easily sleep in her balls if necessary, although it's probably better if she sleep with you, at least at the start, so she can..attach herself better to you" Attach? What she is a leech?

Jeremy come behind you and tap your shoulder, you need all your willpower to not scream and drop Abra: "The hell Jeremy?! Wear a goddamn bell or something.."

Abra shift in her sleep but otherwise nothing change.

Professor: "Hehe, sorry Jaden you know i was just joking right? Here your extra gear, pokedex and of course a few pokeballs for helping you start, also i have added a little gift in your account, just for giving you a push in the right direction"

After all these years, you know Jeremy quite well, and so Sina: "Seroously Professor, why tank you. Tell me, what would Sina have done if something would have appened to her daughter during your joke? She ^asked^ you to put the extra in did she?"

Jeremy look taken back by yours accusation, Sina however found your perception of what has really happened quite amusing

Sina: "Yes Jaden, that's exactly what happend, as for what i would have done if...well, let's just say that Jeremy could have forgotten what is a good night of sleep for quite some time..."

Jeremy face suddenly lose color, whenever Sina has telepathically told him must have been quite effective because

Jeremy: "Sorry Jaden, really i.." he look at Sina, then back to you again: "Just sorry ok, i won't do that again" Whoa, i knew that Sina can be quite persuasive but this..hihihihi

"Fine Jeremy, you are excused, now if you two would excuse me, i have a journey to start"

Jeremy: "Of course, Good Luck Jaden, and to call with the dex from time to time"

Sina: "Bye dear, call soon!" Soon? Ah yes, her daughter..

Exiting from the lab with a sleeping Abra in my embrace, i finally start my new life.
14132222211211.title: I choose you Abra

141322222112111.content:
Stepping out of the lab you are greeted by a fresh gust of wind. It smells fresh, like the air after a storm. Inhaling deeply you step forward and begin your journey in earnest you reach the edge I town before you hear someone calling your name.

"Jaden! Jaden!" you turn and see your mom jogging towards you. "Jaden! I almost forgot! Here's some money to start you off. It won't be easy but I know you'll become a great trainer."

"Thanks Mom, and don't worry I'll make you proud"

"you already have son."

"Don't be so sappy mom" you groan "I'll call when I get to the first city" you turn and walk onto the path that leads to the next town. You walk for a few minutes before you get thirsty. You set Abra down and root through your bag in search of your water bottle. When you find It you take a swig and look st Abra, who is now awake.

"oh hey your awake" you offer her the water bottle "Thirsty?" she takes the bottle and drinks some of the wate, before handing it back. "Hmmm I can't just call you Abra, you need a name. But what should we call you?" you think for a moment until you come up with a name you think is good. "How about Sylvia?"
141322222112111.title: Abra Wake Up during your starting travel

choices: Sylvia start questioning you about your plans
Sylvia refall asleep once more, this day is getting better and better..
1413222221121111.content:
The Abra that have now come to be your partner seems to love her new name, expressing her appreciation by nodding an trying to talk with you

"Bra Abra!"

An annoying feeling start to creep inside your skull, and having experienced such sensation before, you know that Sylvia is trying to telepathically speak with you

Sylvia: "Like..thank..master" Well here we go, having a psychic type as a starters you should probably get used to the feeling of hundred of ants crawling in your head, perhaps with some focus you may be able to reduce or even completely remove this inconvenience.

While you think on how get used to this feeling, Sylvia speak again: "Help...trainers..psychic?" What? trainer help...of course! Others trainers may had this problem at the beginning so maybe one of them could give me a few hints on how solve this! Also a psychic themed gym should have some books on the arguments....well if you wasn't feeling so lazy that is, maybe on the Psypedia, those hyper nerds/people may have written something about this argument, after all it's one of the most updated source of info on the net

Promising yourself to check up later, you thank Sylvia for her suggestion: "Thanks Sylvia, really i should have thought about that" you smile sheepishly

Sylvia shake her head a little: "Master..should..think..before..acting" Scolded by you own pokemon, marvelous...

Now lets fix this other problem: "Sylvia you may call me Jaden, there is no need for referring to me as master" Sylvia seems to ponder your statement, then: "Not..yet..worthy"

Worthy?! "Sylvia? why...worthy?"

Sylvia seems to ponder once more: "Friend..know you...enough...not offensive" She doesn't know me well enough, so she doesn't trust me yet?

"Sylvia you don't...like me?"

Sylvia shake her head: "Like..little...still...unknown" She practically told me that our relationship must be erected from the ground up, well there go my dream of having a trusty partner from the start....i can deal with this, i just hope that in the future she will trust me at least a little or our journey will end before it even start....maybe i should have waited for a starter they are semi-trained to be friendly with their future trainer from the beginning. Well usually at least.

Knowing Sylvia capacity to sense emotion it's better if i remove the very idea from my head before she catch the sniff of it and start whining about it.

This is not how i have imagined my first day, with secret and mistrust, definitely not a good start, it's not the first time that i still wonder why Jeremy wanted to give me Sylvia so...well he nearly screamed when i told him that i can wait for the league to send more starters. Why Jeremy? I know that an Abra is probably better but still, no, no more doubts, we have a journey to plan.
1413222221121111.title: A name and a purpose

14132222211211112.content:
Sylvia walked over to where you were sitting, looked deep into your eyes and sat down in your lap. Moments later she was sound asleep.

"Well that's great, I suppose" you were confused at this point. Sylvia was sending mixed signals. After a few minutes of head scratching you gave in and rose to your feet holding Sylvia to your chest.

"Look out Aeria region here I come." you march forward while thoughts of the many challenges youve got ahead of you. The thoughts brought out your memories of your home, the Aeria region. Once known as Sinnoh, an almost cataclysmic event irrevocably changed the landscape so that it was almost unrecognizable. The same event that your father had been lost in. Your father had been a worker on an offshore oil rig. Despite the assistance of many Pokemon your fathers body was never found. You shake your head to clear your mind of those thoughts.

"Dad wouldn't want me to dwell on it like this" you gaze up at the sky and promise "I'll make you proud dad, wherever you are" having settled your thoughts you renew your journey through Aeria.
14132222211211112.title: Sylvia refall asleep once more, this day is get...

choices: Towards the lake, a stroke of luck it's just what i need right now
141322222112111121.content:
With Sylvia asleep, the conversation is over, you are not sure if she is just entered her natural sleep cycle, or she just don't want to talk with you anymore. You sigh, hopefully the first one is the correct guess, then you revise your ^plan^

First point: Check gear integrity....ok
Second: Check food and water ration....yes, there are enough for you and another 2 pokemon for at least a week, and if all go well the first city is only 2 days on foot from here
Third: Ball launching technique...thunk, right on! Next!
Fourth: Map and basic environmental info......yes the dex is working
Fifth and last: Medical supply...all there

Ok then, seems that we are finally ready, or at least you are, Sylvia is not exactly collaborative being asleep and all. Fine i put her in the ball and continue alone.

As i get Sylvia ball from my belt, if feel my sleepy Abra shudder, attracting my attention, looking at her i see that she has opened her green eyes and gaze at me with a concerned look: "Master..want...me away?" Now that's exactly what i needed

"No Sylvia, seeing your state i just wanted to make you feel more comfortable, inside your ball it's pretty safe and you won't have to wake up during our walk, the terrain start to become rough from here on" I am not really lying to her, it's true that the path from here to New Noria, what once was called Crown City is quite bumpy, after the disaster all the non primary cities roads hasn't been yet fully repaired, who know for how long the situation will remain this way.

For a moment a flash of father memory come out from the depths of my mind, but i push them back, this is not the moment for reminiscence

The second reason is that frankly, i feel uncomfortable with Sylvia so close, she has openly told me ^I don't like you^, well not exactly but the meaning is the same, i think, and i need some time alone, away from emotion feeling pokemon, for rethink my priorities. Knowing that your starter has all but open friendship for you is quite the demoralizer, but i will keep my cool, and try to gain her trust, in the meantime i need an emergency plan, in case she refuse to obey orders or something, so i need another pokemon, preferably a water type, and...consider the possibility of having to keep Sylvia in stasis for an indefinite amount of time.

Despite my long reasoning, in reality my pondering has taken only a few moments: "Won't you prefer a comfortable place for your rest?" Damn, that was lame

Sylvia look dubious but still accept my offer, so grabbing her ball i recall her in, replace the now full container back in it's place, and continue walking alone with only my thoughts and the ghosts of my past to keeping me company.
141322222112111121.title: The first day of another day? Yes, nothing new

choices: Leave her in the ball and run.
1413222221121111212.content:
"Hmm? A lake? Perfect!" you grab all your stuff and run over to the shore. Placing your bag on the ground you grab your swim trunks and change quickly. Once you were changed you jumped into the water, regretting it almost instantly. "Holy shit!" you scream and immediately run out of the water. "F-freezing" you shiver and curl into a ball. While you were shivering miserably you failed to notice the bubbles that appeared in the middle of the lake. "Damn I wish I hadn't done that" you stood up stretching just in time to hear something breach the surface of the lake.

"Milooo" you turn to see a large snake-like Pokemon rise from the water. The pokemon had a cream colored body with a blue tail and red streamers coming from its head. Moving at a tremendous speed it swims toward the shore. You fall backwards as the Pokemon rushes towards you skimming through the water like a torpedo. You stagger backwards and grab your bag as you try to escape. Sprinting towards the road you hear an loud cry. "Milotic!" soon after a large jet of water tears through the ground next to you. The shot had a great amount of force behind it, enough to knock you off you feet even though it missed you. As you hit the ground you landed uncomfortably on your pokeball belt. You immediately considered bringing her out.
1413222221121111212.title: Towards the lake, a stroke of luck it's jus...

choices: Towards the city, let's end this exciting day
The forest never sleep, nor it's inhabitants
14132222211211112121.content:
You briefly remind yourself to not jump inside a lake without checking the temperature, or the possible inhabitants on the pokedex, then by instinct you grab the first, and only full ball on your belt, throwing it in front of you

"Sylvia! I need your help!"

Your partner ball open in midair, releasing it's precious cargo in a stream of energy directly in front of the enraged Milotic, and Sylvia don't lose time

"Abraaa!" With a burst of energy all the battlefield is enveloped in a blueish light and the Milotic appear confused for a moment, then with another scream of rage the water pokemon charge what you think is another Hydro Pump aimed directly at Sylvia, and finally your trainer skills make themselves known

"Sylvia protect!" You realize that your Abra may not know the ordered move, but luck seems to be on your side as she envelop herself in a cocoon of multicolored energy

The Milotic doesn't seems to care or is ignorant of the change of quo as the powerful jet of water impact the newly formed shield, harmlessly dispersing all of it's force

"that was close" You briefly scold yourself, promising to never send a pokemon in the battlefield again without knowing at least some of it's moves, then you remember that your dex should hold full information about your team, but the idea is discarded, as you remember to have left the device in the backpack and considering the distance, it could as well be on the moon

With your mind now to the present, you notice how the protect around your Abra start to fade as she ready herself for another command, and in that moment you realize what the bluish light was, Wonder Room....wow Sylvia must be quite smart for have recognized that Milotic protection against special attack is normally higher than the physical one, now Milotic is vulnerable to all special move! But Sylvia protection as exchanged as well! Shit!

"Milooooo!" Damn it, why this Milotic is so angry?! Usually they are so calm..no matter, my Sylvia is more important than a random pokemon, but what...yes! A memory flash in your conscious mind, specifically a passage in the description of Abra abilities: "it can sometimes know some of the attacks of i's evolved forms, although not as strong" Right now you hope that that passage was telling the truth

"Sylvia use Disable!" Your bra nod "Braaaaa!"

A brief flash of energy encompass you pokemon, and a glint appear on the Milotic face "Miloooo!" It seems quite pissed, and immediately try to use Hydro Pump again, but as expected it fail "Milo! Milo! Milo!" Quite the tenacious creature this poke, let's finish this!

"Sylvia Confusion!" "Braaa!"

Beside Abra focusing, no visible effect happen, or at least until the Milotic recoil back towards the lake

"Miloooooooo!" Damn it, go down you stupid, overgrown..

"Again, Confusion" "Braaa!"

The Milotic recoil back, more pronouncedly this time, it shake it's head and seems to focus on Sylvia, but then it turn around and smack it's own head with the fan-like tail

"Whoa, it's confused! Again Sylvia, let's finish it!"

Your Abra nod, and a few moment later, the Milotic fall to the ground trashing, finally!

"Keep her down, i get a ball!"
"Bra!"

You run towards your backpack, and fast as you can, retrieve a ball and immediately launch it toward the Milotic

"Get this you overgrown serpent! " Your aim strike true and the water type is enveloped by a withe light and sucked into the ball

For a few second, the small container seems to struggle in keeping such fury at bay, but then after a nearly a minute (such rage!), it stop and the famous captured ping could be hear coming from it

"Yes! We did it Sylvia!"

"Bra!"

You run towards your Abra and embrace her "Thanks...i..wasn't sure that.."

Sylvia: "No..struggle....i..fine" Silly poke

"Sylvia i am not asking if you are ready for another fight. I am Thanking you for your skill, seriously Wonder Room? I didn't see that coming"

Sylvia: "Trainer...check..device" The pokedex? Damn, scolded by my pokemon, again

With an apologetic tone: "Sorry, i...i will not make the same mistake again, promise"

Sylvia nod: "good..now..sleepy" Again? A right, Abra 18 hours at day

"Thanks Sylvia, i mean it"

She seems a little surprised by my sincerity and nod again

I then get her balls and recall her in, then replacing my partner ball, i try to steel myself for what come next, i admit that i am excited for my first capture, but such rage!

I just hope that the story about pokemon getting out of their ball on their own is just a metropolitan legend...

I walk towards the now completely still pokeball, now containing ^the beast^, and cautiously lift it up. Sealed.

Exhaling away my stress, and fears i place the ball in my belt and return to my backpack recovering all my clothes in the process

"From now on, shower, bath are for pussys anyway..."
14132222211211112121.title: Trust is gained, rage follow

141322222112111121211.content:
It was dark by the time you reached the city and it took another half hour to find the Pokemon center. You walk in through the sliding door. "Hey Nurse Joy! Could I get a room?" when She doesn't respond you get closer to the desk and peek more closely at Joy. "Nurse Joy?" you poke her shoulder receiving a mumble in response. "Ahh she's asleep." you gently push her until she awakes with a groan.

"Unh. Whatsit?" she slowly rises and looks up at you. "Oh oh I'm so sorry, I fell asleep and...how long have you been trying to wake me up?" you think for a moment before telling her it was a few minutes. "Oh okay umm...that's right did you want a room?"

"Yeah I'd love one and could you look at my Pokemon?" "Of course! And I'm sorry for the trouble" she said sheepishly.

"It's okay, really" you reassure her as you hand over your pokeballs. "Umm I just caught the Milotic in a lake down the road. She was fricking pissed. Do you know what might have caused it?" Joy looked a t the scans of the Pokemon that the machine took and quickly identified a problem.

"Well she has a break in a section of her spine." "As terrified of her as you were, that didn't mean you wanted her hurt. "Well how bad is it?" "It's not too serious with a little time in the machine she'll be right as rain." you sigh in relief "Thanks Joy" "She'll be ready for pickup in the morning." "Thanks" you take Sylvia from Joy and head up to the room she gave you. You unlock the door and step inside. As you close the door Sylvia's ball shakes slightly. You grab the ball and look at it curiously for a moment. "Sylvia?" the ball shakes again "You want out?" it shakes again. "Alright come out Sylvia." you open the ball and the white energy coalesced into the form of the green eyed Abra. "Hey Sylvia, did you want something?" "Want...sleep...bed...master" she spoke into your mind. You realized that the pain had faded from a sharp ache to a slight twinge. "You want sleep in the bed? Okay sure, you've earned it. I'll take the couch." you pull the couch out into its bed form. You put on the sheets, and the blanket. And then you flop down on it with a sigh. "What a day" you close you're eyes for a moment and awake several hours later with sylvia curled up on your chest watching your face "what's up Sylvia? I thought you wanted the bed?" "Had...bad...dream" she wriggled a little closer. "I...sleep...with...master?" "Uh, sure if you want." you smile as you watch her curl up and snuggle as close to you as possible. You fall back to sleep like that, with a smile on your face.
141322222112111121211.title: Towards the city, let's end this exciting day

choices: Milotic is still pissed, but acceptably calm
Milotic is quite calm, but openly distrust you
1413222221121111212111.content:
Your senses return to you, starting with your conscience followed by awareness, the feeling of a soft bed, light cover and a soft, the weight of my body resting on the side, fluffy teddy in my embrace. I should really get up but i.....teddy? I don't have a teddy.

Opening my heavy eyelids, a yellow soft looking fur obstruct my vision, and a smell of...i don't know, orange? assault my sensitive nose. What the...
Then the last night return to me.....Sylvia has asked if she could sleep with me last night

Feeling her soft fur on your chest, your loose grip on it's wielder tighten a little, she is such a good teddy that you don't want to leave her, what was the last time i slept so well? The last time i wake up so well rested? A flash of dad face sulk your mood immediately, and the grip on Sylvia tighten a little.

You don't remember how long it took for the nightmare to stop, months? Yeah, 1 and half you think. Realistically it was a stupid thing to do, remember, maybe i should forgive and forget, but truly it's as easy as it sounds

"and Sylvia if you feel like that towards me then its time to call me Jaden" Sylvia nodded slowly and crawled up onto the bed with you. Nysa gently released you but didn't let you off the bed. You decided that you weren't going to be able to get them back in their pokeballs tonight. "Alright let's get some sleep." you announce. "Alright...Jaden" Sylvia pulled you as close to her as she could and rested her head on your chest. Nysa, not wanting to be left out, curled all the way up your left side ending with her head next to yours. "Goodnight girls" you reach out and flip off the lights ending this, most stressful of days.
14132222211211112121111111211.title: A quick chat and a good night

141322222112111121211111112112.content:
My senses slowly return to me. i feel content although i don't know why.

I try to move my left arm, but something is keeping my form pinned on the bed. Slowly the memories of last night return to me, flashing through my eyes in a few moments, bringing with them my discomfort first, and my liberation later. In truth i am still not free from my own moral constriction, nor from my misplaced guilt, but i think that tanks to that strange trainer, i am definitely closer to absolution. Both mine and Nysa.

I won't forgive her so easily thought, she must regain my trust, and prove worthy of my forgiveness. Hopefully i won't let all of this power over her go to my head.

Speaking of head, i would like to have mine back since Sylvia seems to believe that my cranium is far more comfortable that the pillow, or at least that is what her sprawled form all over me seems to suggest.

Nevertheless the sun is height in the sky and, turning to the digital watch over the...shit! 10:30?!

"Wake up you lazy poke! It's already 10 in the morning!"

My shout seems to have both a good and a bad effect on my team, the good one being waking up, the bad one....well let's just say that triggering an instant wake up call on an all powerful pokemon trained specifically for battle giant sized creature may be not the most wisest thing i ever done, especially because a certain yellow furball ready stance bring her not so delicate footing straight on the family jewels.....ouch!

"Abra!" "Milo!" "Ahhhhhhhhh!"

A few minutes later i get out of the bathroom, desperately trying to remove the unpleasant aftertaste of partially digested food from my tongue, wiser by at least a few years, the same that i just thrown down the toilet by the way.

Not being the most philosophical person in the world i just stare at the pitiful figure that is supposed to be my Abra, and before she could say a word i speak: "This...never happened..." Both my pokemon nod while i walk unsteadily towards the wardrobe.

After a quick egg based breakfast, courtesy of Chansey and Arceus know if i was injured, we walk at a quick pace towards the reception hoping to find some more clue about the missing rejuvenator. What we find is a very pissed off nurse screaming obscenities towards a scared looking boy even younger than me

Joy: "What the hell happened to your Quilava?! She is covered in semen!"

Boy: "Well...we passed near a lake..she wanted to swim but...a few Dratini... "

Joy sigh, passing and hand over her head: "You let a few wild Dratini fuck your pokemon silly? And what about the rest of your team?" She place her face a few centimeters from him, having to slide her stomach on the counter for doing so: "Aren't all male?"

The young boy seems incredibly nervous: "W..e..well..."

Joy recover her erect position in less than a second, damn she is fast!: "Get out! And don't even bother to come back, Quilava remain here"

Boy: "But.."

Joy more angry than i ever thought a human could be: "Out! Or with Cresselia as my witness i will permanently remove your trainer license And your attributes, because i bet that if i analyze that mess i will find some human DNA as well, am i right?"

The boy run out the building fast enough to make a Rapidash red with envy, redder anyway.

I carefully approach the enraged nurse, giving her a few seconds to cool off: "Sorry to disturb you Joy, can i help you?"

She turn towards me, and looking at my team she smile: "Good morning sleepyhead, aren't we a little late?"

I chuckle, despite the obvious attempt to minimize the scene i just saw she is genuinely funny: "I am ok Joy" I look towards the entrance: "Did that happen often?"

She exhale: "No, it's quite rare actually. Usually if a pokemon feel abused tend to leash out, so she was unconscious or restrained somehow..."

I nod: "It's possible that he was telling the truth?"

She recover her serious expression: "No"

I look at her, a single-mindedness that leave no margin of doubts: "While it's true that sometimes a wild pokemon take advantage of certain situations, and that i have treated a few rape attempt, both from male and female, they are not this sadistic. Reached satisfaction the offender leave the victim mostly intact and certainly won't leave such crude sign of ownership on it. It's just not their way. Dominate yes, but if the victim is not your mate no identification sign are left, sort of code if you want, instinctive probably."
141322222112111121211111112112.title: New enemy and old answer part 1 (too long)

choices: Try to get someting else from her
Maybe i should try to speak with other more sane people, some vendors maybe
1413222221121111212111111121121.content:
I nod again: "So the sign means that the offenders knew the victim pretty well"

She look at me in the eyes: "Yes, very well" Then she turn towards the examination room: "Poor creature, she must be traumatized by the experience, there is no way of knowing how she will react in the future.."

Why?, Isn't obvious?: "Won't she just mistrust any human from now on?"

Joy look at me with a sad expression: "Not necessarily, you see sometimes....pokemon are not all powerful, their mind and personality may..break, if that happen their reaction can be quite unpredictable, chaotic even"

"You talk as that happened before, personally i mean"

She look at me, recovering her professional behavior and pride: "Yes, a few years ago the authority stopped an illegal shipment of so called ^usable collection pokemon^,
an unofficial way to call every kind of rare or hard to find.... mate-able poke, male and female alike.

Black market then, everyone know about them, want and Eevee but regulation limit your ^acquiring rights^? No problem. Prefer an more exotic pokemon? One specifically trained for battle or pleasure? Can be done.

When arrested they usually get at least 20, but money can sweeten their deals, after all is nearly impossible running such business without a few contact with the authority. Still the most trainers abhor such methods and usually only rich kids can afford the inflated prices anyway.

Joy continue: "I offered my services and they brought me 2 completely mentally broken creature, i had to treat a Dragonite and an Ivysaur for multiple vaginal and anal laceration, along with others evident sign of abuse"

She pause for nearly a minute before continuing, it's strange seeing her so detached: "When i was done, i kept them in isolation for nearly 2 weeks. Finally recovered i got the authorization to give them to respectable trainers who wished to give mistreated and abused pokemon a second chance"

She start to cry but her tone remain impassive: "Both of them was returned to me multiple times, because despite the repeated scolding, they kept offering themselves to their trainers, the Dragonite forced his trainer to have sex with her to exhaustion while the Ivysaur was caught by it's trainer in a mixed orgy between human and pokemon at the park. The evidence and witnesses of the act all agreed that was her provoking again and again until one of them finally given her what she wanted"

She pause again, wiping her tears away with her wristband: "They never recovered mentally, right now both are assigned to the breeding grounds, the only thing that make them happy it seems"

That's...sad, she continue: "Most of the time the pokemon recover but have it's behavior modified somehow, the most common issue is the reduction of inhibitions especially aggressively in battle, and evident sign of physical attraction towards their trainer"

Your curiosity get piqued: "It's illegal..you know.."

She continue your phrase with an hint of playfulness: "Having sex with your pokemon?" I nod

"No it's not, it was until a few years ago but the truth is that sometimes pokemon does have a genuine attraction towards humans, and their trainer being their alpha..."

I got it: "What do you think about it? Personally i mean"

She smile: "I believe that sometimes a pokemon can love it's master without constriction or reserve, but there are a lot of pervert that only want to stick their dick inside the first pokemon hole they find, even some woman that prefer it....exotic so to speak, so be careful ok?"

Now that the small talk are done, and my curiosity has been satisfied for now at least, it's time to speak about the theft: "Joy will you mid if i investigate in the rejuvenator matter? What can you tell me about the courier or it's route?"

She look pensive: "I think that he took the quickest path, the one that pass through the Smiling Forest"

I look at her: "Smiling Forest?"

She laugh: "You see, the forest is inhabited by psychic and ghost type, they are know pranksters mostly harmless and friendly. Why some trainer even said that he got his Mismagius in there, it practically throw itself in the pokeball, literally. However this is a very rare occurrence, probably it was bored and wanted a change of scenery. Anyway you should be fine, and good luck! If you succeed i will give you a fitting reward, as soon as i think of one"

Doubt surge in my mind: "Joy, why you didn't try to discourage me i mean, shouldn't the police deal with it?"

She laugh maniacally for a few moments, and Sylvia speak to me telepathically: "Nurse..nuts?"

I reply undertone: "Probably, can you check her sanity?"

Sylvia reply: "Not..wise..Jaden..can't"

I am proud of the progress i am making with Sylvia, she call me Jaden now!

But Joy has to interrupt my happy moment: "I should, but i won't. Truthfully the police force haven't proved itself very efficient"

Ok.......
1413222221121111212111111121121.title: New enemy and old answer part 2

14132222211211112121111111211212.content:
"well thanks Joy. I'm gonna go ask around and see what I can learn" "alright be careful we dont know who took them, they might be dangerous" "don't worry I'll be fine!" you reassure her "C'mon girls let's get gone!" you stride out the door the picture of confidence. Until you slam right into someone walking down the sidewalk.

"Hey man watch were you're going!" "Jaden!..You okay?" Sylvia lifts you off the ground telekinetically. "Sorry I didn't see you?" you apologize to the man. He was about thirty years old with a ginger buzz cut and a small goatee. He looked at you with contempt and continued his walk down the street, but not before you noticed the pin on his shirt. It was the same as the one found in the professors lab. Grimy to hide your surprise you let him pass. Once he was a little ways down the street you began to follow him.

"Nysa I need you to go into your ball for a little while. We need to follow this guy and your not exactly the stealthiest Pokemon." "Milooo" she crooned sadly, but she relented allowing you to be recall her. "Don't worry I'll let you out soon." you return the ball to your belt and see the man still walking down the street. "Okay Sylvia let's go" you put her on your shoulders and stalk after the man.

You follow him for half an hour managing not to get caught thanks to Sylvia. You were considering just confronting him until he stopped in front of a building and entered. Looking at the sign you see that it's a...
14132222211211112121111111211212.title: Maybe i should try to speak with other more san...

choices: Rest for now, information gathering tomorrow
141322222112111121211111112112122.content:
Looking at the shop insignia i see that the man entered in a...grocery store? What in the..

This make no sense really, but deciding that following him in may be an unwise move on my part, considering that he might recognize me from earlier, i just seek for a place where i can rest unnoticed, and if i i am lucky, finding some clue about these people.

Assuming of course that he just didn't go inside just for shopping. Well i can still stalk him anyway. With luck on my side, i find a bench not far from the grocery store, now i just have to wait.

I don't know how much times has passed, 3-5 hours? Nothing, my prey haven't come out the store since this early afternoon, it's evening now and..wait what's that?

A small group of 4 people, walk with a quick pace towards the grocery store, they seems to be in the middle of an animated discussion, and while i can't heard what they are discussing about, i can definitely hear one of them nearly screaming

Boy: "What do you mean broken?! How can you break a brand new reju.."
Boy2: "Shhh! The hell are you screaming about! Look let's get to the boss and.."

They enter the the shop, their voice muffled completely by the automatic doors.

At this point it's clear that this grocery shop is a cover for the mysterious Team Shadow. But what they are doing there, or more importantly, how many and what are their combat abilities....mmmh.

I must gather more information before deciding to do anything, also if i have discovered this connection so easily while the police still fumble in the dark, can only mean 2 things:

1) They are complete Moron, likely. Their superior officer is a complete idiot, most likely. After ll promotion given on favors and not talent or skill can only give such result.

2) They are corrupted, paid to feign ignorance, combined with the highly likely theory of the superior officer, everything make sense.

I can't trust the authority, it's seems that i must go in alone, but first i should return to the center and try to pry more information from that crazy nurse, hopefully she will be more collaborative when i present her some decent theory, along with the phrase i just overheard.

While i get up and begin my walk towards the center, Sylvia uncharacteristic silence finally break

Sylvia: "Jaden...we...ambush?" Ambush?

"You mean ambush them when..where? They got out?" She nod

I suppose that we could try...but..

My trail of thoughts is interrupted by an ominous feeling, a prsence, something just passed near me. I can't..what was that? It chill em to the bone...a strange fear

Sylvia: "Jaden..alright?" I look down at Sylvia an notice her worried look

With and uncertain tone: "Yeah, yeah im alright, just...a breeze, i should have brought a jacket"

Sylvia: "Why..Jaden..lie?" Of course, feel emotion

"I don't know it's just....nothign Sylvia, let's drop it ok?" She reluctantly nod

"Well then, if we wan to ambush them we need a plan and we should prepare the ground, and that means going where they probably operate, the Smiling Forest. And assuming that they get up early we must go tonight"

It could be dangers, especially at night but it could give us an edge, and we may need every advantage we could get. Or we could await tomorrow and try to discretely gather more information about their activity, Sylvia can prove invaluable in this task.
141322222112111121211111112112122.title: Something else

1413222221121111212111111121121222.content:
"Hey Sylvia lets go to the forest that crazy nurse told us about." she thinks for a moment and nods. You pick her up and proceed to the gate out of the city. Looking into the forest it seemed rather intimidating, but you hike in anyways. In the forest there was a road that appeared to be in relatively good condition.

You noticed a few Pokemon in the forest but nothing really spectacular. "I thought there would be more Pokemon here." "Jaden...there...something...powerfull...deeper...in...forest." "Powerfull? What do you mean?" "Angry...strong...scary" you realize it must be really powerfull if it was scaring Sylvia. "Don't worry I won't let you get hurt." you hug her close for a moment and she returns the gesture.

You walked on through the forest following Sylvia's directions towards the powerful presence. Once you began to get really close you saw some people unconscious on the ground and even one in a tree. A quick examination revealed them all to have the good pim identifying them all as Team Shadow. After you identify the people Sylvia points you towards the powerful entity. A large bolt of lightning sprung up from the ground where Sylvia pinpointed the powerful presence.

You sprint to the site of the lightning in time to see a team shadow member slammed into the ground by a huge black Pokemon. The Pokemon was pitch black, it had two wings, a large conical generator on its tail. The crest jutting from its head glowed blue at the tip. It's red eyes stared maliciously at the terrified grunt on the ground. Moments later it released the man and kicked him, sending him into the tree line with a yelp. The huge Pokemon turned towards you.

A voice echoes in your head, not unlike when Sylvia speaks to you. "you are not a member of their team. What are you doing here?" the voice was serene, feminine, and seemed sad. "Umm I was trying to find an item they stole." the Pokemon tilts to the side. "I am Zekrom, maybe we can be of use to each other." "I'm Jaden, what did you have in mind" smiling Zekrom said "You have already helped me Jaden. Now I will help you."

"Wait how did I?" you weren't allowed to finish as Zekrom lunged forward and grabbed the both of you before launching into the sky. "Holy shit!" you scream as you fly to the grocery store that you found earlier. "Wha? But how did?" " I took the information from your mind." you shivered slightly not liking the thought of her searching your mind. "Now I want you to go inside and try to find a way for me to get in." "alright but how will I let you know when I find one?" "Telepathic link, and if you don't find one I'll just blast my way in!"
1413222221121111212111111121121222.title: Forest tonight

choices: Few cameras still active but damaged. Can't distinguish anything but movement
All alarm are off, camera too. Silent Infiltration for now.
14132222211211112121111111211212221.content:
Zekrom fly with incredible speed, gripping both me and Sylvia in each ^hands^. We reach our destination a lot faster that i would have thought possible, how a pokemon this big can move so fast?! It's like gravity don't affect it at all!

Zekrom: "Gravity does not affect me, but your weight is unbalancing my flight" Did it just call me fat?

"Hey, i barely weight 77 kg! You probably reach 300!"

Zekrom: "A little more actually" Of course....

"Why are you here?" I feel my body insides shift for a moment as we suddenly stop in midair, just above the grocery store

Zekrom: "I seek my...relatives, so to speak. They are important for me and i want them back"

"You mean Reshiram? But you said relatives? Who else?"

Zekrom: "Kyurem" Who?

"Kyurem? Who.."

Zekrom: "You should be able to infiltrate from here, i saw a glimpse of that skylight in the memory of a grunt"

Well then if ..
I feel the grip on my shoulder relent, then gravity "Ahhhh!"

thrump The falling end not 2 seconds later, but the shock still persist

"Warn me next time the idea of dropping me pass through your head!"

I could swear to hear it laughing

Zekrom: "I will, and stop calling me it.."

"And how should i call you then? Weight dropper? His majesty the Mind-Peeper?"

Zekrom face become unreadable, more than already is, but the smirk plastered on it's face is easy to recognize: "Oh, i am sure that you'll find something to call me, hmhmhmhmhm" The heck you.....oh shit!...wat..!

The black pokemon turn around in mid-air and lifting it's tail, even with the faint light of the moon i can clearly see a small slit between her hind legs, then with the same absurd speed She brought me here, vanish ascending the beautiful night sky.

Sylvia: "Bitch"

I turn towards Sylvia, still incredulous about what just transpired

Sylvia: "Know..how..call...now" Da facq just...i don't want to know

"Come on Sylvia let's try to unlock this thing"

While we walk towards our possible entry point, i can hear Sylvia mind rumbling about something i can't decipher. I kneel in front of the well kept glass, and while it's surely big enough for me, and i am bigger then Sylvia, i can clearly see the flooring from here, how descend without breaking our neck? Also there may be an alarm or something attached to this thing, : "Sylvia can you unlock it? Better even, can you..ehm, feel something..attached to it?"

She look at me dubious, i clarify: "We need to know if there are an alarm connected to this window, how to explain....if there are..magnets between two point near this" i point at the skylight "and the roof"

My partner nod, i can see the fur on her head standing for a few moments, maybe her powers influence her physical body directly? Like the fur shape and such?

My musing is interrupted by Sylvia speaking in my head, at least the painful feeling of having another mind speaking directly at me is slowly vanishing, that or i am becoming a sadist..

Sylvia: "Metal...two...find" She must have found the alarm trigger, of course this place is under surveillance, how to.., why what a devious idea, i just hope that this alarm is prone to failure

"Sylvia, don't Abra emanate alpha waves that can interfere with electronic device?"

She nod, and understand what i want to do: "Can..but..tire...Kadabra...easy" She can but it's very tiring for an Abra, that means taking away a good chunk of her stamina, but try to find another entry point seems improbable, that is IF Zekrom told the truth, despite her trickster attitude i am inclined to believe her, for now

"Do it, i will try to not call you in battle unless absolutely necessary"

She nod again and start to focus. After nearly a minute nothing happened: "Are you sure.."

A noise attract my attention, and i see what seems to be an electrical junction box open violently, sparks jumping out from the carefully placed connection, then another stronger noise of an energy source powering down, then nothing.

Looking down i can see the reflection of the light insignia shutting off, along with the emergency lamp turning on, wow

I turn to congratulate with my partner, but end up running to her, catching her unconscious form just a moment before hitting the roof

I whisper: "Thanks Sylvia, i owe you one.."

Gripping her ball i recall her inside, and mentally prepare myself to collaborate with Milotic, hopefully she understood her place and will support me in this endeavor, without trying to mate with me first..
14132222211211112121111111211212221.title: That escalated quickly!

141322222112111121211111112112122211.content:
Sighing defeatedly you reach for the only other occupied pokeball on your belt. "Nysa come out" you drop the ball and Nysa leaps out in a flash of light. "Milooo" she exclaims gleefully when she sees that you are alone. Smiling seductively she coiled her tail around your leg and began licking your face affectionately. "Nysa! No! We have to get inside this building." she slowly uncoiled herself rubbing her tail across your crotch. "Don't do that! I need your help, will you listen and follow my orders while we are in there?"

She smiles and agrees quickly, but with a twinkle in her eye that suggested mischief. You try to ignore it and open the skylight softly. True to Sylvia's word the alarm didn't go off. You lean in looking out for any grunts that might be hanging around. Not seeing anyone you drop your legs into the building and hang for a moment before falling to the floor. "Nysa c'mon" you whisper crouching low to the ground. Nysa drops to the ground without a sound coiling around you.

You climb out of her coils and look out into the hallway. Here you spot one guard and couple cameras. "Alright Nysa use mist to create a smokescreen." with a soft "Milooo" she opened her mouth emitting a white fog that spread through the area quickly, obscuring vision and distorting sound. You grab a wooden chair found in the room and sprint towards where the guard was.

You slide out of the fog and smash the chair into his head. The chair shatters and the grunt falls to the ground knocked out. You smile hoping that the rest of the security was that lax.

Proceeding down the hallway you look into each and every door avoiding the grunts when you could and taking out the rest. You look in a doorway and immediately pull your head back, the room had several grunts in it. Focusing you manage to hear some of thee conversation "Man I'm beat" "Yeah me too, Bernie is running us ragged to find rare pokemon" that must be where all the grunts are. And Bernie must be their leader or something.

You continue searching for any sign of Reshiram and Kyurem. Zekrom's relatives as she put it. Turning a corner you see a reinforced door at the end of the left turn. "There's got to be something important in there. Unfortunately there were two guards standing next to the door. "this ones gonna be tougher than the others." you think for a moment leaning against the wall.

"Nysa can you take them both out with a Hydro pump?" she nodded sliding up close to you. "alright then on my signal we both charge and you blast them." she nodded again and licked your cheek. "R-ready set now!" you both turn the corner Nysa slightly in the lead already firing a powerfull blast of water from her maw. The attack took the guards completely by surprise, before they could even reach for their pokeballs they were nicked into the wall and knocked cold.

"Good job Nysa" she cooed happily and curled around you wrapping you in a serpentine hug. "Not now" you pry her off "Let's see what's in this room." you cautiously open the door and look inside. You are greeted by the sight of a small red dragon restrained in a cage. The dragon was red with white highlights on its neck and stomach. It had no back legs but instead it had a wingspan equal to its body length. Thee was a red triangle on its head and a blue one on its chest.

"The fuck is wrong with these people?" you seethe quietly. Sneaking forward, you get about halfway to the cage before the ground in front of you explodes. The blast sends you sliding across the slick linoleum floors. "What the? You're just ssome punk ass kid! How did you get in here? Who are you? Nevermind it doesn't matter. I am Bernie and you won't be leaving here alive." a voice yells at you for the ceiling. Looking upwards you notice a balcony you hadn't seen earlier. On the balcony stood a man. The man had red hair with eyes to match, right now they burned with contempt.

"You aren't even worth the trouble of battling, I'll just let my Pokemon take care of you." he grabbed a ball and hurled it into the air. It split open revealing a black and red dog like Pokemon with two large horns protruding from its head. "Houndoom kill them" the dog opens its mouth wide and wastes no time in blasting a large flamethrower. You cover your face and expect the worst, but Nysa intervenes. Blasting a hydro cannon she extinguishes the flames and blasts the dog in one fell swoop. "Damn" you whisper as the Houndoom attempts to get up and fails.

At this time Bernie decides to become scarce. "Oh no you don't! Nysa blast him!" "Milotic!" she quickly launches a burst of water that knocks Bernie off the balcony and onto the floor. You walk over and grab the front of his shirt. "Who is that Pokemon in the cage and where is the rejuvenator?" he coughed "As if I'd tell you" a punch to the face makes him infinitely more cooperative. "The rejuvenator is in a room down the hall, that Pokemon is Latias, she's amazingly rare." releasing him you walk over tithe cage and have Nysa bust the locks. After all the locks are undone you gently wake the unconcious poke. You glare at Bernie "this had better not be permanent damage"

"Latia?" a soft voice reached your ears and you crouched in front of the red Pokemon. "Are you alright?" Latias stares at you for a moment before leaping onto you and clutching you to her tightly. "~Thank you~" a voice echoed through your head. "Would you allow me to capture you for a little while? Just until we get you healed up?" she nods softly. You grab a pokeball and tap her on the head with it pulling her inside. "Let's go Nysa we still need to get the rejuvenator."
141322222112111121211111112112122211.title: Few cameras still active but damaged. Can't...

A few documents about experiments on what is mentioned as Tao Trio
1413222221121111212111111121121222111.content:
With the rare pokemon secured inside the ball, your spirit lift a little knowing that another plan of this still mysterious team has been foiled, this part at least

The light on the labs pristine walls and roof suddenly shut off, replaced by a noisy alarm sound and a few red emergency light barely strong enough to see the floor

"Damn it, is suppose that battling in the middle of one of their lab couldn't be considered exactly stealthy, still..."

You focus your mind on the thoughts of Zekrom, specifically imagining her blasting through the soft flooring of the fake store, and landing in the middle of a corridor barely big enough to fit her form. Also this remind you to check for her relatives as she as put it, Reshiram the seeker of truth, and this Kyurem you never heard about

The noise of running grunts can be felt above the siren alarm sound, positioning themselves just outside the lab door, the only exit. Then looking up the you notice that the balcony is not that hight, unfortunately Abra is out so no levitation, but....i know i will regret this...

"Nysa, can you push me up to that balcony over there?" I bet she is strong enough, but is not her physical prowess that worry me

She look at me with a glint that would have scared off a lesser person, and nearly make me change idea as well

"Miloooo"

She grab you by the hip using her flexible tail, then with a smirk that promise woe and despair, to me at least, she delicately launch my body towards the balcony edge. As the air with the acre smell of chemicals hit my face and the feeling of emptiness reach my guts i think: this is how a doll must feel when discarded somewhere. Before i can rectify my erroneous statement about inanimate object feeling, the handrail come in my reach and grabbing it with all my strength, i am able to push myself up.

Recovering from my quick free flying experience, a thing that if i have any say in it will probably Not repeat anytime soon, i grab Nysa ball and recall her in

"Come Nysa"

Milotic nod as the red beam of light impact her body, enclosing her form in the safety of the ball, just as the grunt outside start to launch attack at random inside the lab.

I only look while these idiots careless attempt, destroy machinery and scatter unknown chemical everywhere, some even hitting the experimental tube contained within as box with an enormous sticky saying ^Instable reactant, frail^

That is my cue to leave. I hear the grunt outside screaming obscenities at me while the container with the scary looking sticky start to melt from the side, releasing fumes that i have absolutely no intention to breathe

Grunt: "Surrender and we will spare your meaningless life!" Right, perhaps verifying your threat assessment would have been a wiser choice, especially because

1 The lab ventilation system is evidently down....
2 A crashing sound of epic proportion could be heard from behind the little group of grunt, followed by a terrifying roar coming from the same spot

Zekrom with a mocking/friendly tone: "Need some help?"

I try to ^think^ back at her, should work but i am no psychic: "Can't hear you over the grunts screaming voices" the i try to think privately: "not that they didn't deserve this"

Zekrom now serious: "Indeed they do" More screams coming from the corridor, as i hear a grunt literally flying to the labs door, begging for his life until the impact knock him out

Zekrom thoughts become darker as her roar easily cover the alarm siren, i can feel it, but i don't know if she is ^talking^ with them as well: "No mercy you monsters"
