Her reply is clear, and despite my negative answer quite happy: "Saved a Latias? They are quite rare you know. Treat her well and she will become one of the best in your team"

I have no intention to keep her....well i am tempted but i prose to release her..or not?: "I have not, bah, look i still need to search the rest of this base, just keep them occupied while i seek your relatives and the rejuvenator ok?"

I shook my head, removing the light dizziness that talking to Zekrom left me, realizing my foolishness in remaining in this now useless lab, and leaving Bernie to his fate, i run towards the balcony back door and let myself in.

The balcony door lead to an empty corridor well illuminated by battery powered lights, big enough for a well fit human, but definitely not for Milotic, so i keep her in ball while i search for my objectives possible location. Nearly at the end of this corridor i notice a door with a plate, on it ^Director^ is written in a clear elegant manner, under it a far less elegant ^piss off^

Thinking that probably various useful documents could be inside, i kick the probably locked door...well i try at least, damn TV series it look so easy there..

I hear a light chuckle in my head, bet that Zekrom know, and pissed off at both the door and the mocking legendary i focus all my strength and anger on the poor door, that to my surprise give in hinges and all.

Zekrom chuckle vanish, but her tone is still mocking: "Such power young trainer, did the anger empower your kick?"

I reply back, still a little angry: "No but the idea of what TS could do to innocent people and pokemon disgust me, and perhaps here i can find some answer at last"

Zekrom mockery vanish, replaced by what i can recognize as respect: "An idealistic then..interesting"

I ignore her comment while i start to search for any valuable information they may have about other experiments or the rejuvenator exact location. A map with all the complex layout is on the wall behind an impressive looking desk.

Maybe there i can find what i seek.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111.title: Continue

14132222211211112121111111211212221111.content:
You approach the desk and start opening drawers. The first couple drawers only hold letters without a return address, containing instructions on the rejuvenator. In the final drawer however you found a single file. You examine the file, and finding nothing unusual you open it. To your surprise it's relatively straight forward. "let's see. Oh shit, they're trying to control of Arceus!" reading further into the file you find the outcome, and what you see enrages you.

According to the paper you were looking at when Arceus had appeared it went ballistic, unleashing its power over the world in a berserk rage, reshaping the continents themselves. "T-these bastards! They killed my Dad!" you slump to your knees stunned this past year you had thought it was a natural disaster, everyone had but now you realize that it was these criminals.

You continue to think for a moment finnaly coming to the conclusion that they must be stopped. The police weren't gonna get it done and the government probably wouldn't believe you, that left you, a lone inexperienced trainer with two Pokemon and no clue how to proceed."~Whats going on did you find my family?~" Zekrom's voice snaps you back to the present. "Wha? No I didn't but I did find out that they caused the cataclysm a year ago and they might try it again!"

You charge out of the office and swing over the balcony railing. You manage to avoid injury by rolling as you hit the ground. "I don't know about you but I'm gonna try to stop 'em!" you dash through the lab now in flames and turn for the store room where the rejuvenator supposedly was. Surprisingly it actually was there, searching the machine you find a button labeled compress. Crossing your fingers you press the button hoping that it does what you think it will. Fortunately it does and the device shrinks to the size of a rubix cube. "That was a lot easier than expected" you say holding the now miniature healing machine. You turn to the exit only to see that it was blocked by debris.

"Dammit!" you run through the compound in search of a door or something to escape through. "There's no way out!" you cry out in frustration. "~Hold on a moment~" Zekrom thinks towards you. Shortly after the roof crumbles near you and Zekroms arm reaches in and grabs you. "Shit!"

You are launched into the air for a third time that day. Zekrom clutching you in both hands as she sped through the sky to the forest where you had met. "~goodbye Jaden perhaps next time we may get to know each other better.~" her farewell sounded odd and it was a moment before you realized what she meant. Blushing furiously you stutter "H-hey if you think I'm just gonna have sex with any poké that wants it your crazy!" giggling madly she leapt into the sky and shot off like a bolt of lightning.

"And now I've gotta walk back, great"

Isn't every child dreams? Meeting such power of nature and unleash them on your foes!

Or that's being a megalomaniac?

Anyway syntax and adjective details aside, i think that my dream of becoming a trainer included all the above, and maybe some tiny little mention about fame and glory, don't differ much from others who has similar dreams.

My thoughts keep me company while i conclude this crazy trip by crossing the automatic doors of the pokecenter now deserted, and meet a disheveled Nurse Joy near the old rejuvenator wielding what i can only describe as a giant hammer, in the obvious intent of crushing the nonfunctional machine in it's compacted version, without using the appropriate function of course

Mockingly i add: "Is that perchance the new shock therapy i sooo much heard about?"

Joy slightly angry: "I don't know what are you talking about, sir" Then mockingly add: "Does your pokemon need Healing perhaps? I am sorry young trainer but a certain colleague of yours promised to recover.."

I interrupt her, keeping a professional tone: "And i always deliver, miss Joy"

There i place the compacted brand new rejuvenator on the counter, and not even thanking me, squeal in happiness and grab the device running in the examination rooms behind the counter

"And that's the hero thanks, why always a pleasure Joy, really is"

I hear her muffled voice beyond the door, probably still excited by my astounding success, maybe it's better if i don't mention Zekrom involvement in this, for now at least.

Bored i start to walk towards my room, i will ask about my reward tomorrow when Joy will be more calm, sane hopefully, but them i remember Latias.

I sight, it seems that i must wait regardless, i am not sure if the experiment she was forced to participate was completed or even started at all, but i will take no chance in her wellbeing, and of course i must what she want to do afterwards.

I remember Zekrom words about Latias, but i can't force her to stay, an unwilling pokemon is an useless pokemon after all. While the pokeball prevent all but the strongest or more willed pokemon to break free, it doesn't really force them to obey your orders, compel them yes, but it's possible to refuse the compulsion and disobey the trainer.

The memory on how the gym medals are nothing more than pretty energy amplifier, bring a smile on my face. Some trainers still believe that a piece of pretty iron make them more worthy in the eyes of pokemons.

"Hahahaha" I laugh in the empty center at the absurdity of such concept. Why Pokemon should even remotely care about Human recognition, they mean nothing to them.
Respect is important, friendship is important, a bound that in rare cases can transcend logic, like what happen with some psychic or rarely between a legendary and it's trainer is important. A few other things too, but a common piece of metal easily duplicable everywhere? Definitely not. That's why the league don't persecute imitators, their products just won't work, if your team follow you with it it's only because they believe in you, and your confidence boost help.

Joy dash out the back room door, and reaching the counter look at me happily: "It work! I can finally resume my duties! Come i want to discuss about your reward!"

Concluded her brief speak she hastily return in the back room

I follow Joy, a little apprehensive about her mood swings, hopefully i am on her good side and will remain so from now on.

For a moment nothing happens, then suddenly you just burst out laughing. "Ahahahaha" You laugh untill you can't breathe and lean on your knees. "It's nothing Joy. Nothing."

A familiar pressure in your head alerts you that Sylvia is communicating with you.

"~Jaden...speak...private?~" "Hmm? Oh sure." you turn to the rest of your team. "All of you behave. No more fighting!" Sylvia leads you out into the hallway, where she stands nervously. "Whats up Sylvia?" "~Feel funny~" you crouch before her and feel her head. "You don't feel warm, but I'm not gonna take any chances." you pick her up. "Let have Joy take a look at you, She may be crazy but she is the nurse." Sylvia nods weakly, snuggling into your arms.

"Yo Joy, I need you to take a look at Sylvia." you bring her up to the desk where Joy was standing. "Well what seems to be the problem?" "She feels strange." "Hmm well let's take a look." Joy brings her into the examination room, leaving you in the lobby.

"I'd better check on the rest of them." you open the door to the cafeteria, and are greeted by the sight of your pokemon just sitting there talking. "Hey girls lets go outside, it's a beautiful day." Immediately after speaking you are surrounded by estrogen as your pokemon give you a huge group hug. "Milooo" "Quillll" "~Yes let's!~"

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I watch as my team walk toward the center double doors, feeling a strange sense of proudness in their happiness. I am still a little shocked about my revelation earlier. Not only nearly everything they teach you at school about pokemon is bull, but also there is a good chance that the teacher are lying on purpose to their student, a truth i still have trouble to accept.

My mood is sulked by Sylvia condition, or at least the i don't know what it bothering her, i just hope that Joy know what she is doing, i don't want to think about her suggestion on Pyrie, Joy idea of therapy do differ from mine, i just hope that despite her craziness she is as capable as she look, i believe so but still, memory of the past resurface for a few moments, they are in no small feat the cause of my recent distress, the bull they say about pokemon in school

They tell you that pokemon are mostly instinctive creature, incapable of anything more than basic logical reasoning and planning, unable to feel emotion or love, worthy of being respected as living creature but never more than such.

Teacher are lying to their student, on purpose, why? What they are hiding? What scare them to the point of.....they are afraid of? What it would happen if they recognize pokemon as something more than animals? What would happen if..

Lyrica interrupt my monologue, her happiness bring out a smile on my lips : "Jaden come on! I want to play!"

I willingly bury my memory where they belong once more, the shadow of my past should not condition my future, even i know that such thing is impossible, but i will come to term with it, and maybe one day i will have the chance ask my questions to who can answer them fully: "Sure Lyrica, what do you have in mind?"

She look pensive: "Hmmmm, what about tag?"

"Well there is a problem with that, i can't fly Lyrica nor i will be able to match your speed, probably"

Lyrica expression become mischievous, so do her tone: "Oooo but i will let you catch me Jaden, and then you can do Anything you want with me, anything.."

My thoughts get thrown in disarray, maybe i should tell her to stop teasing me, to behave as...what? Behave like what a robot? She is probably just joking, also i must accept my responsibilities as her trainer and stop arguing when any small things happen to me, but that doesn't mean that i must accept anything they ask me to do, or be

"Nice try Lyrica, what about a prize instead?"

I notice as the both Pyrie and Nysa come back to hear our conversation, while Lyrica nearly shout in my head: "Prize? Really?!"

It's my turn to play this game, but i won't bet for the same prize: "What about an accessory, or a treat at a massage parlor specifically for pokemon?"

I am not sure if Pyrie or Nysa previous trainer has ever brought them to a massage parlor, or if they even know what is it, but the expression on all their muzzle make me believe that they at least know of what are we talking about, at least i hope, Pyrie smile doesn't exactly express joy, more like...what the hell her trainer did to her? No wait, i don't want to know

Lyrica seems pretty excited and her tone reflect that: "Massage? I have heard of such things, and i have only heard good things about it, ok a massage or the winner then, but what about you?" Her mischievous smile return: " What do you get for winning? A massage from us?" Both Pyrie and Nysa seems quite happy with the idea, i wonder why

"No, if i win...i don't want to hear anything about mating, nor even the slightest allusion about it for the whole day, agreed?"

The whole team pout, but i stand resolute and my small family agree to the terms, now i just have to win this thing, but first

"Now team da rulez", i use a finger for every rule i speak about: "First Lyrica you can levitate only at ground level, never higher then my head and i hear that Latias can become invisible, no got it? Second None of you may use any moves to increase their respective speed or agility, only the base physical ability are allowed, and last but not last"

I lower my hand and speak with the most serious tone i can: "Everyone for himself, to team play, because among the other things, only the victor will get the prize, the other will have to find something else to do, like training, are the rules clear?"

They seems a little dissatisfied with the rules but accept nonetheless, i must solidify my position as their alpha if i want them to be ready to compete for the gym, and not for who get the turn in getting breed first: "Good team, let's start"

I hope that Sylvia is alright, but something tell me that she is.

"I guess you get the massage then" "Quilava quill!" you look at Lyrica "~She wants you to massage her~" she translated more than a little jealously "But I don't know how" "Quuiiillll" Pyrie murmered lustfully. "~She doesn't seem to care~"

You were about to reply when you were interrupted by Joy yelling for you from the center. "Hey Jaden get over here!" "We'll discuss this later" "Quil" sighing you jog over to where Joy was tapping her foot impatiently. "What's up?" "Well your pokemon is in perfect health. The uncomfortability was most likely caused by the excess energy in her system. She's almost ready to evolve." "Thats great. Can I see her." Sure she's in the back room, asleep.

Joy talk about Jaden role, then they speak about legendary in general
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I thanks Joy for her work, hoping that she is right and that Sylvia is just evolving, some doubts remain in my head and refuse to leave however, sure it's not unheard of that pokemon sometimes has trouble remaining at the threshold of evolving, a problem that is easily fixed by giving them the last push they need, but Sylvia was sick, i am sure of it, why? Make no sense.

I decide to drop it for now, and instead think on how i can help my partner evolve, the little push she need to achieve her next stage, a teenage years of sorts. Battling seems the most obvious choice, and the fastest too, but i want to maximize Sylvia capacity before evolving and that mean a very specific training, one that can enhance her psychic skill and possibly add some defense on her stat too.

While my thoughts are occupied by possible strategy and evolution theory (yes they practically force you to study it at school) my body reach the intended destination, the room where my Abra peacefully sleep, i hope

I slowly open the door, trying to make as less noise as possible and looking towards the bed, i spot my sleeping partner. While i observe her, the thoughts of her sickness forcefully return with vengeance, i try to quiet my mind in fear of awakening Sylvia, i am not sure if she can detect ideas and emotion even when asleep, but i don't want to take any chances.

Satisfied with my quick check, i withdraw in the corridor silently closing the door behind me.

With my back still on the door, i start to think to every possible cause of her sickness, but finding no plausible answer, i walk towards Joy once more set in getting some answer about Sylvia and about Pyrie, i want to know what she thinks about their condition, so to speak

Finding nurse Joy i relatively easy in a pokemon center, and is even easier when 2 pokemon are harassing her, although i think that some trainer would call that playing, probably

Opening the door on the main atrium, i find Nysa loosely wrapped around Joy, with her semi-screaming obscenities at her while Pyrie and Lyrica laugh their ass off, apparently Joy is scared of Big snakes like pokemon, or at least she is when they are coiling themselves around her, witch is perfectly understandable, if your job wasn't healing them of course

I watch the scene for a few more seconds, still undecided if i should just wait and laugh, or help the poor human out of the evil pokemon coils, in the end even if i am the first to not be happy about it, i decide to help her, if nothing else because i don't think that she will be particularly talkative in her condition, unless the talking is about an increasingly sophisticated way to insult what is practically a very big snake, sort of

I try to put on my most serious face, thankfully succeeding, and speak with a tone worthy of an alpha: "Enough Nysa, release her"

Nysa look at me and nod, uncoiling herself from joy and reaching my two other unruly member of my team, she set herself in a waiting pose, fixing her gaze on me

Joy quickly recover, still a little angry but noting serious: "Damn that oversized earthworm! I should..oh, hi Jaden, done already?"

I question part of her sanity more and more, or maybe she is just good at being oblivious? To everyone their talent i guess: "She is asleep, i didn't want to disturb her. Joy can we talk for a second, it's about the...treatment you suggested"

Joy: "I am sorry Jaden, but there are not much more to tell, your Quilava has been trained since hatched to become a slut, i think that she has her first orgasm a few minutes after her first real breath, and probably given head a few second later, there is no cure, it's too deep rooted in her psyche, that's for her having sex with her trainer is a sign of affection and love, she is addicted to it. I am sorry, for you but more importantly for her, there is nothing i nor anyone else can do"

This is not the only argument i want to speak about, but it's definitely one of them: "Nothing? I mean, really nothing but.."

She reply firmly: "Yes, nothing but having sex with her, i am confident that with time she will be a little less demanding, but expect her to ask and in some cases even demand that kind of attention. Forcefully if denied too often"

"Forcefully? Like trying to rape me or something?!"

She shake her head: "No, she has been trained to be passive, a submitting creature to her old trainer desire, but she can and will try to arouse you, even in public if she is not..fixed, also she may try to present or even beg for your attention, do not underestimate her seduction capabilities Jaden, i bet that she has more experience in arousing a male that most woman in this city have, yes it's a little depressing i know, but it's probably so"

I am a little taken back from her spontaneous confession: "So you basically given me a needy whore that know only to fuck everything that has a cock?"

Joy look at me with a stern expression: "No Jaden, i give you a beautiful pokemon that has quite the combat record if the database tag are exact, and usually are, a pokemon that will require the love of a family and most importantly, the affection of her trainer, both physical and emotional. In simpler terms, love her as family, but forgive me the term, use her as your personal cum dumpster, because if you do not" Joy lift her right index to give more strength to her reasoning "she may go crazy with lust and do something both stupid and harmful to herself, believing that the most important being in her life, you from now on, do not love nor need her. It's what we call depression Jaden, and i think that you know what it can do to a person, or a pokemon in this case" She lower her hand, having told me everything she has to

I recover from my stupor: "So i basically have free reign over her?"

Joy expression change to the same that a mother have when she tell her children something it should already knew about, something obvious: "Jaden, i do not think you have realized yet, but i have given you an abused pokemon, something that is usually done only to the most trusted and clean recorded trainer, usually, i have already registered your name and id in the database as one, you can basically do whatever you want with your pokemon and getting out clean. Normally if a trainer bring in a pokemon covered in semen we Joy do what i have done to your Quilava old trainer, keep her for more in depth exam and then if positive, remove her from it's care."

Joy continue: "Now Jaden, if You bring your Quilava, or even your Abra dripping semen from their ass, the Joy there know that there is a reason and just clean up the mess keeping her mouth shut about it, maybe even asking what you wish for launch"

What in the hell...what..no..can't be

Joy: "From now on Jaden, you are an elite trainer, get yourself used to it"

No..you can't do this.."Why Joy, what in the deepest pit of tartarus"

Joy: "I am old Jaden, i look young but i am not, in my long career i have gained the full trust of many professors and league champion with my more..active work, outside this center, i knew about Team Shadow Jaden, the rejuvenator was a test, i also knew about Zekrom presence in the Smiling Forest, we are watching the legendary closely for good reasons, i have read the report on how quickly She befriended you, helping you in your short quest, how she...exposed herself to you, perhaps it was merely a joke, but i never saw a legendary do that Jaden, ever"

Joy continue over my complete silence: "Legendary don't trust easily, but she trusted you for some reason, and i believe i know why, there is no special power in you Jaden no universe breaking energy that you can manipulate or anything, it's just, you"

After another short pause: "So yes Jaden, you. Consider yourself recruited, with the good and bad that will come from it, for some reason i trust you Jaden, there is something in you that make me..believe that you will succeed where other have miserably failed

Then with a singing tone: "Don't delude us Jaden"

Fuck. It. All. Period.

I pass my hands through my hair, frustrated with these events, now they may give me mission to accomplish, i will never truly be free...but perhaps i was never so, merely an illusion

Joy: "Don't worry Jaden, your mission is the very same reason you started this career even if you didn't knew about it then, stopping Team Shadow at all cost, i am sure that by now you are aware of their involvement in the catastrophe that changed the world forever, a disaster of immense proportion, that has reshaped what so little time ago we called Sinnoh and a few other isles of course"

With a resigned tone i reply: "Of course. So, cum dumpster eh?"

Joy with an happier tone: "Well, not exactly, but you got the meaning did you not? Fuck her silly Jaden, there are no other way"

"Joy a question, well beside all of this mess about being elite and all, it's all so..crazy, why Sylvia has gotten sick over her evolution?"

Joy look pensive, then: "I have theory, but you aren't ready for it yet, don't worry, everything is alright"

A SpyJoy tell me that everything is alright, of course, how can not be?

Joy returns to her desk leaving you to your thoughts. Initially they revolve around the situation with Pyrie. “I guess there’s nothing for it but to listen to Joy.” Your thoughts soon turn to Sylvia, “I know she loves me how will she take that?” several possibilities run through your mind, none of them good.

You shake the thoughts from your mind and decide to focus on the upcoming gym battle. Against a grass type gym Pyrie seems the natural choice, but Lyrica might also be effective. “Sylvia isn’t in the best of health, so she should rest. ”You talk to yourself as you look for your other Pokémon. You see them basking in the sun outside of the center, and walk over to them.

“~Jaden!~” Lyrica flies over and hugs you tightly. She is followed by Pyrie and Nysa. The combined weight of the pokemon forces you to the ground, where you are showered by kisses. “Okay okay enough!” you laugh. “C’mon we’ve got training to do.” “~Training? For what?~” “For the gym, if we expect to win we have to be in top form!” you wriggle out of the pile and get to your feet, striking a dramatic pose. “Its time to get serious”

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
You know that ignoring the problem won't solve the issue between your team member, also leaving Sylvia out of training can only complicate things in the future, especially if Lyrica try anything now that her main rival is absent

My eyes fall on Lyrica levitating a few centimeters away from my face, she seems nervous about something, her fiddling with her claw-like fingers betray her emotional state providing me all the information i need about her actual condition, or more specifically, what she is thinking about, i may not be psychic but guessing that she is mulling about her chances now that Sylvia is temporary out of play doesn't require such skill. Not even the time to think about possible solutions, that the now familiar feeling of a swarm of ants crawling in my head warn me that the Latias in question is about to make her move

Lyrica: "Jaden can....can we talk about..us?"

Well at least she is has manners, glad to see that my next would be mate try to make me feel comfortable at least, i must clarify this situation now before it escalate into something unpleasant, i don't want to deal with my team being heartbroken, nor i wish to transform it into a slut caravan of sorts

I look straight into her eyes, the amber colored iris soft glow is easily recognizable even on full daylight: "Lyrica i know that you wish for a chance at being my partner, but we can't discuss this now, not without Sylvia anyway, also i think that maybe you idea of me is a little...discordant with reality so to speak"

Lyrica look confused: "Dis-cordant? You mean incorrect? But i have saw your memories and...ahhhhhhh...ops?" What?!

I try to repress my anger, why every psychic in my team first and foremost idea of communicating is by snooping in my memories?! Why they can't just...damn it

Lyrica appear scared and nervous now, her inexperience in dealing with strong emotion drive her to overreacting, screaming in my head: "SORRY! JADEN PLEASE DON'T HATE ME! PLEASE!"

My head! My fricking head! I feel like on the verge of exploding! "Lyrica! Stop it i can't, argh"

Pain, that's the only thing i can think about, every nerves in my brain is on fire! I can feel my hands pressing on the scalp in a vain attempt to protect my mind from something that can't even be touched. The pain slowly lessen, and the feeling of my body return to me; i find myself kneeling on the ground, with hands on both sides of my head, eyes closed.

After nearly a minute, i think, of what i can only describe as a vibration of sorts, cease, leaving me able to think clearly once more. What was that? Did Sylvia overloaded my senses with her psychic energy? Damn i feel sorry for whatever bugger will face her wrath in the future. Maybe i should remove her from the team...nah that's a stupid idea, is not that a Flamethrower from Pyrie or an HydroPump from Nysa will be any less painful, probably. Why i can't feel my body weight anyway?

I hear a distant male voice calling me, more like a whisper..i know this voice....

Jaden....Jaden...Jaden

The voice gradually become more clear, and finally i recognize it's possessor, father

I open my eyes, why everything is so black? As soon as i remembered his face, he appear a few meters from me, i see him! It's dad!

"Dad! H.....how..you are"

He is dressed with the lab coat i usually saw him wear at work, he is just as i remember him. Then he softly speak

"Jaden i am here, it's everything alright, the pain will pass soon, don't stop trying just because you failed once, perseverance is one of the key to success"

That phrase, he said exactly the same thing the first time i fallen from my bicycle, he encouraged me to continue, despite my reluctance to continue

Father then come closer and putting an hand on my shoulder: "Jaden i believe in you, i will always believe in you, never give up your dreams"

I feel his hand leaving, i look as his form become smaller and smaller

"Dad! Wait! Please come back! Dad!"

A distant female voice is calling for me, Joy?

"Jaden..Jaden, come on Jaden wake up!"

The ethereal blackness vanish replaced by the feeling of my body lying on something soft, the noise of machinery and....cold? Why it's sol cold here?

I feel the weight of my body again, my eyelids open revealing a blinding light just over my head

"Damn it Joy, shut that thing!"

Joy: "Jaden! Finally i was worried that..."

"What?" My eyes finally focus, i recognize the emergency room of the pokecenter, Joy look afraid for a moment but she change expression before i can ask

Joy: "About what? How are you feeling Jaden? You seems spaced out a little"

I look at joy with an unamused expressio, i may be confused, but i am not a fool, what she was worried about?

"What happened Joy? I mean what really happened, i was...in a limbo of sorts"

Joy expression become serious, and after sighing she reluctantly reply: "Well Jaden, you see..just before starting to train your team, Latias has inadvertently overstimulated your cortex, short circuiting your higher brain functions, i think that the limbo you are referring to was your subconscious, but i cannot say it for sure"

Wat? You mean..

"I was in a coma?"

Joy shake her head: "Not really, your brain must have pushed you down in the deepest part of your mind for safeguarding your consciousness, to prevent any possible damage. I have double verified all your nervous function with the scanner and your brain seems intact, merely a little shaken from the experience, just like you"

So i have..dreamed about father? Seems....plausible

Joy with a worried tone: "Jaden are you alright?" She must have noticed

"Yes joy, thanks"

Joy: "It's not uncommon to experience various kind of hallucination during such a state, some patients even told me to have saw his own infancy play before him. Don't hesitate if you need anything, alright?"

She know uh? "Alright"

Joy: "Your team is just outside, they refused to leave obviously, Latias seems particularly depressed and Abra nearly smashed a whole row of the waiting chairs on her"

"She was that pissed?"

Joy: "Well, the chairs Were kinda bolted on the floor, i underline were. Don't worry, i will justify the damage as the usual excuse of ^rampaging pokemon got free^ or something"

Ok..wait, usual? How many times..ha, forget it

A voice i recognize as Sylvia enter my head, strangely it doesn't bother me this time: "Jaden, you awake! How do you feel?"

Sylvia tone is strange, more mature, doesn't stutter anymore, unconsciously i reply mentally: "I am ok Sylvia, say so to the others as well please, i don't want to repeat myself other 3 times"

Sylvia: "Jaden? Since you speak by mind?"

I confused, reply mentally again: "What are you..wait, what?"

Lyrica: "J..Jaden? Is that you? I didn't know you were telepathic"

Neither did i, oh shit

"Joy..help?"

Joy: "What is it Jaden, you whitened all the sudden"

A modified explanation of the events transpired with Latias later


Joy: "I see, i don't think that you had become a psychic Jaden, however the shock that Latias accidentally unleashed on your brain may created a limited connection between you and her, Abra also. I think that the residual energy still on your brain must have given you some limited psychic skills, It has happened before, they will probably vanish in a few hours"

"So i will return normal soon?"

Joy: "Yes, just so"

"Thanks Joy, see you"

Me and the team leave the center, we have lost nearly 3 hors of training, and i have intention of recovering for the lost time.

After a few minutes of walking, we reach a clearing not far from the center that just border the Smiling Forest: "Alright, for this match all of you will be in the rooster, hopefully none will go berserk about having Latias in the team. It's a grass gym so expect strategy specifically developed to counter Fire and Ice type moves, Psychic is also quite effective against grass, but i don't think that they will have an effective counter for that so, Sylvia and Lyrica, you both are our primary offensive, followed by Nysa and Pyrie of course, the gym leader may ask for a double battle especially after he/she will see you Lyrica, if that happen the team will be as just said, all clear?"

The whole team nod: "Good, let's start with scanning your move-set, you know the drill, in position girls the analyzer can't read your moves otherwise"

The scan take a few minutes with the following result: "Alright team, as you know the pokegear can't read your specific power level, no device can yet do so, but it seems that you all have combat experience, and that Pyrie is close to evolving. Sylvia your evolution is literally there, just a small push, i expect you evolving during our match, let's use this as our advantage, and Sylvia, please forgive her, you must work with Lyrica for this gym and in the future, holding grudges help none, least of all us"

Sylvia seems to think about this, and reluctantly nod.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Begin training...you wish

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
You stand in front of the large greenhouse that appears to be the gym. “Well this is it” you turn to your team, who are waiting expectantly behind you. “Are you ready for our first gym battle?” receiving enthusiastic cries from each of them you turn and march into the building.

Upon entering you are greeted by the sight of a clerk at a desk. “We’d like to battle the leader.” Without even looking up he pointed to a hallway at the left. “challengers go through there” the hallway lead to a large double door. “Here we go” you push through the door unsure of what might appear.

You are blinded by light as you open the door. “Well, well, well,” a voice emanates, “A challenger, good I was just getting bored.” Your eyes gradually adjusting to the light you can tell that you are in a large room, made almost entirely out of glass. “Welcome to my gym, I am Mirabelle and who, might I ask, are you?”

“I’m Jaden” you look around searching for the source of Mirabelle’s’ voice. “Well Jaden, I hope you can give me a good battle!” Seemingly out of nowhere a woman appears before you. She has long brown hair, brown eyes, and is wearing a green dress.

“Let the battle begin!” she cries with exuberance jogging to the other side of the room she yells for a referee, to your surprise it’s the desk man from earlier.

“This will be a regular match, no special restrictions. The match is over when either side can no longer battle.” Raising a flag in one hand he gestures to you “challenger has the first move.” You turn to your pokemon.

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Alright, she is probably expecting a fire or a flying type as an opening move, she has probably also has a strategy prepared against poison and ice attack but i believe that Nysa with her aggressive approach should be quite the steamroller here

"Nysa, come out!" I grip Nysa ball and launch it on the evidently well maintained battlefield, in fact despite being covered in grass with a small water pond a few meter on on my left there, there are no burning sign anywhere; why this pond is so close...wait, she want to flank me later using this small body of water? Such cheap tactics...

Nysa materialize in front of me, releasing her species signature cry and falling in her personal combat stance, more pronounced and aggressive as per her personality

Even from here i can see Nysa glare at Mirabelle taunting her like a Liepard ready to pounce on a Rattata, and curiously Mirabelle seems disturbed by her behavior

Mirabelle: "Why your Milotic is so hostile towards me? I didn't offend her or anything.."

Frankly the gym leader statement make me reevaluate her skill level, she may just be feigning ignorance of course, but a veteran trainer should has lost counts on how many glares he/she has received from pokemon/trainer by now

"Don't worry, when fighting she is always very..driven, no matter what she face"

Mirabelle relieved: "Ah, ok" Her recover is immediate returning to look confident and ready for anything. Smiling she say: "I have never faced a pokemon so openly aggressive before, she seems quite strong"

Mirabelle grip a ball on her belt, i then notice that she too has only 4 ball with her: "My Turn! Come out Meg!"

As she throw her ball on the field, the pokemon contained within get released. The ^materialization^ process take longer then it should, curious, want to ask her why is so later
The process completed a few seconds after reveal a perfectly healthy Bayleef ready to battle

"Bay!" The pokemon look at Nysa before turning her eyes towards me, the smile on it's face deepen before turning to Milotic once again

Mirabelle: "Ready girl?"

Bayleef nod: "Bay!"

Mirabelle: "Let's do this! Meg start with Flash!"

An aggressive tactics from a Grass gym leader? As expected she want to compensate Grass type lack of offensive capabilities with their extensive debuffing arsenal, but flash?

"Bayyy!" I close my eyes as the intense bluish light start to cover the battlefield, unexpectedly Mirabelle order another attack while the first is still incomplete: "Meg, Body Slam now!"

Even if still blinded by the light i can hear Bayleef charging towards us: "Nysa aim at the light and use Scald!"

Releasing the rest of your team, you continue walking towards the shops, where you hope to get treat for your team. “You girls did a great job at the gym. Let’s celebrate!” you immediately find yourself flat on your back and covered by your Pokémon, some of whom seem to be feeling rather frisky.

Cheers all around, followed by hugs. You stroll around the shops for a couple hours, before heading back to the Pokémon center for lunch. Standing in front of the center is a man about twenty years old. “Are you the trainer who almost destroyed the gym?”

“Uh yeah I guess that’s me” “Battle me, now” “No” you walk around him into the building only to have Joy almost fall on top of you. “Yikes Joy chill out.” “Oh Jaden it’s you, I heard about the gym. Are you alright?” “Yeah we’re all fine, the girls did fantastic” you start to leave when an after-thought hits you.

“Hey Joy if anyone comes looking for a battle could you throw them off my trail?” Smiling knowingly she assured you she would. Thanking her you return to your room with your Pokémon in tow. You feel something fumbling with your belt “H-hey what’re you” you are silenced by another kiss. ”I love you Jaden, this is what I want”

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Clearing your mind, you let the water soothe your body for a moment before you shut it off. Pulling on all your clothes, you exit the bathroom. Nysa was sitting right outside the door waiting for you. She immediately wraps you in her coils before trying to shove her tongue down your throat.

Tapping the back of her head urgently you almost pass out before she allows you to get some air. Gasping for breath “I don’t mind a kiss, but I do need to breathe” “Miloo” came the apologetic cry. You give her a hug and a short kiss, before you hear knocking at the door. You open the door to see Santiago standing there with a woman you didn’t recognize.

Santiago: “Jaden, this is Adrianna. She is the Gym leader.” Brown shoulder length hair framed a kind smile and brown eyes “Ah, Hello, I’m really sorry about the gym”

“It’s perfectly alright, Mirabelle went too far. She has been fired by the way. Now I would like to see the Kadabra who nearly lifted an entire building by herself.”

“Um sure, Hey Sylvia!” “Yes Jaden?” “There’s someone here who wants to meet you” she opens the bedroom door and floats out to your side. “Sylvia, this is Adrianna, the leader of the gym we battled the other day.” “Hello” “Hello, Sylvia was it? After I heard what happened I had to meet you” “She hurt Jaden. I won’t allow anyone to hurt my love” “Your love, ah I see”

“I –I can explain, you see-” “No, no need to explain. If you think I’d be disgusted or something, then you really have no idea how common this really is. I would say about a quarter of the trainers in the world have intimate relationships with their Pokémon. Me included.”

“Really? You too?” you look to Santiago who nods in affirmation.

Checking her watch “Well it was a pleasure to meet you but I have to go supervise the repairs on my gym. Good luck in all of your…endeavors” she said with a smirk. “Goodbye” you wave weakly.

“Damn, this is more complicated than I thought.”

Yes what is important all right, like a bunch of hormone pills or something.

Joy was helpful once again and given me some standard food ration for me and a bag full of chow for my team, not that they would eat the thing gladly but..

Also her answer about an hint in keeping my team in control was: "Make them understand who is the Alpha Jaden, as a trainer they must respect your leadership and decision about anything you may come across, both for the good and the bad situation you will probably find yourself in; yes Jaden i have said bad, knowing your objective and the meddling in TS plan, expect trouble along the way, not now of course, later when the troubles you will inevitable cause them will start to annoy their leader enough to take notice"

She then continued with the most clichéd phrase ever: "You are the Alpha of the team Jaden, make them respect you by whenever means necessary, within reason of course, they must respect not fear you, it's counterproductive in the end i assure you"

Is counterproductive a metaphor for ^fucked up?^, because if it is, it's already too late

Nonetheless, i close my backpack and remind myself once again to not take things too seriously, then i tell my team to remain here while i go to speak with Joy about a last thing before departure, something that has bothered me since the beginning of this adventure of sort

My walk is short and devoid of anything notable, until i reach the lobby where Joy speak with trainers and sometimes pokemon alike, scary i know
As soon as i enter the room, a Salamence look towards me curious, it's stare is not cold or threatening in any manner, seems more bored if anything

Deciding to apply the hints given me by Joy, i walk fearlessly towards the big pokemon and use my right hand to touch it's snout: "Hello, you look at least bored as me, would you like a friendly match?"

I admit my request is a little strange, and the Salamence expression reflect it's bewilderment, but it quickly pass and the big pokemon smile at me, the eyes reflect interest now, maybe Joy was right

Then to my surprise, the dragon pokemon move it's head down inviting me to caress it while a big smile appear on its muzzle

A female voice make us both towards it's source, a girls not much older than me speak to what is clearly her charge: "Sally? You are not importuning the young trainer are you? What i told you about.....scaring? other..trainers?"

Girl? Why i Always find female poke, It's a curse or something?

The girl speak again, coming closer to me with her ready for a cordial presentation: "Hi, I'm Rubica and this big loaf here is Sally"

Sally calmly sbuff evidently disapproving of her adjective, probably this isn't the first time she has been called so

I reply to the formal gesture with my own as consuetude : "Jaden, a pleasure"

Rubica look at Sally: "I never seen her so friendly before, usually i have to force her to not scare people away, but you, wow, Never happened before"

I reply strangely happy: "Why she just seemed bored out of her mind, so i asked if she wanted a friendly match that's all"

Rubica keep her manner, but i can read a slight confusion on her face: "You asked her? Shouldn't you ask the trainer for that kind of thing?"

I smile: "Compelling a pokemon to fight it's like trying to make a river flow on reverse, even if you succeed in the end you just messed up things, so why not ask her first?"

Rubica seems a little confused at my reasoning but find nothing to counter with so she just nod

I remove my hand from the affection seeking Sally: "Sorry girl, but i have a few preparation to make"

Sally look unhappy and try to make a pout face, with hilarious result, that i keep to myself

I still smiling: "Sure, on next then, farewell Rubica, and farewell to you too Sally"

Sally grin as she follow her trainer towards the door, and just as she pass through the automatic doors, she lover her front paw and lift her big tail, giving me an unobstructed view of her glistening sex, she keep her pose for at least 10 seconds i think looking at me over over her wings, then recover her normal stance and walk out

WTF?!!!!

Joy with a teasing tone: "My my Jaden, another victim of your charm"

I turn towards joy, pissed: "What da facq?! Joy why this is happening to me?!"

Joy smiling like a fool: "Jaden, you should have done your homework, and also stop thinking of yourself as Casanova, really it's not that"

"Then what!? What home-"

I calm myself then gently ask between my gritted teeth: "What should i have know, exactly?"

Joy: "Salamence are dragon pokemon Jaden, well dragon/flying but..anyway, big pokemon and usually dragon type in general like bold mates, someone who is not afraid of them and that they can feel worthy of themselves....did you shower after..you know"

I reply confused: "Yes Joy, i did why-- OH SHIT!"

Joy: "Why yes, pokemon pheromones are not so easily removed, you l' need a strong scented balsam or some kind of oil to remove the scent, you may also wait a few days of course. A dragon can judge a mate worthy if she smell the scent of another dragon on her ^candidate^ so to speak, a sort of implicit trust between them, that kind of thing. Now isn't Lyrica, your Latias, a dragon type too?"

Fuck my life

"Did...did you have some.."

Joy barely keeping her laugh: "Yes..let me...check in..the..bwahahahahahaha!"

Oh man, why me?

After taking another shower with the special balsam Joy insisted that you keep. You finally get on your way. Nothing really interesting happened most of the day, just walking and looking at the scenery.

When you were about to set up camp however, a large explosion rocked the ground.

“What the fuck?” a look into the sky reveals a plume of smoke. “C’mon let’s check it out!” you exit the trees to see Rubica unconscious on the ground and an injured Sally protecting her. The opponent, a very angry looking Aggron, glared menacingly in your direction.

The glare only intensified as your Pokémon emerged from the trees behind you to form a protective wall.

“Sylvia can you get those two out of here?” “Of course Jaden” she disappears and reappears next to the downed human before vanishing again, taking Rubica with her. Repeating the process with Sally, Sylvia teleports back to you.

“Let’s get rid of him. Pyrie, Dig and then flame wheel, full power. Nysa follow her attack with a hydro pump, then Sylvia, Lyrica both of you use Psychic at the same time, if that doesn’t work we’ll go from there.”

You are secretly surprised by how fast you were able to come up with that attack plan. Your Pokémon execute the plan perfectly, Pyrie explodes from the ground in a spinning ball of flames, colliding with the steel type, and staggering it backwards. It regains its balance it time to see the pressurized blast of water slam into its face.

Extremely dizzy, the Aggron stumbles around for a moment. Directly in front of you Sylvia and Lyrica's eyes glow green and blue respectively. Aggron is surrounded by a nimbus of green and blue energy and floats into the air before being brutally slammed into the ground.

When the dust cleared, you could see that the Aggron was out cold.

“Hahaha, you all were fantastic he didn’t stand a chance! Sylvia where did you take them?” “Back to where we were going to set up camp” “alright lets go” you jog back to see Sally laying down next to Rubica.

“Salamence” sally stands and greets you. Somewhat unsteadily she walks over to you, and in a shocking display of affection, forced her tongue into your mouth. It lasted only for a second before she pulled away and pushed you towards Rubica, who was still lying prone on the ground.

You gently roll her onto her back and check for injuries. Deciding that she was merely sleeping at this point. You stand and explain it to Sally before setting up your tent, which conveniently, was made for a trainer and several Pokémon.

With the help of your Pokémon it was up in a matter of minutes. “I’m gonna put Rubica in here, I’ll just sleep outside.” You lay Rubica on the sleeping mat, and exit the tent to see a large fire already lit. You sit down and are immediately surrounded, which you expected, but to your surprise Sally joins the group, sidling up to you and laying down.

“Wow you’re really friendly aren’t you?” you pet her head “Sala, sal, mence Salamence” she mumbles towards your Pokémon. You kept track of their various responses, as they continued the conversation in a way you couldn’t understand.

Speaking in their various tongues, the conversation was short but appeared to intrigue your team.

“What’s going on?” “Jaden we would like to sleep in our pokeballs tonight” Sylvia said in your head. You were surprised to say the least. “Um okay, if you want to” you remove the pokeballs from your belt and recall the girls back into their respective Pokeballs.

Almost immediately Sally wraps herself around you and plants a kiss on your lips. Stunned you fall backwards, and let her continue.

Suddenly you see the reason for your teams’ odd behavior. They had decided to allow Sally a shot at you. You decided to talk with them later, but for now you had more pressing concerns.

While you had been thinking you had been subconsciously kissing Sally back. You realized you couldn’t back out of this now, so you decided to make the best of it.

When she bucks her hips it occurs to you that you are getting a good deal of experience in this area. Adding another finger you speed up your movements until she stands up, turns around, and presents you with her badly leaking vent.

Removing your pants, you stand behind her and align yourself with her entrance. You lean forward until you feel your tip pressing into her heated vent. Pressing forward you slowly penetrate and push until you are fully inside her.

You hold that position for a moment, until Sally grinds against you. At her behest you pull almost all of the way out and push back in slowly, eliciting a pleasured groan. You continue, slowly increasing your speed, until you are moving at full speed and Sally is rocking back with each thrust. You feel yourself getting close, and the random spastic clenching of her walls suggests that Sally is close as well.


A few more pumps before you slam into her as hard as you can and release your seed deep inside her. The feel of your essence inside her sent Sally over the edge as well, her juices spilling out around your softening member.

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Remembering your nudity, you quickly retrieve a pair of shorts from your bag. Now half-dressed you release the rest of your Pokémon and begin making breakfast.

Breakfast was a simple affair, eggs for you and Rubica, special Pokémon food for the Pokémon.

After a few minutes Rubica breaks the ice. “So in your experience how common would you say this sort of relationship between a Pokémon and a human is?”

“Honestly I was shocked when my Pokémon began to make advances. I hadn’t even considered it. But then I met a guy who was able to guess what was going on and helped settle my thoughts. He told me that it was far more common than I would think.”

Rubica: “So it’s not unusual?” “No I really don’t think so” you finished your eggs and washed the plate in a small creek. “So have you, um ‘mated’ all your Pokémon” looking over your shoulder at her you simply answer “no” and then mumble under your breath “but it won’t be long now”

Drying the plate you attempt to grab your backpack only to have it float out of your reach.

“C’mon put it down.”

Giggling madly Sylvia shakes her head. “Please?”

To your surprise she sets it down without any more difficulty. “Thank you” you grab the bag and give her a hug, which is immediately joined by all the Pokémon, including Sally.

Rubica: ”Wait what about Sally? She’s obviously attached to you, and aren’t you mates now?” “Well I guess so, but let’s not deal with this until we have to, where were you going?” “We were headed towards New Snowpoint.” “Ah good we have some…business there” “Business? Like what?” “It doesn’t matter”

Your watch reveals that it is already noon “Crap we should have been gone hours ago!” you quickly take down the tent and shove it in your bag. “C’mon we should go”
