Suiting up and cleaning up the camp don't take more than a few minutes, especially thanks to Sylvia and Lyrica multitasking capabilities, after all they don't need to touch things to move them and only mass seems to be a factor with psychic powers not the actual weight, practical i say

Our travels start in a good mood despite Rubica awkwardness with the situation, i can't blame her really, if someone would have told me that my future pokemon wanted to mate with me, well, i would have laughed in his face, or counseled him/her to see a good psychologist. Now i must admit that having a Salamence presenting is far more arousing that i should have thought possible, especially after having ^sampled^ the love of a Kadabra and a Latias eager insides.

No i won't add a Quilava to the list, i still don't know if she will ever be able to feel something different from lust for me, i don't blame her of course, but that doesn't change things between us, the problem remain

After having recalled our team Rubica and i entrain ourselves with a light conversation about our experience as trainers so far, in the middle of it we discuss how in our respective personal opinion some famous trainer skills are far too overrated in the pokenon league, proving how a good sponsor can be an important assets in a high ranking competition, nearly as much as a good team in some region; Or at least it was before the catastrophe, personally i think that in the end something good has come out of it, despite the damage and loss it caused

Rubica smirking happily: "So you really believe that? A pokemon fighting capabilities may be enhanced by what? Love?"

"Well, yes, at least to a point"

Rubica more serious but still smirking: "And lust? What role it play in a pokemon match?"

Such a previdible question, simple to answer too:"Ever heard of Attract?"

Rubica smile diminish: "But...ah, ok you have right, i suppose that emotion like love and lust does play a role in a fight"

She come close and whisper the next question: "You think it really possible for a human to...love a pokemon? I mean Really Love, you know like a girlfriend or something"

If she only knew Sylvia father...: "I think so, they don't lack..well at least some of them, anything that a human woman can't give you, maybe even a little more"

Rubica seems taken back with the last part of my answer, recovering her normal tone: "More? But..they can't even speak! Or..or...give you a family..cook"

Not sure about cooking buuuut..: "Perhaps you vision about our close companions are a little too biased right now, as i have told you relationship like the one i share with my team are not that uncommon, i admit some trainers care only about having a hole to stuff themselves into, or an hard pole to ride, but you can't seriously believe that all of..us, want just that"

Did i rally just say us?

Rubica: "Hard pole?"

"Did you seriously believe that there aren't any girls in our little club? Yeah sure"

Rubica think about it for a moment before nodding: "I suppose..that there are some, i mean it make sense" That it does

Rubica tone suddenly become playful: "Ever done it with a human before?"

I don't like where this is going: "What about it?"

Rubica: "You just told me that a female pokemon can give you anything a human woman can, but did you ever had an..experience you can compare it with?"

Well..no, and i have no intention to try right now, i don't think that my mates will appreciate the idea anyway

"...No but i don't think it matter, does it?"

Rubica: "Maybe, not that i am proposing, just curious really"

Hmmmmm, not sure if believe her or not but, nah, i have more important things to focus on: "So whats your plan for the future then? Contest? A tournament or two?"

Rubica: "I want to face the gym there, after that it depend i guess"

"Want to face the gym leader just with Sally?"

Rubica shake her head: "Nope, we where just try to improve our bond Sally and i, we had a few disagreement about a few things soo, i thought that maybe with just the two of us we could have..well done something about it"

Something? Well at least she care

"I see, it has perchance anything to do with breeding?"

Rubica sigh: "...Yes, i just wanted....i just wanted to give the best possible partner i could thought of but...it didn't end as well as i have hoped"

"How badly?"

Rubica: "Let's just say that a certain Dragonair won't be in any condition to perform his job for a while"

I flinch a little: "That bad, ouch"

Rubica smile: "The breeder assured me that the damage is not permanent and that it's not the first time that particular Dragonair has given such problems, so i guess that he must not be the gentlemon i wanted for Sally"

Gentlemon huh? Dosen't seems much of a cuddler to me last night, nor this morning, but maybe she was just frustrated and wanted relief, i think

"Your other pokemon can't reproduce with Sally?"

Rubica: "No of 4 none of them are compatible, and only 2 of them are male anyway"

"A team of five then?"

Rubica nod: "I will present them later at the center if you wish, now may i ask how did you do it? How did you seduce Sally into becoming your mate?"

Here we go, maybe i should tweak the story a little, for my sake: "As you know i have a close bond with my team"

Rubica Smiling mischievously: "Very Close"

Not funny: "Haha, anyway the day i met Sally was the day i added Lyrica to my...hmm, inner circle"

Rubica: "Ooooh, so?"

"You know that Lyrica is a Latias right?" She nod: "And that Latias are Dragon type?" She nod again

It seems that i am not the only one unaware of dragons type habits, it's sort of comforting in a twisted and evil way: "Well dragon types may judge a possible candidate worthy in case the pheromones of another dragon type pokemon is on them, and it also seems that having a shower is not enough to remove the scent of intimate activities, a knowledge i got from a very amused nurse after our brief encounter last day"

Rubica eyes widen: "So in a sense your Latias is responsible for all of this?"

"No not really, after you left Sally did...expose herself to me and she was quite interested to say the least, was she just got out from that Dragonair advance maybe?"

Rubica: "Yes wh-oh, you think that he aroused her and then.."

"Seems plausible, however i still don't think that the scent and her frustration alone are the only cause, why she did considered a human as a potential mate?"

Rubica shrug: "No idea, maybe she saw it somewhere? I got her from a breeder as a Bagon just before becoming a trainer, can it be that there.."

"I don't have much experience with pokemon breeding-"

Rubica laugh: "Really, i thought you was an expert by now!"

I ignore her witty comments: "I can tell you however that it was them who a explicitly asked to mate, with what i know now i would find strange if such things won't happen there, for time to time"

Rubica: "Pokemon specifically asking a human to mate them? But why?"

"Maybe they merely wish for something more exotic? Or maybe just a good session without worrying about consequences, after all human and poke can't reproduce"

Well, most of the time

Rubica: "I suppose, what you really want to do there anyway? You didn't tell me"

And i won't tell you now either: "Something that i cannot avoid, nor i want to"

The last part of my phrase come out a little more menacing that i wanted to, Rubica look pensive, then: "Did you have the time to attend my match?"

"Maybe, if i have the time i will gladly do so"

----------------------------------


The rest of the day hold no surprise to us, beside a few battles against a few wild pokemon we met on the way. Based on the map in the pokegear we should be able to reach the Aeterna Caves tomorrow, which may be a good thing or not given that not much is know about the pokemon living in the least traveled path, a mix between what remained the old Mt.Coronet (now what remain is permanently enveloped in a tick mist) caves and the new excavation done in a attempt to restore the old path after the ^Event^. During the excavation many new natural passage was uncovered, some even reach what is now the southeastern side of the continent!

That southeastern region was originally known as Kanto and Johto, not sure how much remain tough, they has been hit pretty hard i hear, anyway maybe i will go even further north after the lake problems has been solved, what was once called Unova, something tell me that there i will find some answer about father work

I sigh knowing that probably Joy and her mysterious superpy team, will found something else for me to do before i get the chance to explore those region, perhaps i won't need to

Much of what i will do depend on what or if, i uncover something when i reach our destination.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: A long talk, tomorrow in a mist?

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
The tunnel through the mountain was pitch-black, your flashlights providing the only illumination.

“Damn this fog, I can’t see anything” you growled as you kicked a rock for the eighth time.

Rubica: “It’s really creepy. I feel like were being watched.” “Well,” you reply “it’s not out of the question, there probably are some Pokémon watching us.” “That’s not helping!” she cried

Laughing a little you press on, staying close to the wall so as not to get lost. The deeper you go the thicker the fog gets, almost to the point where you couldn’t even see Rubica right behind you.

Rubica: “Jaden, did you hear that?” “No, what was it?” Rubica: “I don’t know” you sigh and keep walking. You’ve only taken a couple steps when you hear something to your right. Turning quickly you shine your flashlight in the direction of the sound. Through the shifting fog you can see a figure approaching. As it gets closer you can make out white claws, black fur and red feather-like protrusions on its head.

“It’s a Sneasel” you mumble to yourself. “Ice and dark type...Weak to fire…Male from the length of the feathers.” You reach for Pyrie’s pokeball, but the Sneasel notices the motion and charges towards you.

“Sneasel!” you push Rubica out of the way and jump backward barely avoiding the slicing claws. Still in the air you pop open the pokeball containing Pyrie. With a flash of light and flame she appears on the cave floor, ready for a fight.

“Pyrie, flamethrower!” “Quiiill!” the flares on her back intensify. As she rears up on her back legs and blasts a stream of intense fire. The stream surrounds Sneasel in an instant, and as quickly as it happened it disappeared, leaving a badly burnt Sneasel kneeling on the ground.

Roughly, the Sneasel jerked to its feet, staggering unsteadily. ”Sneasel snea” it lurched towards Pyrie, who merely sidestepped, and fell on its face. “I can’t just leave it in this condition” you knelt next to the injured Pokémon. “Sneasel!!” a loud cry echoed around. You turn and behind you, you see a group of several Sneasel. “Snea Sneasel” one of them, apparently the leader, walked right up to you and began to wave its arms furiously. “Sneasel snea Sneasel!” it dropped its arms and glared at you seeming very irked.

Slowly you reached for Sylvia’s pokeball; the Sneasel tensed but didn’t attack. You release the latch and Sylvia appears beside you. “Hello Jaden” she purred “Where are we?” “Aeterna caves, could you please translate for me?” “Absolutely, my mate” she speaks to the Sneasel in her native tongue, before growing silent and listening to what the sneasel says.

“She says that you injured her mate, she challenges you to single combat. She says if you refuse she will kill the other human.” You whip around to see that Rubica was being held by two Sneasel you hadn’t noticed.

“I accept”
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Reach Aeterna Caves, exploring the depths

choices: Sylvia, despite being a psychic she should handle this nicely
Nysa, her moveset are the most indicate for this match
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Well now, quite the mess i find myself once more, granted last time it wasn't at claw point but..well ok it sort was

"What are the terms, you can't expect me to fight against you, did you?"

"Sneasel sel!"

Lyrica seems quite baffled by the answer: "It seems she was, doesn't she realize in what condition she really is? Attacking two trainer this way, out of the blue, if anything happen to Rubica Sally will make a fine side dish with her"

Despite her blatant way to expose the fact, i agree with Lyrica, this group of Sneasels must haven't thought about the consequences of their action, what if the trainer has a group of powerful pokemon with him/her? How did they hope to defeat an experienced team? By taking the trainer by surprise? And then what?

It seems that while pokemon aren't stupid creatures, some of them aren't exactly smart either: "Human have ways to make things run in their favor, but if you expect me to fight unharmed, the fight will be fought exclusively without powers or moves beside your claws of course, is that what you want?"

The Sneasel seems a little shocked, it seems that as i have expected they didn't plan this ^attack^ as well as they should have

Perhaps with a small push i can use their own nature against them, and get out of this sort of negotiation ahead: "What, isn't it obvious? Human don't directly involve themselves in pokemon fight, usually"

No, this is not the time to remember Nysa aggressive advances, focus: "If you wish to fight me, you must either renounce to your moves for the fight, or risk to fight me with a device you may or may not know, with all risk a jump in the unknown may bring, and before you threatening me with harming my companion know this-"

I make the more menacing voice and expression i can: "If something, anything happen to her, i will not consider myself responsible of what her Salamelance or my Lyrica here will do to you"

The whole group of our attacker start whispering between each other, they know that a pissed of dragon type can be pretty much uncontrollable in it's rage, is not by chance that a move is called Dragon Rage, i admit that i don't know if Sally is capable of using that particular move or even if she can learn Outrage, but they don't need to know that

It's not that Sally don't know other impressive moves anyway, probably at least

The female Sneasel that challenged me scream something and the rest of the group shut up immediately, her scream reverberate in the tunnel ahead of us, hopefully nothing big and angry will came out of the darkness thinking about dinner

Yeah right, with my luck a Sableye or worse a Tyranitar, is already on it way, and of course they will be female AND in heat. Ok enough pessimism

"Sneaseal snea se sneasel sne, sel!"

Lyrica: "She say that she is not afraid of you or your weapon, but out of honor she will allow a pokemon to fight in your place"

I get closer to Lyrica: "Honor?"

Lyrica smile, barely containing a laugh: "So she said, not that Sneasel has any, they are good, nimble fighter, but honor is just not their way"

A smirk appear on my lips: "A very honorable term, but what i get if I win then? An honorable fight must have a prize for those who prove the to be the strongest, don't you agree?"

The Sneasel nod, it's common among pokemon fighting for a prize, it's common even between human after all, of course if a trainer lose a fight usually the prize is just a small sum of Pokeron (sometimes more elegantly called credits) or something else of limited value like a TM, but in the wild things are different and fight can happen for pretty much anything as a prize

"I may be persuaded to part with some ration of food, or maybe a TM in case you may want to learn a move otherwise unobtainable without training, think about it, a move no other Sneasel can ever learn on it's own would give you quite the advantage in battle. In exchange i merely ask....mmmmh, let's say the precious things you have and free passage in these caves"

The female look at me suspiciously and i can understand her, but nutritious food is a rare commodity in the wild, for free at least, and is known that most wild pokemon know what a TM is, perhaps some released pokemon in the past have spread word

As for the most precious things? Well it was the first ting it came on my mind at the moment and simply asking to go free may have left the group suspicious about my intentions, freedom is always the prize of the strongest after all, but i would like to avoid fighting the whole group over a failed blackmail attempt, the noise will probably attract something far more dangerous than a group of Sneasel and frankly i have enough of these caves already, hopefully i won't need to use these caves for awhile

A long while

The female watch me intently, then turn her eyes towards Lyrica and notice her claw-like hands on my right shoulder and whisper something to herself. After nearly a minute she answer: "Sneasel...sne-sel, sel-sel"

Her tone seems quite final and Lyrica eyes widen before turning her eyes toward me and wholeheartedly laugh barely a cm from my face

Lyrica has trouble speaking telepathically without laughing: "She...she..accept...mmfmfmfmf"

"What, what there is so funny about it?"

Lyrica still with a smirk: "The most precious thing they have Jaden, is......trust"

"Wat?"

Lyrica smirk deepen: "Between mates Jaden, she accept your term, if you win you will earn her trust and by that, herself"

Wat? WAT?!

"WHAT?! Bu..but..that. that's ridiculous! I mean...i"

Lyrica return somewhat serious but her smile can be hardily hide her amusement: "The deal are made, no take back now"

I..I...I just thought a gem or something! Of fuck me sideway

Why this Constantly happen to ME!? WHYYYYY!?

Sigh, alright calm down, one day i Will get the legendary responsible for all of this and, personally, STRANGLE IT WITH MY BARE HANDS!

I hate legendary

Lyrica with a sensual tone: "Sooo Master.." Here we go again: "How do you intend to claim your newer mate when all this fight thing is done, hmmmm? Granted she is barely a meter tall, but i am sure that she will be able to take most of you in. Maybe you should claim her here, in front of all the other Sneasel so than none may deny your claim on her, Rubica curiosity will surely be satisfied then"

"You single-minded crazy..., you know what? Return in your ball"

Lyrica with mocking fear: "Nooooo, please Mas-Jaden, let me assist on your so much difficult fight, i don't want to lose the spectacle...pleaseeee"

I should add extremely rare pokemon to the hating list, yes, yes i should, now i can't fight with Lyrica being a dragon type herself would spoil my earlier claim about dragon types, also i don't want to give her the satisfaction of winning this

So either Nysa or Sylvia, i can use Pyrie but they would probably claim it a cheating being her heavily advantaged over them, so...

"Release Rubica and chose the ground then"

The Sneasel nod and Rubica is promptly released from having a claw at her neck, then the female choose a small circular field devoid of rock a few meter ahead of me

Rubica: "What this is all about, what the long face? They accepted let's get on with it!"

I look at her curiously, then remind myself that Lyrica speak telepathically so she hasn't heard any of her side of the conversation, nor she knew about ^the prize^, i decide to inform her later and, after giving a glare at a smirking Lyrica, i walk towards the chosen ground for our fight and release..

Yes she will do.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Oh boy, here we go..again

choices: continue she wakes up inside the caves
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
“Sylvia would be at too great a disadvantage, so that leaves Nysa” you grab her pokeball off of your belt and toss it into the air. As per usual it opens with a flash of light, revealing Nysa’s snakelike form.

Taking a moment to greet you, Nysa curls around your body and kisses you on the cheek. You manage to untangle yourself and explain the situation, which she finds highly amusing. “It’s not that funny” you grumble.

Once you get Nysa into the field she gets serious, her beautiful eyes becoming cold and calculating. “Nysa Aqua ring!” “Milooo” several rings of water circled around your Milotic, healing her slightly with every passing second. “Hydro pump!” with a loud cry Nysa expelled a high pressure blast of water towards Sneasel. Leaping nimbly to the side Sneasel dodged the blast and rushed at Nysa. Sneasel leapt into the air and faded from view. She reappeared behind Nysa and scored a quick hit before dashing out of range once again.

“Nysa use Mist!” opening her mouth Nysa created a dense fog that soon obscured all but the closets objects from view. “Ice beam, and spread it around!” as the subzero energy came into contact with the water molecules in the air and on the fur of a particular Sneasel it froze, instantaneously creating a thick blanket of ice. “Yes! Now strike with everything you’ve got! Hydro pump!” Nysa reared back and quivered for a moment before releasing a blast of fantastic proportions. “MILOTIC!”

The blast instantly shattered the ice, and knocked Sneasel out of the ring and into her companions. Shakily she got back to her feet. Surrounded by the others she refused any offers of help. Huffing and puffing, she slowly made her way over to you. When she reached you crouched down so you could look her in the eyes. “Sneasel snea” she mumbled and grinned slightly before collapsing into your arms.

Gently you pick her up. “Rubica could you grab a hyper potion from my bag?” she nodded and quickly procured the pink spray bottle. “Here” you lay down a blanket for your new Pokémon. Fortunately she was asleep and didn’t struggle when you sprayed her injuries.

Not wanting her to be scared when she woke up you decided against putting her in a pokeball just yet. “I guess I’ll just carry her.” You wrap her up in the blanket and lift her into your arms. “Let’s get out of here.”
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Nysa, her moveset are the most indicate for thi...

choices: Reach the exit safely, first stop pokecenter
A few Rock type block our path. Sneasel skill showoff?
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Ouch! Dammit it all!"

Caves, another thing to add in my ever growing list of things to hate, walking in them at least. Between a Sneasel in my arms, Lyrica whispering obscene things in my head and Nysa not so subtle advances, i find myself more then a little pissed about my actual present

Not to mention the darkness of the caves and an incredibly annoying Rubica shooting me question after question, barely giving me the time to answer any of them in a way that doesn't make me sound as a pimp of sort

Rubica with a curious tone: "Soo, you just got another mate?"

I exhale, come on, relax, count till ten..1....2....3: "No Rubica, i merely just got another member of my ever growing team"

Composed exclusively of horny females, semantic really

Rubica not believing a word: "Really? Lyrica told me about the agreement and how she accepted to give herself to you if you would have won the match, and you did"

"Well yes and no actually, what Lyrica Forgot to mention" i glare at the floating Latias, or at least try, the darkness of the caves somewhat ruin the effect: "Is that i won an equivalent of a mate trust, not her as a mate, it's different"

Rubica pensive: "But doesn't mate trust imply being mates?"

I open my mouth to reply, to give her an illuminated answer that would finally shred away her ignorance and misconception of pokemon interrelationship

But she has probably right, and we both knew it

Worse of it all Lyrica and Nysa knew it too, i dread thinking about what will happen when Sylvia will get to know about this, not about having another ^mate^, geeze i start to hate this word and all the trouble this simple term is bringing me, no, what i am worried about is...well she is a...dark type and.....nah, Sylvia is a mature and rational individual she won't have any problem in having a dark type as a team member

But as a mate? Meh, no idea

I ignore Rubuca for a moment as Lyrica ask with a strangely serious tone: "For how long do you wish to delay the inevitable Jaden?"

Rubica is speaking but frankly i don't listen, and i feel awkward enough as it is, no need to render her a participant of this conversation

Focusing my will i try to reply Lyrica telepathically, and unexpectedly i succeed, lucky me: "Delay what exactly?"

Lyrica doesn't seems too surprised about my chosen method of conversation, although she can't hide a flicker of pride in her words: "So you finally start to understand? No matter, what i am talking about is...well why don't you make an educated guess, Jaden"

Continuing to focus my will, a small headache start to crawl up in my brain, but i still decide to persist: "Can we have a conversation that does not include sex for once? It's really, really start to get annoying Lyrica. Why don't we discuss battle tactics or...our future for example"

The headache intensity increase, i don't think that i will be ready to use this skill more than a few minutes anytime soon

Lyrica amused: "Well mating is in our future, hopefully a lot of it! If you hadn't guessed yet pokemon loves to mate, most of us at least. There are a few exception here and there"

The headache is not helping my mood i can tell: "Why don't you present to the first male you find then, i am sure that he will be more than happy to oblige you as much as you want"

I fell Lyrica uneasiness: "Jaden..but..i could never! You are my mate, i will never had sex with anyone else! Well maybe a threesome.."

I stop using telepathy, the headache is killing me: "What?"

Lyrica doesn't seems to notice or care my return to a normal conversation, probably a bit of both: "Nothing!"

Rubica: "What was that? Was Lyrica talking to you?"

The headache is slowly diminishing, and i already feel my mood improving a little: "Yes, lewd as always"

Rubica smirk at the now blushing Latias: "Maybe Vulcan will be able to soothe your desire for a while.."

I feel a spike of anger in Lyrica emotions, then a fter a few seconds she speak to me, clearly angry at Rubica: "Jaden can you recall me please, i am..not feeling too well"

The excuse is obvious but i decide to not pry, from her at least: "Sure thing"

I change the position of the sleeping Sneasel so that i can keep her up with one hand, then use my freed arm to grip Lyrica ball and recall her in

Without turning i ask Rubica: "I get she didn't appreciate your offer? What is Vulcan anyway?"

Rubica with a somewhat scared tone: "N..no, she didn't...liked my proposal. He is an Houndoom btw"

Did Lyrica threaten her? Maybe i should ask my mate later, or ask Nysa that have heard everything to speak to her on my behalf, for now i decide to focus on the the exit, shouldn't be too far now, sooo

Oh-ho

The Sneasel in my arms yawn loudly, then opening her eyes she suddenly decide embrace me tightly

Well not a bad start i guess, also i am impressed with her quick recovery, not so much about her licking my ear

There we go again, can't have Lyrica waited a few minutes before leaving me with a technically wild Sneasel without a way to translate what she say?

Of course not, would have been too easy that way

The exit is not far and i would prefer to have any other possible embarrassing conversation in the ^sanctity^ of a room in the pekecenter, so reluctantly i release Sylvia hoping in her maturity

Sylvia appear before me with the Sneasel arms still firmly gripped on the back of my neck, and momentarily confused ask: "Jaden, why do you have a dark type clinging your neck?"

"It's a kinda long story, can you please tell her to stop, and translate what she say?"

Sylvia confusion is promptly replaced by a grin: "Of course, whenever my Master wishes of me"

Legendary..strangle...yes i like this plan more and more...

Sneasel: "Sneasel sne-sne!"

Sylvia freeze for a moment, then fall on the ground laughing madly. I patiently wait a good minute for her to recover

Sylvia in a teasing tone: "She is asking why you haven't claimed her yet, my Jaden, can't i leave you alone for a few hours that you immediately add another mate to your circle?"

My headache is gone but still i fell slightly irritated : "Sylvia can you please explain to her that this is not the moment? And that she need to be captured in a ball?"

Sylvia: "Oh she already know that, in fact she is technically wild, a Sneasel so close to you and still un-captured, my my Jaden, are you already getting old?"

I sbuff in her direction: "Whenever"

I delicately try to pry the wild Sneasel from my neck and surprisingly succeed now, then looking in her eyes i say: "Look we will discuss this later, but you don't have to feel obliged to....you know, anyway i must capture you okay? It's necessary, unless you wish to go free?"

The Sneasel shake her head as a no, jump on the ground in front of me and wait;

Well easy capture then, i try to remove my back pack but found the action useless as an empty ball float a few centimeter to my face

Sylvia: "What are you waiting for, go on! Capture her!"

Gritting my teeth i grip the ball in front of me and launch it toward the unresisting Sneasel, that of course get captured in record time

Recovering the ball from the ground i place it on the far left grip on my belt, it will probably remind me to give priority on this one as soon as i reach the center, then i resume walking with a silent Rubica and an overly affectionate Nysa in tow

Let's not forget a very amused Sylvia at my side

Sylvia: "So when i get some? We mated just once!"

Lyrica 2 the return, sound bad even in my head. At least i can say that i haven't asked for it

Not that i believe any of it.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: A new friendship, with benefit of course

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Hands raised to the sky, you shout “Finally, out of those damn caves.” The caves mouth had deposited you on a trail that led down the mountain. Near the bottom you could see a red building, which you assumed was a pokecenter.

“I don’t see why you hate those caves so much, I mean after all you did get a new mate” Rubica taunted. You grit your teeth and try to ignore her, but Sneasel was a different matter entirely.

Leaping onto your shoulders she whispered seductively in your ear. “Sneasel snea sel snea” “I’ve got to get a translator. Sylvia? Could you please?” “Of course, she says that she can’t wait until you claim her.” You groan and facepalm. “Why can’t any of my Pokémon just be my Pokémon? Why do they all want me to fuck them?”

Leaving your rant for the moment you pick Sneasel up off your shoulders and set her on the ground. “We should get going, the center is at the bottom of the mountain. If we leave now we’ll get there before dark. Grabbing your bag you start off down the trail, followed by your Rubica and the girls.

Later in the day, as the sun began to sink below the horizon you arrived at the Pokémon center. The doors slide open as you approach, revealing Joy sitting behind the desk, apparently asleep. “I can’t help but wonder if she will be as crazy as the last one” Rubica whispered. You shrug and attempt to wake her “Joy, hey Joy” not receiving a response at all you step up your game “Joy! JOY!” she awakes with a start almost falling out her chair.

“Dear god, what’s going on? Why did you wake me like that? Hmm? Wait, are you Jaden?” taken aback by the rapid-fire questions you only manage to respond to the last. “Uh yeah I’m Jaden” suddenly cheerful she leaps from the ground and pulled you into a hug. “Ohhh it’s so good to meet you I’ve heard so much from my cousin!”

“What all have you heard?” “Nothing too embarrassing, just that you’re a nice boy with a talent for attracting females.” “Unfortunately that seems to be me.” You sigh “Could we have a pair of rooms? We just got out of the caves and we’re exhausted”

“Sure thing tiger” Joy giggles as she grabs a pair of keys. Handing one to you and the other to Rubica. “Have fun!” restraining yourself, you leave the lobby and head into the stairwell. “Damn, are they all going to be like that?” you climb to the second floor and say goodnight to Rubica before walking into your room and collapsing onto the bed. You lay there for a moment before releasing all your Pokémon, which you had recalled partway down the mountain.

You were immediately buried under your team, and wound up trapped on the bed.

“Okay okay, get off me!” slowly they all get off of you but stay on the bed. To your surprise the door to your room opens.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Reach the exit safely, first stop pokecenter

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I feel a slight sense of anxiety when the door slowly start opening, the noise caused by the obviously un-oiled hinges does not help my nerves either

I prepare myself for a possible threat, maybe TS has found me? Maybe they knew about my incursion to their base?

Sylvia and Lyrica perceive my uneasiness and jump, well Lyrica float, in front on me while Nysa coil herself around me in a protective manner, Pyrie move with a speed and grace i didn't knew she had and place herself flat on the wall at the opening side of the door, ready to cleanse with fire anything that seems even remotely suspicious

The room has become completely silent since the door opening, then suddenly the door noisily close leaving me and my team a little baffled

A few second later two knock can be heard in the overly silent room, a voice pierce the thin compressed wood the door is made of

Joy: "Jaden it's me Joy, sorry to disturb you..may i come in?"

I slowly relax in hearing Joy voice, but refuse to let my guard down, what if it is a trick? Damn i am becoming a paranoiac, or it's overly prudent?

My team appear visibly calmer, but still on guard, just like me, do they all feel my emotions? Or is Sylvia doing?

Anyway i gently reply: "Sure Joy, come in!"

The door open at a much more reasonable peace now, revealing a more then little nervous Joy behind

Joy embarrassed: "I am sorry Jaden, for not knocking, i forgot the bond you and your team share.."

Not again, at least she has the courtesy of looking embarrassed, the other Joy practically told me fuck them all

"And did you have the habit of opening occupied room door without asking?"

Joy a little angry: "No! It's just.., my cousin told me about your recruitment and how you can be trusted, so i..sorry"

Recruitment? What- ha, yes, Joy and her superspy group

Meh, we'll see: "Well, sort of, did she told you anything else about be?"

Joy grinning: "Only about your bad habit of ^Breaking and Entering^ in TS bases, oh and something about Zekrom taking a liking of you"

Funny, very funny: "How about we don't speak of it again? Ever"

Joy laugh: "Alright, so are you willing to help?"

Actually no, but do i really have a choice: "Can i say no?"

Joy: "Not sure, perhaps, willing to try?"

Annoyed: "Next time, what is it?"

All the team relax at my word, Sylvia however seems a little upset about something

Joy now serious, close the door behind her and lock it: "We have intel about the lake trio and TS operation, it seems that your little stunt about freeing Latias didn't go unnoticed, don't worry our contacts say that they was unable to identify you or your pokemon, they are however actively seeking to recapture her by any means necessary"

The information does not come as a surprise really, i had hoped to conceal her long enough for them to refocus on something else i admit, still

"Why a Latias anyway? They want to breed her for an army or something?"

Joy clearly unhappy with what she is saying: "Sort of, as you know pokemon reproduce by group, like field, dragon and so on"

I nod, it's pretty common knowledge after all, a pokemon can mate with any individual it want, but for obtain am egg they must mate with a partner of their same breeding group, sometimes also called egg group, otherwise it's just sex

Joy: "Well as you probably know there are 15 egg group, 16 if we consider.., sorry you are not here for a lecture, anyway 15 group with some pokemon appertaining to two different group and a minority to just one. Well Latias and practically all legendary appertain to the so called Undiscovered group, in theory they are unable to reproduce..BUT"

"But Latias and Latios clearly reproduce, i get it"

Joy: "Exaclty, so if they are capable of breeding why the other legendary cannot? They firmly believe that they can, and that it's just a matter of finding the right method"

"Make sense, but it simply possible that Latias and Latios are in a whole different group and placing them on Undiscovered was merely a lazy attempt to ^standardize and classify^, after all doesn't people prefer to deal with things that can be schematized and cataloged instead of confronting themselves with the unknown that surround us? Or your- sorry, our supersecret group has anything to do with it?"

Joy grin return with vengeance: "You got the point exactly, yes we have something to do with it, only us and a few others know the truth"

I let a light chuckle leave my lips: "What? They can reproduce with human perhaps?"

Joy face become deadly serious: "Some yes" she point her finger at Latias: "In the right occasion and with a little push most legendary can"

......What-...i don't even...?

Incredulous: "Sorry, i haven't heard you, what did you just say?"

Joy: "You heard me perfectly young man, normally such things don't happen, but in truth, genetically speaking, legendary are super-mutated pokemon and their DNA has some similitude with human one, so with the right cocktail of enzyme it's possible, not certain, that some human, not many really, become compatible with them"

.............

....................


I am afraid to ask: "And...perchance.."

Joy smiling like a fool: "I haven't the slightest idea! Maybe, truth is we are not sure what are the genetic marker that identify a compatible human by on that is not, as you may have guessed we a re short on subject so, meh?"

Meh? Now that's a scientifically sound answer: "Fuck it?"

Joy smirking: "Didn't you have her already?"

Pissed: "Out"

Joy: "Sorry, anyway we think that-"

"They wanted what? Fuck Lyrica till she got pregnant?"

Joy uncomfortable: "Probably, by both human and pokemon, look like you saved her just in time"

I like TS more and more, on a pike of course: "But if legendary reproduce-"

Joy: "Shouldn't be many around? Or at least more then one? Well yes, and there are, sort of. We think that when a legendary reproduce a new type of pokemon came out, or a new type of legendary, for example we know for sure that Victini is Mew child, and that Hydreigon are as a species anciently descend from Rayquaza, there are a few more, but we are uncertain of those"

Enzyme?

"I..see, why an Enzyme would be needed tough? It's natural right?"

Joy: "Curious? Well yes, i admit to not know much about it, but yes it's supposed to be natural, extracted for a combination of plant or something"

Right

A doubt surge in my head: "Lyrica, can you give us any enlightenment on the matter?"

Lyrica suddenly appear nervous and very interested in the floor, then unconvincingly: "No?"

Sure

"We will talk about this, another day, now let me guess Joy, a TS member is here and i must flush him out?"

Joy: "No, not this time anyway, we heard rumor about a strange pokemon not far from here who's description strikingly resemble Mesprit, it could be a Mismagius hunt but.."

I reply confused:"Mismagius?"

Joy with an obvious tone: "You know, they are tricky little bastard?"

Tricky little bastard?: "I sense a story behind it"

Joy annoyed: "Next time"

"Right, where exactly?"

Joy: "South of here, on the White Mesa"

Joy notice my expression and answer: "After the ^Event^ the city of Oreburgh was mostly destroyed, the ground where the ruins of the old city remained proved stable enough so most of the old citizen decided to reconstruct their home here, they also kept the old name. We are in what we can call New Oreburgh but officially the name is just Oreburgh City, just like before. The Withe Mesa just appeared during the Event, at the beginning we thought that a mountain of rock would have buried us all, but in the end the the creation of the Mesa it's all that happened"

"We? Was you here before?"

Joy: "Yes i decided to remain here, it was my original post after all"

Must have been quite the scare: "Thanks Joy, ill check soon as possible, after a little rest"

Joy smile and unlock the door, after letting herself out she simply say: "Alright, let me know when you are ready"

Not a day of peace

The team doesn't look tired, more bored actually

"Alright team, i go get a shower then we decide what to do, we need more training if we wish to defeat the next gym, also i must be careful with you Lyrica, no more public or official fight until i know it's safe"

Lyrica is not happy with my decision, but it must be so.

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Standing in front of the steep cliff you recall your conversation with Joy

Flashback

“So you think that Mesprit is living on the mesa?” “Yes and I also believe that TS has a mobile base of sorts there while they are searching. Jaden you need to go there and see about Mesprit, if she is there I believe she will reveal herself to you. And if TS has her, destroy them.”

End Flashback

Looking up at the cliff you can see no path or any such way to get to the top. After several attempts to climb and several bruises and a skinned knee, Sylvia pops out of her ball and levitates the pair of you to the top.

“Wow, I never thought of that” you hug Sylvia “Thank you” Smiling contentedly she kisses you on the cheek and prepares for the search.

The top of the Mesa has a bunch of trees and a large pond, making a good imitation of a plains area. Let’s start near the pond, Mesprit used to live near a lake, maybe she still does.” “I’m psychic remember?” she says in your head “I can search this whole area in a millisecond” silently you berate yourself for not remembering that.

Sylvia closes her eyes and glows for a second, before speaking telepathically: “There is a large group of Team Shadow about a mile to the north, they are in pursuit of something that is blocked from my powers, I can’t tell what it is.” “It’s probably Mesprit, let’s go! Sylvia Teleport!”

With a flash of light you vanished and reappeared behind a group of trees from where you could clearly see TS. They were all grouped around one grunt, which had what appeared to be a thermal camera.

Grunt: “Okay I’ve got a fix!” he points off to the left “It’s over there!” “Sylvia” you whisper “can you confuse them? Like really badly?” giggling maliciously her eyes glow for a second and you can see that suddenly all the grunts are staring at one point above their heads.

You see this and grin with her “This is gonna be too easy” releasing Pyrie and Nysa you come out from behind the tree and shout “Fire Blast, Hydro Pump!” your pokemon ,side by side release a huge combined attack. Spreading over a large area, the water and flames cleared a swath of the grunts leaving them with burns and bruises.

The rest of the grunts slowly were able to draw themselves out of whatever dream Sylvia put them in. “Nysa, remember the battle with Sneasel?” she grins remembering the combination you had thought up. “Mist, Go!” spewing forth a large volume of dense fog she soon hides all the grunts from view. In the fog you can hear the grunts murmuring, and you laugh a little.

“They have no idea what’s coming. Ice beam!” Nysa fires the blast of freezing energy into the center of the fog, freezing the water in the air coating everything in range with ice.

With the fog no longer clouding your vision you could see that most of the grunts were frozen in such a way that they couldn’t move. You smile watching them struggle. “You aren’t getting out until you thaw!” you shout jovially “You’re not going anywhere!” “Dammit kid when I get out of here!” “Sylvia, confusion” she smiled and her eyes glowed green, moments later the grunts were all sprawled about unconscious.

“Thank you” you hear a whisper in your mind “they have been after me for days, I didn’t want to reveal myself to them, but thanks to you I won’t have to!” you look around wildly “Where are you, who are you?”

“I’m right here, and my name is Mesprit”

Turning around i locate the source of the voice in my head, normally when Lyrica talk to me this way there are no sense of direction to the voice, it's just there, but this time i can clearly feel where he thoughts are originated

The creature floating in front of me has a playful and happy expression, you wouldn't say that this pokemon has been mercilessly hunted for days, nor anyone would have ever imagined that such important creature could have been so...small?

Mespirit with a contagious smile and childish voice: "Hi! I couldn't thank you enough for what you did, those brutes wanted to capture meeeeeeeee!"

Is Mespirit sane?: "A..eh..it's nothing really, just doing my duty, i think"

"Your duty, really?! It's your duty to help me?"

"Well, sort of, can i ask what you was doing here? If you can tell me that is"

"Oh, but of course i can tell you silly! I was....ehm...well..ah! Yes i was spreading happiness!"

Spreading...happiness..?

"I am the embodiment of emotion and it's my duty to spread and maintain the feelings of the world! Most of the time at least"

The last part of her?..sentence is more then a little confusing, most of the time? She pass the rest playing or something?

"I..see, but didn't you already spread emotion during creation? It's necessary to do it often? They exhaust or something?"

Mespirit fly closer and put a paw on your lips, she is a little more serious right now: "Hey, hey slow down, can't answer all of that!"

I nod in sign of understanding and she, yes think that this pokemon is definitely a she, remove her paw but still remain pretty close; she smell of....strawberries? no, no it's...it's..cookie?

What the..

Mespirit chuckle a little, her voice is still childish but definitely more mature now: "Now, let's see how can i explain it to you"she put her paw under her face in a typical thinking position, damn she is so adorable"hmmmmm"

After a few moments: "Ha!" she recover a normal posture: "Now there are some things that i can't reaaaaaally explain to you, oh i want to, really!" she pout: "But i can't"

..........................

She recover part of her happy expression, however i am able to see a glimpse of sadness in her eyes, also i can easily discern an incredible amount of wisdom behind her strange playfulness: "There are things that you can only learn, not explain....noooooooo! I am becoming like sister Uxie.....nahhahahaha. She is rubbing off me, must...eh...resist"

She assume what i can only describe as an intense expression of deep concentration, or at least as a 10 year old would do in such cases anyway

A few seconds later she return normal, her tone is normal now, adult even: "Much better, i should seriously stop mulling so much, now human, as i have said i can't really explain emotion to you, i am sure that in your young life, you have surely felt many emotions since your birth and they varies as much as the person that feel them do"

Make sense i guess, a very logical explanation i must say

Mespirit tone become deadly serious now, no more trace of the childish personality she exhibited before "No matter what your life will force upon you emotion and not all of them i had pleasure in making, but i had to, i never wanted human or pokemon to suffer and grieve, but those emotion too are necessary. Think on what will happen if you, anyone would have been unable to grieve for the loved ones that are lost. Emotions make any living being, complete, no matter what some may say, without emotion you may very well be a machine, or dead"

....That was......scary: "I...thank you for the lesson, but you didn't really answer my questions"

Mespirit smile deeply: "True, but as i have said, i can't really answer those question, Jaden"

"Ok but- wait, you know my name?"

Mespirit return playful: "Of course i do silly! How can i not know about you, i mean duh! Saw any other Latias around?"

That....once again doesn't answer- fuck it, she is doing it on purpose: "Ok, you can't answer that either, but why here, can't you...i don't know...do what you do anywhere?"

"Yes! But i like this place, and nobody come here anyway!"

"Beside" i point at the frozen grunt: "Them"

Mespirit return somewhat more serious: "Well, yes. I am thankful for your assistance in the matter Jaden, both my brother and my sister will owe you a favor, me included of course, hehehe"

"Your sister is Uxie and you brother Azelf?"

"We are quite famous no? Aren't we know as the lake trio?"

"Know as pokemon yes, your gender however is-was a matter of debate"

Mespirit look curiously at me: "Does human has nothing better to do that speculate on famous pokemon gender?"

"No! absolutely" suddenly i remember the various pokemon professor around the world:"....ok, some may do that, sometimes"

She appear amused: "Hhmhmhm, why brother will be sooooo happy to hear that, hmhmhm. Anyway"

Mespirit look intensively at Lyrica for a few seconds, then suddenly she blush and start to use her paw as a fan: "Fiuw, that was something, even for me"

She look at me: "Your mate has quite the feelings for you, many are about love....many more are about passion, there are some strange feelings too, can't understand them fully, perhaps she is unsure about something"

The first two part didn't surprise me, but the last, not sure what could it be. Maybe that discussion about herbs with Joy? Hopefully not, my life is complicated enough as it is, and if the rumor are true i don't want to sire a new species of pokemon in case Zekrom is serious about...that: "Oh, i am sure it will solve itself in time"

Mespirit doesn't look convinced but: "Alright it's your family, your call. So, i have answered some of your question at the best of my ability, for now at least, how about reverse our role for a while?"

Predicable, well ok let's see: "What do you wish to know?"

"Did you like breeding your pokemon?"

I nearly fall to the ground while Lyrica and Sylvia laugh like mad: "Pff, wha...EH!?"

"It's a pretty simple answer to give, yes or no"

"What...but...YOU SHOULDN'T ASK SUCH THINGS! It's..it's you just shouldn't!"

"I feel embarrassment from you, why? It's natural wanting to express your love in a physical manner, i just asked if you like what you feel when you mate with them, if you like it"

"I am NOT answering That!"

Mespirit pout: "Oh well fine, don't then. Let's see, hmmmm, is common?"

I have an idea of what she is talking about, i am still uncomfortable answering such kind of question but, she did answer mine, in a sense: "Somewhat, it's a sort of gray area really"

She seems to understand what i mean: "Have you ever met another legendary before?"

"Yes i have, beside the pseudo-legendary Lyrica here"

Lyrica: "Hey!"

"I have met Zekrom in...curious circumstances, we helped each other in a sense. I have wanted to do more for her but i have simply do not have the information she need"

Mespirit nod: "For how long you been a trainer?"

If she mean traveling: "All in all, nearly 2 weeks"

"And you already posses such powerful pokemon? Meet a legendary too? Impressive"

Annoyed: "They aren't mine, they are my mates and lovers, not objects that i use and then put away in their balls. I thought that the pokemon of emotion would have more tact when discussing about her own species"

Mespirit smile: "Not exactly my species, but yes you have right." Her smile increase dramatically: "You know, Mewtwo would been Very happy to meet one such as you, despite the power already in your command, you keep a level head and respect your trainees or family in your case, yes you definitely would be a good candidate.."

I don't like how she told me that

"Maybe even better my dear friend Ray or the young Kleedy, why it would be perfect"

"W-what?"

"Oh i am just ranting, ignore me"

Ignore me my boots, time to leave, oh right, one last thing: "I Really, Really need to go now, but can i talk to your brother and sister? Another day of course, i want to know what TS are planning and.."

"But of course, we owe you a favor now, sister will probably know about TS plan but she tend to be a little, how to say it, absent sometimes, like me she will not be able to tell you much, but you are welcome to try. Brother can probably give your resolve a little boost so to speak"

"And when-"

Mespirit smile childishly again: "Just continue north, we will meet you at Crystal Lake after defeating the gym, don't be loooooong!"

Then she vanish in a flash of purplish light

......................."Will i ever find a sane legendary? Or they are all nuts like that?"

Why after the gym-, forget it. I start to understand why pokemon professor retire after a while, trainers too

Pokemon are all crazy, me too for wanting to continue this journey, i am probably the craziest, oh well next

"Hungry anyone?"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: About emotions and feelings, oh boy did i ever

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Back a t the Pokémon center you slump down into a booth and lean back. “Joy could we have some food?” “Of course Jaden, you probably need some after today.”
You thank her as she pulls some food out from the kitchen. Setting a plate of spaghetti in front of you she grins and asks “So did you have any fun?” you move your plate to the side and drop your head on the table. “No, I didn’t” you growl as you lift your head. “So please drop it.” “Fine but you still haven’t told me what Mesprit said to you”

Zekrom charge up electricity around her body and in a blink of an eye, launch a concentrated ball of lighting outside the cave, all my hair stand up and the attack didn't even grazed me! The bolt travel at incredible speed, reaching a distance i estimate in approximately a kilometer before exploding in a giant nova of electricity. The temptress tone return, loaded with sweetness and lust in equal measure: "Liked the show, my mate?" I turn towards her, she is getting closer: "That is but a fraction of what i can do, master. Stop denying the truth, i can feel your attraction towards me. I know you want me

She get even closer, unable to back away further: "My power"
Her head come closer to mine, her bluish tongue gently lick my cheeks. I want to deny her, and as soon as i try to say no! She slithers her tongue inside my mouth, i try to push her back, but the only result is she wrestling with my tongue, a small fight she suitably lose, letting me pushing her back and dominate her flexible muscle down

"As my mate All my power will be at your disposal, everything i am will be yours. My knowledge of events and.."

Now at at more seizable form she turn around and lay on her belly, lifting her still sizable tail, exposing herself completely to me: "My body, to use as you..see..fit"

Rubica completely bewildered: "Oh my......i c-c-an't.."

With her last word Zekrom heighten her rump just enough to display her submission. My mind now clouded with lust and inebriated by the previous kiss, bring my body forward toward my future mate. I get so close to her that i can feel her body heat, but still unsatisfied i reach for her sex with my hands and part her lips, revealing her healthy bluish insides to me

A wave of her pheromones strike me straight on my nose exciting me even further: "Yes my mate, explore me, know me.....use me"

In the back of my mind, i know that she is using me, i know that while her intentions are genuine, she must be desperate for a mate. How old she really is? Hundreds? How many i wonder

My hands move on their on as find myself playing with her lips, trying to figure it out where or if, she even has a clitoris. After a good minute of exploration i find none, curious i slip my right fingers inside, finding her lips eagerly parting away at my intrusion, and using my left to touch the small hole under her tail with she purring softly all the while

"N-naughty masterrr, t-hat ah! too?"

Lowering my left hand i push my fingers inside her quite hot and moist sex, lubricating my fingers, then i return to stimulate her undertail, this time pushing a finger inside

My exploration is suddenly interrupted by a loud screech outside and a thunder landing at the mouth of our cave

I jump back, the loud noise break the spell i am under, losing my balance i fall on my ass. Zekrom get up, lowering her tail and letting out a menacing growl toward the mouth of the cave, the shimmering light of before return, in less then half minute she return to her original height

The screech return with vengeance as another thunder, stronger then the last, land exactly where the last one did, scorching the ground black. Rubica run towards me and grip Sally ball ready to launch it if needed. Mistra place herself in front of me ready to fight

A loud boom echo inside the cave, and only now i notice Kyurem has reached our side and got in what i recognize to be a combat stance. The figure that forcefully landed a second ago, enter the cave without even pausing to see who is inside

Now that the creature it's a few meters from me and i see it clearly, i recognize it's unique yellow, spiky plumage as one of the legendary bird, Zapdos

It's form is a lot more unified and a lot less spiky then i remember having seen in the books, much more pleasing to the eye, attracting even....oh fuck not again! Bad thoughts bad thoughts!

Zapdos look in our direction, using it's keen eyes to discover any meaningful detail this empty cave could give. When it sight reach my form, stop. It's unnerving being looked down by such creature, i have the feeling that the legendary is literally giving me a full x-ray scan, no part of me is safe under it's gaze

Then the bird of lighting surprise me by speaking in my head, all of us i think: "Greetings oh gifted one, i have come to extend my regards The voice is..guess it..female, damn. She look at Zekrom like she would do to a worm: And assure your wellbeing in the presence of this, unworthy tealight that dares define herself Lightning"

Now that i recovered from my drunken state, i can easily pick up a certain tension it the air, literally considering what my hairs are doing. My near-was-be-mate growl and get closer to the legendary bird: "He will and is, safer with me that it would ever be with you, useless sparky plug"

Ouch, they must not be exactly in good terms i wager

Another loud boom signal that another visitor come to keep us company. The creature slowly enter the cave, it's blue plumage make it easy to recognize

Articuno the bird of Ice, majestic and beautiful. Her sweet, calm voice forcefully enter the conversation : "Calm down Zapy, no reason to get angry, we have reached the candidate just in time"

Zapdos do not even turn or acknowledge the other legendary in the slightest, keeping the death-glare focused on Zekrom: "I have all the reason to angry, Arty, this..unworthy slut nearly seduced him to mate with her, BEFORE He knew all he must. I knew she didn't, it was never her method to play by the rules"

Articuno slowly get closer to me, Kyurem seems nervous but do not stop her advance. To my great surprise she briefly bows: "Greeting oh gifted one, i too extend my regards. Sorry if i seems hasty, but may i ask if our..balanced opposite here explained the right you posses?"

I find my throat become dry all the sudden, she is not threatening in the least, but damn it's still one of the most famous legendary ever! The legend on her speak that she reveal herself only to doomed travelers, can cross that out i hope

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Rrrgh, you better get out of here before I show you why I am the true power of lightning." Zekrom rumbles. Lightning arcs across her body as she prepared her attack. "I'd take your own advice you slut" Zapdos snapped.

"Dammit! Stop" you yell. With a roar, Zekrom launches herself at the lightning bird. Colliding with Zapdos, Zekrom forced her out of the cave and into the sky.

You run to the mouth of the cave and see the two floating in the sky. "I will make you pay!" Zekrom roared. Several bolts of lightning converged in her palms, before shooting toward Zapdos. Flicking them away with one of her wings, Zapdos fired off several bolts of her own all of which we'd redirected into the sky. As the battle continued, you felt helpless rage over the fact that they were fighting over you.

"Dammit I have to stop this!" "I'm afraid there's not much you could do." Articuno said as she stood watching the two electric types fight. "they have always been this way. Both of them think they are stronger, that they are the true power of lightning. It can be infuriating"

You grit your teeth and watch as the two collide creating a burst of lightning followed by a loud clap of thunder. "This is stupid!" At that moment you get a really dumb idea. Rummaging through your bag, you come up with two pokeballs. Gripping one in each hand, you curse Arceus once again for doing all this, before you throw the balls with all your might. One conected with Zekrom, and the other with Zapdos. Both the legendaries were contained for a second before the balls shattered releasing them once. They hadn't been captured, but that had never been your intention. You had hoped that by trying to catch them you would draw all their attention to yourself. Huffing and puffing the two legends descended to the ledge whee you stood with Articuno.

"Jaden I'm sorry, I won't lose my temper like that again" Zekrom said. She got down on her knees and looked you I. The eyes."please don't hate me" she almost whimpered. Zapdos landed beside her. "I would also like to apologize for my behavior" she bowed low"I beg your forgiveness."with both them nearly begging, you couldn't take it any more. "I forgive both of you, just- shit!" Before you could finish your statement
Zekrom grabbed you and held you to her chest. "Thank you"

"Okay, you can put me dow-MPH!" You were cut off once again by the electric dragon, this time by her tongue invading your mouth. Unable to resist, and not sure you want, to you struggle weakly for a moment. Before giving in and kissing back.

Out of the corner of your eye you can see Zapdos seething quietly, and decide to even things out a little. Twisting your shoulders you slip out of Zekrom's grip and stride over to Zapdos. "I don't believe we've been properly introduced. I'm Jaden, Pokemon trainer, and gifted human" somewhat taken aback Zapdos thinks for a moment before coming up with a response. "I am Zapdos, one of the three legendary birds, and I am a candidate for mateship."

"Well then, lets go inside, it looks like it might rain."

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Reentering the caves we got ^stuck^ since we found the two legendary annoyance, gave life to one of the most awkward silence i had the displeasure to know, beside Zekrom i mean

Having enough of the silent treatment and wanting more information about the so called rules, i begin to question both rival legendary and hope to obtain at least part of the answer i seek, that lazy bastard of Arceus could have at the very lest give my ancestor and instruction manual or something: "Now that we have recovered some semblance of civility.."

I look around and notice Rubica having a friendly conversation with Kyurem, Mistra lazily scratching the wall, both lighting legendary trying to not look at each other and...where in the darkest pit of tartarus is Ar-

A moment later i find myself enveloped in warm crystal blue wind: "Cold Jaden? Maybe you rest, it must have been shocking knew the truth about your ancestor, then throw in the middle of the rivalry between these two"

Nice try Articuno, but between Nysa and Lyrica attempt in using similar comfort tactics in an occasion or two, i can now easily recognize the sign. Well played tough

"No thanks, i am fine Arty"

Articuno tighten her embrace for a moment, from under her wing an alluring smell linger in my nose, then she release me: "As you wish"

They are definitely playing to win, i can tell. Clearing my throat: "Now as i was saying, there a few clarification and doubts i would like to clear"

My short declaration bring to me the undivided attention of everyone: "For starters, why you two are so hellbent on fighting. I kinda understand wanting to be the undisputed mistress of lighting, but was that really necessary?"

Both legendary seems unwilling to discuss this argument, the mere mentioning of it unnerve them. Annoyed at their reluctance i decide to play a card i know i shouldn't even consider, but at this point. i truly don't care: "I don't like having a reticent mate, just saying. Honesty is a desirable trait i believe"

Clear and concise, nothing else needed to be done. After a few more seconds of uncertainty Zekrom speak: "There is a...rivalry between some of us, a sort of unofficial division between our belief if you want."

I nod, Zapdos continue: "It was not always this way, but time and events, have changed us, make us realize that while Arceus loved all it children, some got more attention fore reason we wasen't able to comprehend. It never wanted to answer why, no matter how long i pestered it at every chance i got"

Zekrom: "Arceus didn't had the time to train me, or so it said. Zapdos willingly offered Arceus to train me in exchange for the answer she longed. Arceus agreed"

Zapdos: "I don't know why, personally i believe Arceus did it on purpose"

Did..what?

Zekrom: "For years i trained under her strict vigilance, she taught me to harness the power i now posses. I owe Zapdos much"

Zapdos: "She was young, with a talent and a raw strength i never possessed. I envied her i admit, my elemental control and finesse was and still is, much superior to the one she will ever have but still, it hurt my pride knowing that another pokemon with such power existed. A challenge to my very nature"

Zekrom: "I loved Zapdos like a sister, i wasn't allowed to see Reshiram or Kyurem for years and my training keep me isolated from most other legendary as well. I wanted to become strong as her, to make my teacher proud. To make Arceus proud"

Zapdos: "The day i deemed her ready, i asked Arceus to introduce my pupil to all the others, to finally get the recognition she worked so hard to achieve. Egoistically i wanted my answer even more. At that time despite her presence and the closeness with both Ho-Ho and Articuno, i felt alone. An hole in my hearth where something desperately needed was amiss"

Zekrom: "We reached the hall, i was so happy. Most of the legendary was available and accepted to see m-" She stop for a moment and look toward Kyurem: "Us, in the circle of the known. What you human refer to as legendary, an adult"

Zapdos: "Arceus introduced Zekrom in the circle, she officially become a legendary. I was so proud of my pupil, of her progress. But my question burned within me like Ho-Ho sacred fire, it was consuming my thoughts and spirit. I felt my soul thirsting for the answer it promised me, the answer that would have finally freed me from my torment, form my emptiness"

Zekrom: "I too felt what she felt, what nearly all legendary felt. But i was younger and at the moment, had more important matter to attend to, or so i thought"

Zapdos: "Arceus gathered us all around it, then told us his plan. Told us about the artefact's, about your existence, about our loneliness. Turns out, it created us that way on purpose, for ensuring it plan fruition, we. it's preferred children, would have to find a mate, a human mate. It was the only way for most of us to conceive, for banishing the emptiness from our hearth forever"

Zekrom: "It explained us the rules, what we could do and what we could not do, what it pretended from us, and what we could have if we wished. None of us was forced to have a mate, but if we wanted to have it's approval, and the rank of adult with all the benefit and responsibilities it give, that was the price"

"Son of a bitch, blackmailer"

Articuno: "It has no mother, but i do agree with the concept. We understood his plan, but we still didn't justify it's method. Giratina payed the price, and one of our greatest enemy was born that day"

"What? What happened to Giratina? It's the reason why it- she was banished in the distortion world?"

Zapdos: "Yes, she loved a human but....he was contested from Groudon and...We lost them both. Giratina was banished and the boy...Arceus rules was clear, not even it could force a human to chose a mate if he didn't wanted to, nor to do anything for us. He disown Arceus and all it represented for banishing his true love. He declared his hate for all of us, especially for Groudon that at the time, did everything only for vexation. He left us, despite his affinity with other legendary, he knew that Groudon provoked Giratina, Arceus too admitted it's mistake, but he....didn't wanted to hear anything more from it"

Zekrom: "Groudon was isolated for her mistake, Giratina become a shadow of the noble creature she once was. Anger and darkness consumed her, and while Arceus could banish her in the distortion realm, that world was still her domain. She was trapped in, but she could still cut us all off from her realm if she wished, remove herself from the circle and abandon her duty to the world. And she did. One the the 3 dragon that brought the light of creation to Sinnoh, was now a prisoner in her own home. We lost 3 lives that day"

Articuno: "For avoiding any other incident of similar nature, Arceus decided to divide us based on a logic we still don't fully understand, i believe that it did it using our blood as a distinction marker, by type or something like that, it never told us"

Zapdos: "We was divided by groups, different group had different objectives to achieve, but all of us had a common goal, if we wanted to"

"Getting mated"

Articuno chuckle: "Something like that, we later discovered that candidates was often compatible with different group that shared similar blood, similar affinities"

"So it put you all in a kind of competition?"

Zapdos: "Something like that, our objective was sometime directly opposite one another, we think that it wanted us to prove ourselves to our potential mate, what he or she liked more between similar but different elements"

Articuno: "It passed so long that we forgot what it mean coexisting peacefully, and soon it become a competition with a mate as a prize"

"So you can't work together?"

Zekrom: "We can, but after century of working one against one another we become resentful with members of opposite groups and, some of us still don't want to even hear the term collaboration or peace. Our instinct did the rest, as pokemon we must always prove ourselves against something. Be this something another legendary or destiny, it was irrelevant to us"

Silence reign over us all for a few minutes, then: "So you are afraid that if i chose one of you two, i would necessarily exclude the other"

Articuno: "Some of us are not willing to ignore the resentment against each other, nor our opposite roles. For example with your affinity both Mew daughter Victini and Mewtwo are possible candidates, however due to their allegiance, having one will forcefully remove the other from joining, they will never accept to share the same mate"

Zapdos: "Ho-Ho have already her eyes on someone else, Suicine would prefer a mate with water affinity and Entei is male"

Zekrom: "My sister Reshiram will never accept to share her mate with Zapdos nor Articuno, i don't think she will ever change her ideas on the matter. Palkia too would prefer a mate with water affinity despite she being a dragon. I don't even want to consider Giratina, she still don't talk to us and i don't think she will accept another mate, not now anyway"

Articuno: "That leave Raikou, but she don't exactly like Zekrom so, Victini or Mewtwo, Mew is not interested, and Dialga i think- Yes beside us of course"

"So if i take you both no Reshiram and also Raikou because she hate your guts, Victini or Mewtwo and probably Dialga?"

Articuno: "Don't forget me, i have no problem with anyone you are compatible with"

"Beside Kyurem?"

Kyurem timidly: "I..have no problem with her, or anyone here."
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Could have lived without knowing it

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Wow" you sit down against the cave wall. "If I ever meet Arceus I'm going to beat the shit out if it" "do you really mean that?" Zekrom asks. You nod and immediately you are smothered by a massive hug. "I'm so happy that you care so much"

"While I appreciate the sentiment, I don't think that would be a good idea. Arceus wouldn't hesitate for a second before erasing you completely. If it even judged that you were a threat," "Yeah, but it really pisses me off how it manipulates you like this"

Pushing Zekrom off of you you stand and make an announcement. "I will not chose a mate until I have met all the candidates! That is final. And if any of you try to seduce me before I have gotten to know all of you, well, I don't know what I'll do but I will do something, and you probably won't like it!" Despite the absurdity of your threat, you feel that all the legendaries present had gotten the message.

"Now as for you two" you say turning to face Zekrom and Zapdos. "There will be no more fighting, got it?" "Okay we'll get along" "you'd better" you mutter quietly. You stride into the corner where Mistra was sitting and sit next to her. "Snea" she murmurs as she hugs your arm.

Before you fall asleep you decide it would be nice for your team to sleep outside their balls for a change. Releasing all of them you are soon smothered in estrogen as your team vied for a position with you. Eventually they all settled down, with most of you covered. You receive a kiss from every member of your team before they finally go to sleep. "Goodnight everyone" receiving replies from everyone in the cave you finally put an end to this most stressful of days.




"Jaden, Jaden, Wake up Jaden!" slowly but surely the insistent voice roused you from your slumber. "What?" You open your eyes to see that Articuno was leaning over you, intent on speaking with you. "I am going to gather the rest of your possible mates" "what!?" You jolt upright disturbing your team. "Why?" "as you can probably tell some of us are becoming rather, desperate, it would be in everyone's best interest if we clear this up as soon as possible. I just thought I would say good bye"

Giving you a quick hug and a lick on the cheek she leaps into the air and soars out of the cave. "Dammit, this is going to be trouble" rousing the rest if your team you prepare to get started with your day. You can see that everyone is awake, and apparently waiting for you. "We should probably get going. It's still a bit of a trek to Durian city." " but if you go into a city it would be too risky for us to follow!"Zekrom says "Exactly, I need some time away from you all so I can think and rest in peace, well relative peace"

Unable to formulate a good response Zekrom pouts, while Zapdos and Kyurem both approach you with their worries. "What if you get into trouble?we will be too far away to help!" "my team is perfectly capable of protecting me." Completely shut down the legendary Pokemon huddle together and try to think if a good reason for you not to go. "We won't stop you, but we don't like this" Zapdos voices her concerns. "Sorry you're uncomfortable, but I need a bed after the last two nights. My back is killing me!" "we will accompany you until you reach the outskirts" "That's fine, but don't cause any trouble"

With all of your gear finally packed and your Pokemon contained, you exit the cave and turn to the peak. "Well, better get started"

With a smile she handed you a pair of keys. You toss one to Rubica and head for the stairs. As you reach the landing you get the feeling someone is watching you. You look back over your shoulder to see that several people were staring intently at you. "Um can I help you?"

Realizing that you were over thinking it, you press the button and drop the ball hoping for the best. Fortunately your paranoia is misplaced as Sally is the only thing to emerge from the ball. "Mence! Salemence!" She exclaims as she leaps onto you.

The last one out, Lyrica closes the door behind her, after she smirks at you."Have fun!" fortunately you can't dwell on it as Nysa presses her tongue against your lips. 'Well it's Nysa's turn I wonder what she wants to do.'
