A man and a woman elegantly suited enter our field of vision from doors at the opposite side of the room, the man from the left and the woman from the right. Reaching the center of their respective field they both say: "Lighting Strike!"

........"Doesn't the gym just get the town name, you know tradition"

Both look at me sheepishly, then Henri: "Well yeah, officially it just so but, we like to call our gym this way"

..........."Okay"

Now, i am not in the mood for talking and i have quite the frustration to work out, also i don't want a double match and if there are two or more gym leader for a single medal, defeating at least half of them is enough unless specified before the match. So I'll take one and Rubica can take the other, who of this two leader will be my opponent then?

Let's see....
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Gym -not really- Double battle! Henri and Jane

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Either way some of your Pokemon will be at an advantage and others a disadvantage. But only with an electric type would you have a Pokemon completely immune.

"I'll battle you" gesturing dramatically at Jane. "Oh good! It's been awhile since I had a battle with an elite trainer!" "Elite trainer?" Rubica says skeptically "since when?" "Since the day before we met actually. Joy had given me an elite status that night." "Ya know, some might say you're the luckiest bastard on the face of the earth." "Ugh don't remind me"

You step onto the metal platform at the end of the electric type field. Jane eagerly takes the other side. "Let's do this!" You take a deep breath emptying your mind of everything except for this battle. If you we're distracted you wouldn't be able to direct your Pokemon well.

With a small click a pokeball comes free of your belt and expands in your hand. Hefting it slightly you wait until Jane has chosen a Pokemon as well and hurl it into the arena. It bursts open revealing your first Pokemon: Pyrie! "Quill!!" She cries out as she lands on the metal field. Shooting you a sultry look she crouches in such a way as to reveal her cunt to you. You facepalm and groan "not now Pyrie!"

With a giggle she gets into a combat stance, the flares on her back erupting to life. "So you choose Quilava. Go Ampharos!"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: After a brief discussion i choose Ligthing!

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
The electric pokemon appear before me, screaming it's name as a battle cry, It's trainer Jane, wear nothing but confidence on her face. The challenging stare we exchange between us make me feel alive, finally some action...that doesn't involve sex

The silence between us, is interrupted by the noise of someone running, and looking towards the source of the noise i recognize the secretary that greeted me in the hall, she is evidently try to reach the platform at the side of the arena as fast as she can, panting heavily in the process.

When a few secods later she reach her position, she kneel down as she try to catch her second wind: "S-*pant* S-sorry *pant* got del-delayed by, paperwork *pant*"

Well, there was something amiss, no need to spit out her lungs reaching here however, could have just asked to stop for a moment, or could have just remained when she escorted us here..no matter, let's do this

The secretary slowly recover a normal breathing pattern, the getting up she straighten her vest and start to speak in an official tone: "Hmhm, Welcome to the Lighting Strike gym challenger! I will be your referee for this match, and as tradition i will explain the rules of this gym. Both of the contenders may chose up to five pokemon in this fight, only one vs one battle, the first trainer to win 4 match is declared the winner and only the challenger may switch pokemon between fights. As any official battle the restriction of 10 moves per match is lifted, only four moves per pokemon are allowed. Any kind of move, included combo techniques are allowed 1 time per challenge, so chose wisely. No item nor device can be used to enhance or otherwise improve any pokemon move or statistic, natural pokemon abilities are of course, allowed"

She keep her serious expression, and just before i shout an order she interrupt us, again: "A last thing, all trainer must declare the move it's pokemon are going to execute, no telepathic commands are permitted on any match, the inhibitor field surrounding this field will disrupt any attempt to use such methods"

A psychic disruption fields? Are they even legal?

"Now Begin!"

Her shout immediately wake me up from my stupor: "Flame Charge!" Pyrie flames envelop her body completely as she charge with increased speed toward her opponent, despite Jane order to doge, Pyrie already faster attack speed become far too quick for Ampharos to dodge

The impact force the electric pokemon on all four, Jane immediately order a counter: "Discharge Amphy!"

The Ampharos touch it's bulbous tail with it's forehead and yellowish ball of energy rapidly appear and grow on it's tail, then slamming the bulbous tail down a wave of electricity attempt to invest any creature withing the battlefield, namely Pyrie

Digging is impossible on solid steel: "Substitute!"
Pyrie form shift for an instant, i can't really see whats happening, then a copy of her appear in front of her absorbing the attack, vanishing

That was close, the paralyzing effect would have mean the end of the fight given the strength of that poke, Pyrie has only her speed as a clear advantage, unless..

Jane: "Smart choice avoiding being paralyzed, but Amphy is far stronger then her"

I smirk: "Pyrie, Attract"

My Quilava start dancing on the field, entrancing the far too attentive Ampharos in her snare, i admit that even i found her skill effective. After a few other not adapt to minor moves, she complete her dance by exposing her sex to the now evident horny pokemon, drooling at the sight

Man she is good at that

"Amphy! Snap out of it! Amphy!"

I can't believe it, this move it's practically cheating: "Let's finish it, Brick Break on his head, go!"
Pyrie charge against the yellow pokemon now reduced to a twitching mass of flesh, and smash her hand right below his jaw. Ouch

The Ampharos fall down, his erection still showing even after the heavy hit, his lips curved into a smile. At least he fall from this battle with hight...spirit

"Well played, i should have expected this strategy, initial distraction with a move, finish it with a trick....you have skill. But why she exposed herself that way, normally the move finish after the dance is completed and is not that effective, did you trained her for it?"

Well, no but i wasn't able to discourage her either: "Not really, she is just...talented for it"

That's a way to put it

"Ampharos is unable to continue, challenger chose your next pokemon, or continue"

My next choice, id say ground or psychic, i bet that at least one of her pokemon is super-effective against ground so, now or next match, later it will be too late
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: A fight with a twist, down below

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Pyrie! Great job!" "Quilava!" She cried out bounding over to you. Jumping into your arms, Pyrie began to glow, changing shape, growing heavier until you toppled over backwards.

The glow faded shortly leaving you with a considerably larger Pokemon on your chest. "Typhlosion" the Pokemon murmured in your ear. "Pyrie you evolved!" "Ty" she licked your cheek and nuzzled your neck. "Could you get up? I can't breathe" a little dissapointedly she got up and pulled you into a hug. You return the hug along with a small kiss before pulling away and grabbing another pokeball.

Taking a solid stance, you launch the ball into the field. At the same time Jane threw her own pokeball, the pokeballs burst open revealing your choices, Marowak and Magnezone. "Tierra! Are you ready?" Only last night had you thought of that name. "Grinning over her shoulder she gave you a thumbs-up. "Wak! Maro!" You could easily hear the enthusiasm in her voice.

"Magnezone! Use supersonic!" "Tierra dodge left and then Bone Club!" With a roll to the left, Tierra avoids the attack and dashes forward, holding her bone aloft.

"Magnet bomb!" Tierra was too close at that point to dodge the attack, getting hit by all the chunks of metal gravitating towards her.

"Keep going you've got this! Create some cover with Sandstorm!" Tierra takes her bone in one paw and slams it on the metal floor. Sand begins to spin and spiral through the air obscuring vision and scouring the metal floor.

"Magnezone, use lock on!" "Now! Bone club once again!" Dashing into the spiraling sand, Tierra calls out a battle cry and a loud clang is heard. "Magnet bomb!" "Get out of the sand!" Tierra leaps backwards out of the sand and lands in a defensive pose, her bone in front of her, ready to block.

A moment passed and the attack still didn't come. "Did it faint?" You ask "I don't know" Jane replied "ref?" The ref/secretary shrugs unable to see. "MAGNEZONE, MAGNEZONE!" The metallic voice screams. "Magnezone! Hyper Beam!" Jane cried "protect! Now!" She held up her bone creating a bubble of energy around her.

Magnezone fired the blast directly at Tierra due to lock on, but it glanced of the shield she created, dissipating in the air. "Tierra! Earthquake, no holding back!" Raising her bone above her head, she plunged it into the ground setting off shock waves that knocked you off your feet. When the tremors stopped, the sand had settled and you could see Magnezone lying on the metal floor motionless.

"Magnezone is unable to battle! Tierra is the winner."

"Well done, very well done" Jane applauded "but what will you do against my next Pokemon? Go! Lanturn!"

'Im definitely going to have to switch, Tierra won't stand a chance, but who should I send out?' You think for a moment before you make a decision.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Ground!

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I rather not recall Pyrie in the field if i can avoid it and also her move set are inappropriate for this fight, Mistra is still inexperienced and i rather not tempt fate giving me a lesson about humility and preparation, excluding Tierra my only other choice that doesn't put me at clear disadvantage due to my opponent pokemon specialization in electric and water moves is psychic

Hopefully, the gym will remain intact this time: "Come out Sylvia"

My first mate appear before me, with a spoon in her clawed hand, ready to fight..spoon? where she got that?

"Kadabra!" For a moment i find myself surprised in not hearing her real ^words^, but then i remember the disruption field, hopefully it won't bother her too much. Knowing Lanturn specialization and Jane good sense, i believe to have an enormous advantage on this fight. Just after the referee declare the start of the fight and Jane order her first attack, i find myself grateful for her father training before giving her to me: "Role Play!"

Sylvia doesn't seems bothered by the disruption field, and nodding, flash green with Lanturn for a second. That just take the cake

Jane freeze for a moment as her face show a sudden flash of anger before she can hide it behind her professionalism: "..a tactician then, cleaver, i should have guessed that after our first match, originally i expected a strong opponent, not a cunning one. Very well, Casia, Rain Dance and follow with Surf!"

The air around inside the battlefield suddenly become humid, and i watch amazed as real black cloud are forming above our head, i am glad to have exchanged Sylvia ability with Volt Absorb because if i hadn't...lighting-based moves always strike true while raining and even if Lanturn are unable to generate much power in combat, they are quite deadly if directed correctly: "Sylvia Teleport behind him and use Psychic"

Normally using Teleport in battle is very tiring for the user due to the necessity of gathering energy quickly, making the correct calculation in the very little time available isn't exactly a joke either. In short, she can't do it for long; i need a more decisive move or Sylvia reserve will get drained before we get the chance

An enormous wall of water gather behind the Lanturn quicker than i expected, it's an impressive move seeing a pokemon actually doing it, then she push herself forward and the enormous wall of water come down on Sylvia. Luckily she teleport just in time....i pity anyone stricken by such move.
Sylvia appear just behind the Lanturn and lift her up with Psychic before slamming her into the wall, then she use the move again to slam the water type just under Jane and reappear before me.

Casia slowly float up in midair as all her kind of pokemon do, i have to ask a professor how they do that, and ready herself for another command. Jane knowing i can't continue order Sylvia teleporting around for long, order another surf. Surf too hoverer isn't a easy move to pull out, especially to non pure water type: "Again Sylvia"

Once more just before the wall of water can crush down on her, Sylvia teleport behind Casia, but to a different position this time, and slam the exposed Lanturn down a few times before releasing it as the move energy gathered for the move exhaust, then once more, she reappear before me

I am down to one move, while Jane can still ask for two, now what-

"Blizzard!"

Shit! The water is still on the field, even if it doesn't it the ground will become slippery, Casia can float if she remain still or move only slightly but..why not me- hem Sylvia too? She is a psychic after all

"Sylvia combine Double Team with Teleport then bash her around, don't let her charge up!"

"Kadabraaaaa!"

Sylvia form shift then gathering all her strength, she teleport around the field in short burst, making her copy appear and disappear at the same time as she do, confusing both Casia and Jane..me too actually, without our connection i can't determine who is the real one anymore

Casia stop mid charge, a few snowflake drop above her, she is trying to understand witch Sylvia is the real one, unsuccessfully apparently, Then as the ^teleporting storm^ end, Jane order an attack on the Sylvia behind Casia: "Behind, Giga Impact!"

Casia turn and impressively quick gather all her strength, creating an enormous ball of semitransparent energy around her, beofre crashing herself and the sphere on Sylvia

BOOOM

"Sylvia!"

As the dust clear, a small still not fully visible hole is now present under Casia..... Just before Jane start to moker me, Sylvia appear before me glowing brightly green

"Kadabraaaaa!"

A wave of purplish energy materialize between Casia and Sylvia, Jane face is horrified at the magnitude of the psychic attack

BOOOM



I can clearly see that Sylvia reserve are exhausted, she is sweating and panting heavily. However Jane pokemon is faring much worse, she is on the ground outside the field, out.

The referee seems surprised by the force of Sylvia Psychic, in fact despite the small difference in execution, the attack is evidently the same.

"...Jane pokemon is unable to continue, the challenger win this round"

Jane recover her composure and recall her Lanturn: "I have underestimated you again, quite the trick Mr Jaden, a Teleport Field with multiple Double Team, impressive. The energy required for combining such moves
"An elite trainer indeed"

Sylvia teleport a last time in front of me, then she collapse on my arms: "Sylvia!"

She is awake, but too tired to even stand now, she has really given everything for me: "Thanks Sylvia, i will find a way to repay you"

Sylvia nod weakly, and i recall her in her ball. Three match on three, not bad. But now i have only another psychic and a Water type available, if Lanturn was her special pokemon for dealing with ground type and all, she has only another electric type at her disposal, witch mean no Nysa...how she will react to a Latias i wonder

Jane stare at me for a few seconds: "My compliments Mr Jaden, you are worthy of your title....but knowing of your arrival here, i was able to convince a very special guest to be present in our humble gym. It wasn't easy, and he accepted only after i mentioned you name Mr. Jaden, i am not sure why but right now, frankly i don't care. Let's give all our attention to our special guest of honor, a pokemon considered Legendary in the region once know as Unova and surely a worthy opponent even for you Mr. Jaden"

Jane threw a ball on the field: "Let's give a warm welcome to one of the group know as Kami trio, Thundurus!"

"Thundurus!"

Well, she won't react as badly as i originally thought. Maybe. Should i tell her that Zekrom is a possible candidate for mateship with me?

Nah, i am not in the mood for hysteric right now
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Sylvia's smart show. Plus next

choices: Back at the Pokemon center rest for the night
Back at the Pokemon center, rest for a while, then to lake crystal!
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"I think this might change your tune a little" you shout confidently."let's give 'em a good show Lyrica! Come on out!" You toss the pokeball you retrieved from your belt, into the air. With a flash of light and a loud "Latias!" Lyrica enters the field.

"Latias lati" seeming slightly befuddled when you don't respond you explain the situation. "Telepathic nullification devices of some sort. I can't understand you right now." A look of understanding crosses her face closely followed by one of irritation. "I know it's a little frustrating but stay calm, our opponent isn't just any Pokemon,"

From the sideline, the referee noticed your signal and announced "Ready? Begin!" "Thundurus agility! Then crunch!"

Thundurus cries out and begins to move extremely fast, too fast for you to keep track. Lyrica on the other hand followed his movements perfectly. "Lyrica! Reflect type!" With a cry she glows green for a moment, before Thundurus dashes straight towards her, fangs beared. "Charm!" Lyrica flashes Thundurus with an endearing smile followed by a blown kiss.

Unfortunately Thundurus's crunch still hits, however due to the effects of reflect type and charm, it does practically no damage. "Strike back! Ice beam!"

Lyrica opens her maw and forms a small, light blue sphere. "Latias!" Her cry rings out, followed by a blast of sub-zero energy. Thundurus roars in pain as the super-effective attack forces him to the ground. "Glad I bought that TM" you grin to yourself.

"Psychic! Don't let him back into the air!" Lyrica follows your command. seizing Thundurus with her telekinetic power she slams him into the steel floor multiple times. "Thundurus" weakly the bruised legendary floats back into the air.

"Let's end this! Ice beam." No such luck before the move hits, he is up and moving with a purpose. "Try to find a movement pattern, if you can, he's finished!" "Thunder punch!" Wasting no time Jane gives the command, thundurus roars and rushes towards Lyrica at a blistering speed.

"Look out!" Your warning came too late as Lyrica was sent plummeting to the ground, sparking with electricity. "Now we end this! Lyrica! Mist ball!" Shaking off the blow Lyrica's eyes flash and a ball of white mist formed between her claws. "Wait for it. We can't afford to miss" you mumble as Thundurus flits through the air.

"Now!" With a battle cry, Lyrica launched the ball in her grip in a seemingly random direction. "Where were you aiming" Jane laughs only to be drowned out by a large bang and roar of pain.

While dashing about Thundurus had ran straight into the mist ball, knocking himself out. "Yes! You did it." Lyrica rushes towards you and sweeps you into an airborne hug. "did you plan all that out?" "yeah, it was defiantly some of my best work!"

"You did good Thundurus, return. Well Jaden I'm impressed. I've never seen a style quite like that." Motioning for the ref to come over she continues "you have proven you and your Pokemon to be strong in both body and mind, therefore I present you with this!" She took a box from the referee and pulled off the cover dramatically. "The strike badge!" Under the cloth sat a small badge. In the shape of a bolt of lightning falling from a cloud it shone with a lusterous glow. "Jaden, you are a magnificent trainer. I hope to see you again someday." Leaving you with those words of encouragement Jane leaves you with your Pokemon and the referee. "Jaden! Jaden! That was fantastic!" Rubica called out from her place on the floor. "Hey Rubica, how was your battle?" "Not too good, we lost. But that's okay you win some you lose some"

"Ahem Mr. Jaden there are some case sensitive files in my office for you. Would you like me to get them?" "Oh? Yes please"

With a nod of her head she turns and quickly runs off to gather the documents. "I've got to get Sylvia to Joy she's exhausted."

Apparently done sitting back Pyrie wraps her arms around your shoulders, giving you a lick on the cheek. Reaching behind your head, you rub her head, earning some affectionate growls. "Mr. Jaden, here are the files you requested. Have a nice day!"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Bring it on!

choices: Two pokemon are awaiting me in the back room. Talk only, bout..
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I have just won another badge, a dual electric-fire this time, nothing too fancy really, but it will look good in my collection. Deciding to eat something before having a much needed shower, i am stopped by Henri, the other gym leader

Still suited in the exact same way he was before battling Rubuca, i can descry a small frown on his face: "Congratulation for your victory Mr Jaden, i have heard that despite his best effort, even Thundurus couldn't prevent your success, well done"

"Eh..thanks?"

"Yes indeed, however i have also heard that your Latias, impressive having one so early in your journey by the way, have been ordered to execute 5 distinctive moves during the match, while in any official battle the rules allow only 4"

I gulp nervously, replaying the last battle with Lyrica in my head, and sure enough, Mist Ball was the fifth move i called, the forth being Psychic. Shit!

"Not to worry MR. Jaden, in fact Jane too violated the rules by calling an unsanctioned pokemon on the field"

...Really?: "Unsanctioned? You mean Thundurus?"

Henri nod, a sad expression on his face: "Yes, him. As you Should know Mr. Jaden, only captured or otherwise authorized pokemon are allowed on the field. Simply bringing a pokemon on the field with a ball registered on your name is not enough to qualify such pokemon as yours, it must also be ^tagged^ by the ball using the unique code every trainer or breeder posses, it's automatically given when the pokeball connect to the pokegear after the capture has been successful, or when the pokemon is examined in a sanctioned center for the first time. Of course calling it tag is mostly incorrect, such id is valid only while the pokemon is inside it's respective ball and do not carry over when he or she are released from it."

Urgh, too much technical stuff, it's not that it's complicated or that i do not understand it, it's mandatory in school anyway. Nah, i am just not in the mood: "Yes i remember..something from school, the code change every time the pokemon is stored within, sort of randomized every time right?"

"Mph Mr. Jaden, not random, it's based on a very specific code generated with a combination of numbers obtained from your personal ID and others values, most of them are known only to Database Central, such codes are too valuable for public knowledge"

Yeah, yeah, i know, not that it helped any against Team Rocket, Team Magma, Team Plasma....or Team Shadow: "It should prevent pokemon from being stolen and used in any official competition right? It never stopped the various teams to abuse the pokeballs anyway"

Henri exhale, clearly both upset and tired from the argument: "True...they simply remove the tag and replace it with a generic one of their own invention, they can't still participate in any official tourney.."

I finish his phrase: "But they just don't care anyway"

He nod: "Thundurus is not one of my partner pokemon, and he was not sanctioned for use in that or any other official battle either, he just accepted to combat at her side when your presence here would have required it Mr. Jaden, but only in an friendly or any kind unofficial match between you two, not in a match with a badge as a reward"

I know where this conversation is going: "..a draw then? My mistake for hers?"

"......Yes"

"Accepted, she risk more then me if i remember the regulation correctly, beside i liked how she tried to balance out the issue of my..status"
I hate that word, i feel like a shiny pokemon at the breeding center

"..Mr. Jaden would need to simply fight another match in replacement of the one where the rules has been broken, at worst...Jane risk her license as a gym leader if the league where to be informed of what transpired in that last match...Mr. Jaden. I doubt they would do much more then suspend her but..i would like not to risk it"

"...It isn't the first time, is it?"

Henri doesn't even try to deny it: "It's not, she never used such methods against novice or unprepared trainer however, despite what it may seems she has eye for talent, and trouble"

I chuckle: "I have both, id say more of the latter given recent event tough"

"Admitting your problems it's the first step in solving them"

I look toward Henri, giving him an unamused look

"I leave you to your affair then Mr.Jaden, i bid you good day"

Good riddance i say. Rubica literally appear from nowhere: "Su Jaden?"

"Ah! Where the..*pfff* where did....*pant*...i hate you"

Smiling she reply: "Awwww Love you too, sooo, what he wanted?"

"None of your business woman, shoo"

"Hmp whatever, i don't care anyway"

Sure you don't: " In that case you know where the door is, oh and while you are out could you please check the ranger station? I want to know if there are been any sighting of..you know who."

"And what will you do in the meantime, oh mighty Jaden? Helping your team ^Relax^ after the hardship of winning a badge?"

Why you little, sigh, nope, much much worse: "I need to call mom.....never talked to her since i left, she is gonna be pissed i just know it"

"You never called her? Really?"

"....No"

".....I'll get the info, see you later..right?"

"Maybe"


Reaching the pokemon center i greet Joy in a somewhat depressed manner, i try to be cheerful but i know that the odds are against me, and to make matter worse my only consolations and mates right now are feeling quite frisky to say the least. I did remind them that talking to a parent...no, talking to your Mom after having completely forgot to contact her for...how long? Forget it, anyway, for a quite some time...especially if above mentioned mother tend to be a tiny little bit over protective is....dangerous, for the eardrums anyway

"My Jaden, you look beaten, did you lost at the gym?"

"The gym are the last of my worries right now, and no, i won"

"Someting happened? Did your team got hurt or.."

Got hurt? They fought of course they got hurt, what question is that?: "Not really, just."
I pause for a second: "Didi you ever forgot to talk to your parents after they specifically recommended to contact them every now and then?"

Joy seems thoughtful for a moment: "Mom or Dad?"

"...Mom"

Joy retract slightly: "Since?"

"The beginning"

Joy remain still for a few moments, then she begin to make some strange signs with her hands: ".....May Arceus have mercy upon your soul"

"....Thanks joy, i needed that"



I don't feel ashamed to say that my legs tremble a little as i press the call button on my gear, i asked Joy for the better soundproofed room she had, as a response i got the ^special case breeding room^, that translated means: Pokemon that do it noisily, are desperate and need it NOW. Didn't even know such room existed, and Joy told me neither she did before a trainer came here last heat season with a bunch of Eevee

Needless to say, most of them mysteriously became Espeon or Umbreon by the time he left. Having Pyrie and Lyrica in my team, practically granted me the room by default, not that i have any intention of releasing them here, still..

Being completely disinterested in the how, i have left all my team with Joy for a quick checkup and revitalization, also i want to avoid the obvious, perhaps mom will help me forget the thought of Articuno gathering all the interested legendary...brrr

Confident that such feat will still take some time before reaching it's conclusion, i put up the best smile i can as mom answer the phone....



Joy greet me back as i return to the hall, she politely ignore my new hairstyle as i ask the form for a speaker replacement. With bureaucracy done, i find myself unsurprised to discover that ^loud noise^ is not an uncommon cause of decay for the integrated speaker of the pokegear, i have always thought it was because incautious trainer use their gear for playing pranks using Zubat or something. How wrong i was

Just before i get to retire in my room for a quick shower and nap, Joy call me back: "den, Jaden"

"Yeah? What?"

"Y foot yu em"

"Heh?"

Joy roll her eyes: "Forgot your Tom"

"Forgot Tom? Who's Tom?"

"I'll kep tm fnow, obvsly ned rest. Anwy tw- Two Members of our group want to speak with you, it's about Articuno, she has been sighted pretty much everywhere"

"I need a shower Joy, i really do"

"Don't worry, it won't take too long." Joy look around, spotting no pokemon nor human she come close and whisper: "They have said something about Lugia too"

Lugia....FUCK!
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Want rest, got unrest(ed)

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
With a turn of the handle and a light push the door to your room drifts open. Leaning in it is apparent that there is nobody there. "Maybe they left" you mumble to yourself. You step into the room only to have the door slam behind you. "Wha?" An invisible force slams you against the wall.

"Am I to believe you are Jaden?" A decidedly female voice sounds off from what sounds like right behind you? "Y-yeah" "prove it, why is Articuno traveling around the world?" "She is gathering all the potential mates in the world" the space in front of you twists and solidifies, molding itself into the shape of a Zoroark.

"Correct!" The Pokemon releases you and moves over to the bed where it sat. "You can come in now. He passed" the door to the balcony opens, and a Lucario walks in. "Great, lets move on to buisiness."
"Wait you're the operatives?" "Yes. Is there a problem?" Well no but you're not quite what I expected." zoroark chuckled "what were you expecting?" "um trench coats?" "hahaha trench coats!" she giggled "were not that cliche!"

"anyways we came here to inform you that Lugia is apparently moving in this direction from Jhoto." "I gathered as much from Joy" "yes but there's more. You have to be careful with her. Records show that she is prone to overreacting, and she is as bull headed as they come. Once she has a goal in mind she will almost never give up." Zoroark stood up off the bed. "We also think thought you should know that there's already quite a few legendary Pokemon in the area."

"I know" you reply "I met them a few nights ago" "which ones?" Lucario asked. You think for a moment "um Zekrom, Zapdos, Kyurem, Articuno, and I met Mesprit about a week ago. Actually I was supposed to meet her and her siblings after I beat the gym here." "Well that sort of makes our visit superfluous."

"Not at all, I appreciate the information about Lugia." "Your welcome. we need you, so don't make too many enemies." With a grin Lucario sticks out a paw to shake. "We wish you luck in all your endeavors. By the way I'm Luka, and this is Elisa" "we hope to see you again soon" the pair turns to the balcony door and kiss quickly before jumping out into the streets. You rush to the balcony, but they are nowhere to be seen. "Must've turned invisible"

You slide the door shut and fall onto the bed. "Damn, Lugia sound like she could be trouble, I hope they were exaggerating at least a little."

Your hand drops to your waist where your pokeballs usually are. When you don't find them you bolt up. "My team! Where? Where are they?" You stop as you remember. "Right they're with Joy."

You exit your room making sure to lock it behind you, and walking back to the lobby.

"Ah Jaden! Trench coats? Really?" You falter for a moment before flinging your arms into the air "I don't even fucking care how you know that. Could I have the girls back?" "Sure, here you go! All in perfect health!" Holding out a tray with your pokeballs on it she smiles warmly. "Have a nice day!" You collect your team and clip them to your belt. "Thanks Joy. I'll see you later"

You pass through the sliding doorway and walk out into the streets.

"I've still got a lot of daylight left, maybe I should go see Mesprit." You walk down the road contemplating your options when you hear Rubica calling your name. "Jaden! Jaden! Wait up!" You turn around and see her sprinting up the street breathing heavily. "Jaden! I just saw Articuno!" Instantly you freeze up. "What did you just say?" Rubica catches up with you and pants heavily. "Articuno *gasp* was in the sky *gasp* to the north of the city *gasp* near the lake" "damn, I guess I should head over there. I don't really want to go it'll be pure chaos" Rubica stood up having regained her breath.

"I'm going too!" "Sorry Rubica, I can't let you go, the legends might take it the wrong way" "but.." "Ahh ahh ah! No buts! You're staying here!" Sticking out her lower lip she grinds her heel into the ground "I'm going with you!"

"*sigh* you're too stubborn. Sylvia come out!" You open the pokeball containing your Pokemon, releasing her into the world. "Jaden!" she jumps into a hug. "Hey Sylvia, could you teleport the two of us to the north gate?" "sure"

A flash of light and a small popping sound later you find yourself standing just outside of the city. "Thanks, Sylvia. Articuno is supposed to be near the lake, so we should try to get there quickly. I want to get this over with."

You carry Sylvia most of the way to the lake as part your thanks for the gym battle. When you arrive all appears calm, but you know from experience that they are probably nearby. "you made it!" Mesprit shoots out of the lake followed by two other, similar Pokemon. "These are my siblings, Azelf, and Uxie" she gestured first to the blue highlighted one,and then to the gold. You take a look at your two new acquaintances. Azelf had a body practically identical to Mesprit's with the exception of his head. Instead of the pink bangles, he had three crests pointing to the rear of his head, of a bold blue color. Uxie also had a similar body. Her head was gold and had the appearance of a segmented helmet. You noted that her eyes were closed.

Azelf began to speak telepathically "Jaden, Mesprit told us how you rescued her from team shadow. We are in your debt" "it was nothing really, I was going to beat them up anyways." Uxie floated forward. "irrelevant, you aided our sister, now, we will aid you." she turned and floated to the left a ways. "team shadow has bases all over the continent. Some are hidden in the wilds, others are in plain sight. I can see most everything that goes on. I know of nearly everything."

"If you knew everything, then wouldn't you essentially be unbeatable in battle?" "in theory" she turned and smiled, her eyes still closed. "back to the topic at hand. . . Umm what was I saying?" Mesprit covered her face with a small paw while Azelf just shook his head. "team shadow bases, sister" "ah yes! But I'm afraid that will have to wait."

You scratch your head, you were having trouble following this conversation. "Why?" "it's simple, Articuno is almost here, and she isn't alone."
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Two pokemon are awaiting me in the back room. T...

choices: Lugia arrive later, after many other, she still know how to draw attention
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Hearing Uxie saying the words Articuno and coming make me freeze on the spot, i close my eyes and pray for whosoever power that can hear hear me, to save whats left of my integrity, the physical one i mean, i know i can't escape, can't run away from my fate. Thinking about it, i am not really disturbed to have a pokemon as a mate, it's my inability to choose if i wish it or not that bother me

Also knowing that rejecting any of them may have repercussion for the whole world, well, i just don't want to think about it

Opening my eyes, i find Uxie touching my forehead with her own, in my actual state the image of her so close trigger a reaction that make me literally jump back colliding with Rubica and sending us both to the ground.....with me over her

"Jaden, what the-"

"Rubica! I told you to sty away! It could be dangerous, they may-"

The voice of Uxie resonate in my head, calming me a little: "Do not worry Jaden, while some Legendary may react strongly at your refusal, your mates, us and even Arceus, will defend your choice and calm down any of us that do not understand be it by reason or by pride, Your choice"

I slowly get up, helping Rubica returning on foot: "What if i am wrong? What if...if i can't..."

Mesprit float towards me: "I am the one responsible for many of the emotions you are now feeling Jaden, i would like to tell you to not worry, to help you deal with the feeling of anger or...despair somehow, but i can't. As a legendary i can only tell you to be strong and resolute. because all the creature that will present themselves before thee, have only one objective one purpose. Ending the loneliness that clutched their heart since their first day as adult, a torment that i too, knew all to well"

I am not sure how to reply at her words, but i too have the right to decide what i want..and what i do not want, what i like..and what to hate with all my being, and right now, if i had a weapon strong enough to bring pain to Arceus....i would have used it, god it may even be, but still mortal to my eyes, to my hate: "And my decision? What of them, hm?"

I look at Mesprit straight into her amber eyes: "What.of.them? Do you realize how...useless i fell right now? How angry at being seen as nothing more than a giant.fucking.cock? Do- does i even- bah!"

Mespirit look down, ashamed of her behavior, i don't think she is wrong, but i too, am not. Azelf the only male legendary i have ever meet, place one of his small paw on my shoulder: "You have right, Jaden. But as probably you have already guessed, my sister too, is suffering, and she too is tempted to enter the competition for your mateship, but despite her feelings, she do not. Do not ask more from her, she can't help you on this regard. But maybe..."

"Maybe...what?"

"Maybe she can help you choose, my friend.....can i...call you friend?"

I hesitate for a moment, but i see no reason to deny him this request: "I would be grateful for the company of a male after...everything"

I can feel his emotion now that he is touching me, and i can feel his happiness at my acceptance of him as my friend: "It's not that bad is it? Lot's of females, powerful one too, and all of them coming from every part of the world only to beg your love"

"With all the responsibilities it bring"

"Well, yes. But, how many trainers would give everything to be in your position Jaden, how many will give their very soul for just the chance of being You?"

"If there are so many, then why don't they go torment them instead? I want more then....fuck anything that breathe Azelf, i want more, much more...and i fell so empty..cold"
I am not sure if it's because he too is a male but, i can relate with him, sort of, far better then with anyone else since the beginning of all this...whorehouse

".....Tell you what, me and my sisters will help you skimming the results, and who know, maybe you will realize that..most legendary wish for a lover, not just a cock. It's just, well, how can i explain it to you...if your father would have came to you one day and said: Son, one day part of the essence of this very world will bow to every whim or desire. But, if i find you abuse it for any reason the punishment will be swift and absolute, oh and also you are forbidden to love and have any kind of sexual relationship with any living, and/or nonliving(don't ask), creature or otherwise being present in this world and beyond, clear?"

"Son of a-"

"Pretty much, soooo, let's say that you discover that entropy is not an issue for you, you grow but don't get older, not a day, a thousand years nothing more then a breeze for you. Won't you get horny after a century or two?"

"A lot sooner i think"

"Hehehehe, yeah, me too. Anyway, can you now understand what kind of torment they, us all, we have to endure? Day after day, decade after decade, of being horny, lonely, empty just like you are now?"

"I am not horny at the moment"

"Yes well you got the point no?"

He remove his paw and float in front of me: "If anything i feel pity for them, that's doesn't make me feel any better"

"Nor it should, i am merely explaining our position in the world. So, still feel ready to give up?"

"I wanted some comfort, and i get a symposium on why all female legendary want to fuck me silly, was that your idea of emotional support?"

"I am good at it ah? Sister alway tell me that i am obnoxious and too rational at times, i am not sure to understand what she means"

"...Right, can we talk about something else? Please?"
I swear my condition is worsening just by looking at him

"Sure, what about?"

"You said something about skimming results, of what?"

"A gauntlet, what else? A series of tiring but mostly painless endeavors to prove their respective skills in various fields, both metal and physical....of course sexual one as to be included as well, sorry, it's part of the game"

Game? What the: "Are you serious?"

"Unless you have a better idea, or want to breed them all....yeah? If you don't give them something to focus on, all their attention will be focused on you, Jaden, or fighting each other, and i believe we all agree that a group of legendary fighting each other to exhaustion or worse may not be..practical"

To put it mildly: "And the winner will have me as a prize?"

"No, you Jaden will be the judge, the absolute ruler of this competitions, You will decide between the two or more contenders, the one you are more interested in. I admit i do expect trouble, but mostly, everything should be fine...at least until you will keep you word, they will also probably want to attend in the claiming, probably"

What?! "Attend?! b-but, i must fuck them in public now?!"

"It will be a good methods to both confirm your claiming and placate any legendary that may want to accuse you of stalling. Also With everyone present, none will dare to interfere with the ritual"

"He call it ritual, he-hehe, screw you Azelf"

A loud booming sound attract my attention, looking up i notice Articuno and Zekrom quickly coming towards me, Articuno then speak with an official tone: "Greetings Jaden, as promised i brought all the interested legendary for you to chose from, some will arrive quicker then others so, i ask you to be patient and wait for all of us to arrive before making your decision"

I am hesitant to ask, but i know i must: "How many?"

Zekrom reply to my question in a way that remind me of a judge or something, this is serious: "All the legendary the have openly showed interest and that will reach us today are: Zapdos, Articuno, Rakoyiou, Victini, Mewtwo, Dialga, Reshiram, Zekrom, Kyurem, and while she didn't reply directly, i believe that Lugia too will be present soon enough. Others possible match are declared their neutrality in the matter Jaden, expect friendship and attachment from them, but they will not be your mates, their names are: Jirachi, Deoxys, Giratina, Palkia."

So many, and She has also mentioned herself in third person? This is it then, they are serious about all of this

Zekrom continue: "A few of us has not yet declared their intention and may or may not be present today, their names are: Mesprit, Uxie, Heatran. That will be all."

I look towards the lake trio, Mesprit is fidgeting with her paws while Uxie is unreadable as ever, of course Azelf is smiling like a fool: "Do not worry Jaden, my sister will not let their feeling interfere with the judgment or the gauntlet, if you still wish to have one of them later however well, we will find something....hihihihi"

Bastard, my only relied is that most legendary are in competition with each other and taking one may exclude another, for now i know for sure about Zapdos and Articuno problems with Reshiram, that Victini and Mewtwo can't stand each other, and that Rakoyiou may or may not have some incomprehension with..someone maybe Zapdos or Reshiram, what else hmmmmm ah yeah i bet that Kyurem will not accept to be my mate shy as she is unless all her sister are with her, good, now about Lugia..

Articuno voice disrupt my train of toughs: "Jaden if i may...Lugia has remained alone for a very long time, and probably she is..desperate, and she will do nearly everything in her power to win you over, even kidnapping you if necessary. Also it may be awkward having to share you with her Jaden, both me and Zapdos agree, if you chose her...it may be difficult for us to being your mates"

A kidnapping legendary now? Fantastic, now what else. Arceus?..no, just no
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Jaden and his tribulation, part one

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"I'll be right back, I need to calm down before anyone else gets here." You stalk off, holding your head with one hand. "Dammit Arceus if I ever see you I will hurt you." As you get further from the group you get the uneasy feeling that you are being watched.

"Is someone there?" The feeling recedes slightly and you continue walking only for it to escalate again. "I know you're there! Come out!" "hmm very well. You did catch on." the trees to your left shake slightly and from them fall a humanoid figure. It lands on its feet and walks towards you. "greetings, Jaden I am Mewtwo. I do hope you chose me" she was mostly a light purple color with a deeper shaded tail. There were two crests on her head resembling ears. Her head and shoulders were connected behind her neck by a small section of flesh.

her voice flowed through your mind like honey making it somewhat difficult to think. " we could have such fun together" she got closer and closer reaching out to you. But when she was almost upon you another voice rang out inside your head instantly clearing the fog. "bitch! Get away from him!" "You!" Mewtwo snarled behind you you see a small Pokemon floating in the air. Mostly covered in cream fur with red highlights, it had two small wings on its lower back.

" if you think you can just waltz in here and take him before anyone notices, you're dead wrong." "And let me guess, you think you can stop me?" Mewtwo laughed, "you're a hundred years too early to fight me!" they converged upon you both clutching one of your arms. "ENOUGH!" You thunder. "IF THE TWO OF YOU ARE SO IMMATURE THAT YOU CAN'T AVOID PETTY ARGUMENTS SUCH AS THESE THEN I WILL HAVE NO CHOICE BUT TO ELIMINATE YOU FROM THE POSSIBLE CHOICES!" You yank your arms out of their grip and straighten your shirt as they stare dumbfounded.

Mewtwo is the first to regain her composure, she drops to her ones and bows " please forgive me Jaden! I-i don't want to new lone anymore!" "I would like to apologize too. I am Victini. It's a pleasure to meet you." "it's nice to meet you too" you kneel before Mewtwowho still has her head lowered. You place a finger under her chin and raise her face until she is looking at you. She has tears welling up "I'm sorry I yelled, but I refuse to be treated like a prize" you grab an arm and gently pull her to her feet. "I'm ashamed of myself" she murmured. "It's alright just remember I have emotions too." She nodded wiping the tears away.

You jump slightly as a small pair of arms wrap around your head. "Where is everyone else?" Victini clamped onto the back of your head. "They were just up here" you can feel the heat from Victini's crotch against the back of your neck. "Jaden you've calmed down, I hope? Oh? You found those two."

"What do you mean'those two'?" Victini growled her eyes narrowing. "nothing really, you two just fight all the time. It's a miracle that you haven't torn Jaden to shreds!" "I kinda had to throw down the law." Azelf raised his eyebrow "yeah if they continue to fight they will be removed from the gauntlet." "Well! I'm impressed Jaden. You do have the strength of will needed to handle some of the legendaries."

"Jaden, more will be here soon" Uxie warned.

Not a minute later a deafening roar echoes through the air and a large quadrupedal form breaks through the clouds. Sporting steel plates and a large metal crest on its back the Pokemon landed heavily, shaking the earth. "Greetings Jaden. Dialga at your service." "It is a honor Dialga" "no the honor is mine"

"Where is he?!" the psychic voice blasted through your head bringing you to your knees. "F-fuck!" You groan as you clutch your head.

You hear Rubica moan in pain. "Stop!" You shove yourself to your feet. "so you are the inestimable Jaden, Articuno wasn't exaggerating, you are cute" the mental pressure recedes only to be replaced by a powerful burst of wind. At the epicenter of the wind a figure appears.

Much like a dragon in appearance, it is mostly white with a blue underbelly and blue spines in two rows along its back. Two large dexterous wings extend from its sides, their motions creating a near-hurricane force wind.

"I am Lugia, I am here to claim my mate." "you assume too much Lugia, I have not chosen as of yet. You would do well to remember that." "You have a great deal of spirit, I like that" she said huskily. Alighting softly on the ground she takes several steps towards you.

"Lugia! Stop!" two figures burst from the clouds landing between you and Lugia. "Kyurem! And Reshiram I presume?" The newcomer flashes you a quick smile before focusing her blue glare solidly on Lugia. "We all heard him say that he has not chosen, are you truly so conceited to think he would only choose you?" "I am not conceited!" Lugia hissed "Then remember that HE has final say in this matter! Not you"

Lugia assumes a resting position and smiles sweetly at you. "she didn't do anything did she?" kyurem asks. you look to Rubica who gives you a thumbs up, still looking somewhat unsteady. "Nothing lasting at least" you grimace "she's powerful, but really pushy and presumptive, kinda gets on my nerves" Kyurem nods and Reshiram leans down to your eye level.

"you really are cute, you know that right?" "umm no I didn't but thank you" "my pleasure, she wraps you in her white wings and almost immediately the heat makes you drowsy. "No-no, sorry I can't allow this sort of thing" you twist out of her grip and take a seat next to a tree.

She seems slightly disappointed but accepts what you say. "Alright, if you say so" "thank you" you sigh and lean back.





A loud roar pierces your ears and you bolt upright jolted from your accidental nap. "What- who is that?" "Raikou" Uxie replied "she is close"

You realized that Mesprit and Uxie had curled up with you as you slept. "We'll talk about this later" you rose to your feet in time to greet the lightning legendary. She came rushing out if the trees at a breakneck pace, sliding to a stop in front of you.

"greetings! Jaden I am Raikou! I would love to be your mate!" "it's a pleasure to meet you" "Zapdos was right behind me, I don't know where- oh there she is!" sure enough in the sky you see Zapdos flying towards the now-large group.
"Jaden! It's good to see you! Unfortunately I could not find Cresselia, so we must assume she is not coming."

"Alright then I suppose we begin" immediately the various legendaries arranged themselves in a circle around you. "Azelf what should the first test be?"

"well I think the first test should be one of pure strength."

"Alright strength it is then! Lets start with physical strength. The one who lifts the most weight shall be the victor! One at a time, starting with...Zekrom!"

choices: Zapdos prove herself, Mespirit sure is a tricky one. Victini is "worse"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Truth to be told, these tests are not just for show, the whole idea is to see how they react when something is asked from them, i..well me and the lake trio actually will ask to all my potential mates to accomplish seemingly simple acts, by analyzing their reaction to our request we will be able to determine their respective intentions, what really lies behind their facade of their whorish ways

They may be horny alright, after a few century i would be too, but that doesn't really justify their behavior even when the big L word is involved, if it's even involved at all. There must be something more, i can feel it, it must be

Zekrom nod, acknowledging my request: "What do you wish of me?"

"I would like to test both your ability to gather energy in a difficult situation, and your resolve" I think quickly, willing my thoughts to focus on a single problem, something that would be able to stress a legendary enough to show me her true color, a legendary capable to level a city in less then a minute i remind myself....shit the city!

"The city! it's only a matter of time before-"

Uxie interrupt my rambling: "We have already solved this problem m-Jaden, the three of us have already placed a mass illusion field over the lake and it's surrounding, none be it pokemon or human, will notice anything...i am also denying the acquisition of information regarding our presence here, Mesprit is implanting a sense indifference over the rumors claiming the sighting of Articuno, while Azelf is leeching away the willingness to check such rumors"

"....you can do that? I-i mean, manipulating humans...so easily?"

Azelf sensing my distress immediately came forth: "No Jaden, we can't, the other legendary would investigate on the matter and believe me, they would know if something like that would happen, also Arceus already gave it's reluctant consent at our plan and gave us a temporary boost in power to actually pull it off. Even so, we will not be able to hold it for long, Dialga already told us that altering the time line before the gauntlet is completed may compromise our continuum so, this is the only solution we could apply without worrying about consequences...mostly"

They are psychic, i suppose that altering other creature perception it's in their nature or something, aren't psychic one of the most disabling element of it all? Well the most deceiving at least: "Ok, i suppose, it's all right, but there was really no other way? Moving someplace more..isolated?"

"Sure, mention me a place, any place, where a congregation of legendary would have gone completely unnoticed and we transfer all of us there...the legendary circle hall doesn't count"

Not sure what he was referring about the hall but, i got the point, nowhere is the answer, not for long anyway: "Fine"

I turn towards the eagerly waiting electric/dragon, she seems positively excited to prove herself: "I would like to see you use your Fusion Bolt to carve your general shape on rocky grounds, then disperse the bolt in a safe manner. All while remaining in the air"

I expected any of the legendary, or at least Zekrom to flinch, instead she just take the air and start to charge electricity around herself. I look at her intently, noticing how easily she can gather the enormous amount of energy necessary for accomplishing such feat, controlling that amount of electricity around herself and literally making it dance is surely no easy feat, but she seems undeterred in her actions

I turn towards Mesprit intent in asking her a few questions, instead i find my face straight between her legs as she was floating right at the side of my head, due to my mouth open in the act of speaking i find my lips ^kissing^ her sex slightly, unexpectedly she press her hips on my mouth instead of pushing away as natural to do when touching something by accident. Trying to speak my tongue end up touching the lips of her sex, a flavor i can't describe invade my senses as Mespirit moan in my head, i then end up falling on my ass as i try to distance myself from the tricky psychic

Mespirit remain to float as i try to understand what just happened, the gear in my head didn't take more then a second to click in place, Uxie interrupt my train of thoughts: "Do please excuse my sister eagerness Jaden, she is..excited to the idea of assisting in choosing-"

"Who she will share me with?"

Silence is the only sound echoing, beside Zekrom Fusion Bolt shaping her form on the ground, she is proving both power and strength of will by using her power as i requested, all while remaining in the air.

"Uxie can you answer my question?" I get up returning on my feet, Mesprit lok at me in a funny way, she is not smiling or anything, just..i don't know, she look quite happy with herself, i already know that not matter what, she will try any trick in her book to add herself to the group, unless i find something to convince her otherwise, but i won't bet on it

"What question Jaden? If my sister and i will be among your mates after the gauntlet?"

"You damn very well know what question i want the answer to"

She seems immobile for a few moments, then: "The other gifted Jaden, there are so few of them. There are no other Psychic gifted, there was four, one is dead in the cataclysm, one didn't awaken and the last..was lost to us. There is another gifted with fire, but none else with electric or ice, there are never been another with ice, nor will ever"

"How many are lost?"

"Many, few awaken and others refused to undergo Arceus law"

"Undergo? Mph curious choice of words Uxie, but why should if the others has not, mmm?"

"..Do you wish to leave all of us alone then?"

I reflect on her words, knowing that she probably already know the answer, but i suppose that i didn't, yet: "No, i don't even want to imagine...no, i won't"

Uxie smile for the first time, never since the short time i knew her, she had expressed anything but a contemplative ^aura^ around her

"That doesn't mean that i gonna accept anything trowed at me, nor necessarily you or your sister"

Uxie still smile, letting me understand that she already knew the answer: "Really? Who first?"

"Sister, she will tempt you and mate with you two times, then i...will hold your essence within me"

"There are no other possible..end?"

She look at me curiously: "Do you not want us?It depend, it may change, but it very probable, yes"

Zekrom conclude her work then make her bolt disperse in a column of light and explode harmlessly. Quite the spectacle. She then land and turn towards me, i nod: "Quite the spectacle Zekrom, please rest. Zapdos, you are next. Instead of strength prove your ability to control your element, Azelf state the limit of her test, begin when ready"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: A test for answer, by who i wonder

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Zapdos! Your task is to form a sphere of lightning and sustain it for a set period." with a nod Zapdos shot into the air buzzing with electricity. Several spirals in the air later she shot several blasts into a single point, forming a small ball. As she continued it grew until it was about eight feet in diameter.

"Mesprit I need to-" you turn to face her and duck under her to avoid further mishaps. "Ah ah ah, fool me once shame on you, fool me twice shame on me!" "but it feels so good!" she whined, exposing her nethers to you. "Please cover yourself" with a pout she did as you asked. "I've been waiting for a mate for hundreds of years and the first viable option doesn't like me" she mumbled clearly depressed.

"Woah woah woah! Now I never said I didn't like you!" Immediately her demeanour changes,slipping from soul crushing depression to rib crushing joy, your ribs that is. "Gah! Can't breathe!" "sorry you just made me so happy" she snuggled up close, hugging your neck and nuzzling your cheek. "Alright alright! That's enough" you pry her off and set her back into the air.

"She's not the only one who has been waiting" a low sensual voice flowed through your mind. You feel a pair of small hands rub your shoulders, moving in small circles. "Victini?" "yes?" you feel an envigorating energy flow into you from the points of contact. 'So the legends are true, somewhat at least, she really can pass energy into others. Definatley would be a valuable member of the team.' Pushing these thoughts aside you reach over your shoulders and grab the small legendary Pokemon.

Lifting her over your shoulders she spreads her legs apart revealing an enticing aroma. "Smells like enigma berries" you mumble, absently stroking Victini's head. "Arceus I'm horny" that stray thought snaps you out of your daze. "shit I didn't mean to project that" she berated herself before flashing you with an adorable smile. "Nope!" You drop her and look up to see Zapdos still maintaining the orb.

"Uhh don't you think she's been doing that for long enough?" hmm? Oh yes, Zapdos! You may stop now!" Zapdos allows the sphere to dissolve before returning to the earth. "Thank you Zapdos, take a rest" she nodded her head and sat down next to a tree.

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Lugia, step forward"

Her imposing form calmly pass through the small mob of legendary, her voice briefly remind me of silk, one of her psychic trick i wager: "What are your desire my consort?"

Consort? She didn't even refer to me as her mate now?: "I am Not..your consort or mate or whatever, i am Jaden a free trainer that can very well decide to remove you from this gauntlet Lugia, remember that"

Lugia smile wickedly, licking her lips: "Anything for you"

Focus Jaden, she is doing it on purpose: "I would like to see your legendary weather manipulation ability at work, Do Not damage this area in any significant way. When done, show me your unique move, Aeroblast on any non living target you deem appropriate"

A stinging feeling suddenly begin to manifest to my forehead preventing me from thinking clearly, a second later the feeling disappear, Azelf float in front of me: "Lugia desist immediately, or be expelled from the competition!"

Now that the disturbance is gone, i easily notice Azelf gem glowing softly, did Lugia attempted...what?

"I was merely suggesting to my c-..Jaden, a more efficient way to test my powers, that's all"

"No suggestion Lugia, simply fulfill Jaden request or don't"

Lugia seems considering her option before answering: "Very well, i will begin immediately"

With her last words, Lugia flap her wings and fly towards the shore of the lake. Azelf then turn towards me: "Are you alright?" I nod briefly: "Tough luck Jaden, just another meter away and none of us would have noticed a thing, she is very skilled in her gift"

The thought of expelling her from the competition appear more and more tempting every second, but even i know that banishing her now will not solve a thing, she is far too determined to gave up that easily: "What she.."

"Not sure, nothing drastic however, the quantity of psychic energy she used was very low, id say a subliminal thoughts or something like that, i don't know Jaden, as i have already said she is one of the most skilled psychic user that i know of, i can only guarantee that it wasn't an attempt to control or otherwise manipulate your perception significantly, but beside that.."

"She wanted an edge then"

Azelf shrug: "Probably. Why don't you ask sister, she probably know"

"No offense Azelf, but i don't believe that she will give me this particular information for free, nor i believe she know everything"

"Awww you know my sister already? Hehe, i like you Jaden, truly"

I look at him with mocked concern: "Sorry Azy, female only for me"

"What? What i- Hey! I am not like that!"

"Any problem with it?"

"Wh- No! How they decide to use their time is none of my concern, as long as i am Not involved at least"

"Seconded, can i hope in any of the poke present here today? You know being persuaded in...not involving me?"

Azelf lips curve in an unnatural big smile: "Not a chance in tartarus my friend. Well they May be persuaded to..give an helping hand, or paw, to another p-"

"I got it! No need to specify the details"

Mesprit interrupt us both: "it's not gay, when it's in a three-way!"

My face contort in an indescribable expression: "Where did you heard that!? No wait, i don't want to know"

"Victini told me, she say it was one of her mother golden rule, i think"

"....Victini can you come here for a sec?"

The summoned literally appear before me, her voice excited and happy: "Yes Jaden? What can i Do for you?"

I ignore her Do, i try at least: "It may seems strange asking such question all the sudden but, did Mew really told you about..three way?"

She nod eagerly: "Sure, she taught me many things about mating, along with a few tips, just in case"

Did a mother really teach that to their daughter? Man that's...i don't know what it is but it's definitively not normal! Right?: "Did she taught you anything else, like something to slay Arceus perchance?"

Victini look pensive, then: "No sorry. Why?"

"Nothing, just..you know..overthinking about something"

Uxie decide to share one of her pearl of wisdom with me: "Jaden, all this thinking about harming Arceus will bring you nothing but misery, i agree that it's probably deserve a lesson of humility, but obsessing your mind will do you no good, nor us"

Right or no, i have already decided that my right boots has just got an unavoidable rendezvous with it's eminence withe ass, it's only a matter of time really: "How Lugia is proceeding? I trust no city has incurred in any calamity just to impress me?"

Azelf look towards Lugia, Uxie instead don't even bother and just answer my question: "Do not worry Jaden, everything is under control"

"Like your sister attempt to make me give her oral? Or is everything planned?"

Uxie seems embarrassed now, it's the first time i manage to leave her without words: "How long? The barrier i mean, for how long?"

Azelf reply whit his eyes still on Lugia: "Not long, we need to test two or more candidate at one time or we never make it"

I look at Lugia, a rumble over our heads make us all look up, black clouds swirl in a maddening circle above our heads, a storm so big i that i never seen is appearing before our eyes, Zapdos scream: "Stop this madness! You can't hope to control-"

"Enought! Do not question my authority or my control over my powers Zapdos. Now seat and look your mistress at work"

My hate for Arceus resurface once more, it's common knowledge that Lugia is a mostly kind pokemon with the interest of the worlds at hearth, a pokemon that voluntarily isolate itself due to the nature of it's powers, a strength capable of creating massive destruction even by accident just by releasing a small part of it's energy. After centuries of isolation however, even the strongest of will may broke, and desperate for attention she is twisting her gift with anger and lust with the only intent of proving herself worthy of the only mate available to her

I am not sure if admire of her resolve, or run away from her crazy determination. The storm become worse by the seconds, then Lugia scream and suddenly release a swirl of energy from her mouth, the attack reach the clouds is mere moments and literally shatter the storm in two, leaving behind a perfectly calm and clear sky. The last of the quarrelsome clouds leave our sight, and Lugia promptly land in front of me, her muzzle not a inch from my face

"Impressive Lugia, reckless but impressive. You respected my request to the letter, but before expressing my judgment on your actions, i need to know. Will you have stopped if i would have asked, no matter the cost?"

Lugia reply mentally, a slight vibration like purring emanated from her throat "Yes"

"Even if the price would have been the death of another, guardian of the sea?"

She lower her head and close her eyes, she remain still and continue to ^purr^ for nearly a minute before answering: "If that would have been your command, if not i would have avoided it. I am the guardian, my responsibility, my power, my fault, other will not pay for my mistakes"

I nod: "Please rest, the gauntlet is not over and you will need your strength"

"Am i...with you?"

"If your answer to my last question would have been simply yes....no." I place my hand on her head: "As it is now, I'll consider it"

"Please, don't..leave me...i-"

"I know, not matter what i will never be able to understand your pain, the torment of remaining alone for so long, but you are not the only one and i can't...i have no illusion to be able to satisfy you all, let's not forget the rivalry. Madness"

"I...understand"

Lugia leave, crestfallen. Hopefully i will find a way to fix this mess, because if i don't..i don't even want to think what the loneliness may push the rejected legendary to do, no matter what the lake trio say, a desperate creature may find acceptable any solution if stop the pain, centuries.....thousand of years? It require more then willpower and determination surviving the ages, i believe

Speaking to the all the legendaries present: "Sadly we do not have the time to test everyone singularly, so we will begin to test your abilities in group of two or three depending on element affinities. Let's continue with speed and reflexes, Mewtwo and Victini, will be the first group, Mespirit will be your handler. Azelf you will be testing Raikou and Articuno. Uxie you will test Reshiram, Dialga and Kyurem"

"Begin!"

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
You watch as the groups split up and begin to begin their tasks. Once they are all focused on their objectives, you let out a sigh and slump down next to a tree. "Here" you look up to see Rubica with a bottle of water. "Thanks" you take the bottle and down a great deal in a single gulp. "How are you holding up?" "This is nerve wracking! I don't want to anger any of them, but I can't choose all of them! And they're all doing great with the tasks!" You lean back and take another gulp of water. "Well I can't predict the future, but I'm sure it'll all work out." Rubica reassures you.

"Jaden? Could you spare a moment?" You turn to see Lugia leaning down to your eye level. "Uhh sure, Rubica could you give us a second?" "you can have as many as you like" she said walking away. "thank you" she laid down next to you, prompting the others who completed their trials to rise from their respective positions. "Lugia! You know the-" "she hasn't done anything against the rules, she's only asked for a moment of my time, which I might add, I am happy to give." You chastise. Lugia purrs happily, looking at you adoringly.

"thank you Jaden! But the reason i wanted to talk is I want your honest opinion of me." "ahh um alright. Well my first opinion wasn't really the best, or good at all for that matter, you seemed rather arrogant and self-important." She shuffled closer moving her head close to yours. "But first press ions are often wrong. You have shown power and determination. Plus a resolve second to none." "so you like me?" she said, a hopeful look in her eyes.

"Yeah I like you, but remember I like the others as well." "of course Jaden. I will remember." she gave you a quick lick before she gave a large clap of her wings and launched into the air. "what was all that?" Zapdos asked as she walked over. "Oh just an honest opinion" she seemed suspicious but didn't follow her line of inquiry, instead just sitting down next to you. She was soon joined by Zekrom, and Lugia not long after. Surrounded by warmth you soon fall asleep.

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I have always believed that dreams are an important part of life, a way to allow the mind a brief rest and let the subconscious cryptically, occasionally not so cryptically, tell you what's happening in the deepest recess of the limitless maze our brain can be, just like seeing in a semitransparent mirror an infinite halls extending beyond sight, sometimes even beyond comprehension

My dreams suddenly brought me here, floating above the whole continent with a few clouds lazily caressing my skin. I don't know what to think, heck I didn't even know it's possible to think so clearly while asleep, but my curiosity and self-preservation instinct bring me to focus north towards my position, where my body should be...I think

Sure it's weird feeling the light breeze and the humidity typical of this altitude, but not being able to feel myself breathing or my body heat or my weight for what matters. I try to push my body forward and soon realize that while my legs are useless here, my will permit me to move my conscience toward my goal, but before I can even get close to my approximate location a creature gently float towards me, it's shape is oval? Or something with some sort of pink rings surrounding part of her body. I stand still as I await for the creature to come closer from below, and when it's close enough I can finally recognize the creature shape

I sigh inwardly if that is even possible as I am: "Hello Cresselia, what can I do for you?"

Cresselia seems saddened by my greetings: "Do not worry Jaden, I am not here to participate in your gauntlet, I am here only to offer my help with the impostor"

What she is talking about? "You mean a legendary is not what is seems?"

A laugh light and soft as a mountain breeze quickly change my mood from stressed to happy: "Quite the imagination, it would certainly ease your decision isn't it? But no, all the legendary asking for your companionship are genuine, maybe not all their intention are as pure, but real nonetheless"

I have seen very little purity since the beginning of my career, of course I too had dreamt of fighting against or with some of the most famous legendaries a time or two, but finding myself licking Mesprit pussy wasn't in those dreams nor was having a horny Victini displaying herself so blatantly and...i need to think about something else

"I believe that the name used by the humans is Team Shadow"

"Ah, ok. Why impostor and not criminals or kidnapper or-"

"They know little of the reason, why they exist, their goals. Most are ignorant about their true belief"

"Let me guess, it has something to do with my ^gift^, am i right?"

Cresselia nod eagerly: "You are correct, the gifted are in a sense, a countermeasure against destruction, a push from Arceus in its attempt to change fate. I am sorry Jaden, i know you have question but i cannot answer most of them, i can only tell you that your role is and will be fundamental in the preservation of both our species"

Thank you Cresselia, that just what i needed to relax: "You are telling me that if i don't fuck your colleague both human and Pokémon existence is at risk?"

"No, the world will survive anyway, but the how we will does"

"But why?! Why Arceus don't just came here and enchant or pass its gift to a few humans and pair them with...ah fuck" Sigh, it can't, damn him, her or his or whatever

"Free will Jaden, he can't. Even it must follow some rules, despite its power so it must be"

"Can't it at least give me unlimited stamina so i can mate them all and that's it? Wait...”

She chuckle wholeheartedly: "I can ask if you want, but i won't recommend it, he may take your suggestion literally and then nothing would save you from a mob of horny legendary. Unless that's exactly what you want"

"Don't you have a few dreams to protect or something?"

She use her small paws to remove a feather from her coat, the process seems completely painless for her: "I offer you this token of goodwill gifted one, may it preserve your dreams from any nightmare may come across your way, It also keep out tricky psychic trying to manipulate your dreams, good luck Jaden, you'll need it"

I gently grab the feather from her paw, it's incredibly soft and give me a strange sense of peace holding it. As i try to study the curious form of her feather or try to understand why the color is a sort of light green while her coat is not, the feeling of weight return to me as i am slowly dragged to the ground by an invisible force

"Remember Dialga Jaden, she may have something to help you!"


I suddenly wake up, i find my body seated against a tree with Mewtwo, Victini and Mesprit confabulating. The emotion Pokémon it's obviously annoyed: "Awww, it didn't work"

"What didn't work exactly?"

Mewtwo reply: "We have attempted to awake your consciousness for a few minutes, Mesprit has them initiated a procedure meant to enter your dreams but failed, she mentioned something that protected you from such attempts, but despite her best effort she was not able to recognize the energy signature"

I try to lift my left hand only to find it holding something, lifting it up i recognize the feather Cresselia gave me in my dreams

The small group is evidently surprised by the apparition of the mystical object, Victini is especially vocal about it: "Wow! Is that from aunt Cresselia?"

"Aunt?"

"He he, not really, mother and aunt- Cresselia are quite close friends and she visited us often in the past, however she is soooo busy now that I lost contact with her"

I nod and interrupt Mesprit: "How was their performance? Satisfactory i assume?"

"More than satisfactory! Impressive even, Mewtwo was able to mass influence a group of Pokémon more than a mile from here! While Victini used her control over fire to create a solid plasma statue of you two....mating. It was very realistic"

"I imagine, ah yes, did any of you three know anything about a certain impostor or something?"

All three psychic look at me quizzically: "Forget it, has Dialga finished her test?"

It's the emotion legendary that came barely a cm from my face to answer: "Not yet, their whole group hasn't performed yet, nor Uxie group, want to attend?"

"Why they have not started yet? Also there is no reason for You to come This close"

"They refused to perform without you looking while my group knew that could trust me and did it anyway!"

"Or you convinced them to place a good words for you no matter whom i chose?"

"Hmmmmm, third option?"

"Just take me to Uxie group; I need to ask Dialga a few questions after her performance is done"

Dialga remain serious, flirty but serious: "Of course not, i will merely, how can i explain it...push, yes you can imagine as giving a little push in the right direction to another gifted. You do know that while rare, there are other humans with a gift which nature do not differ much from yours?"

Dialga sigh sadly: "It was an experiment, mostly harmless for the pokemon i assure you. He, the professor, was studying the effect that different kind of antigen has on different type of pokemon. Right, we can barely read pokemons aura correctly, figure a sort of super disease: "He discovered it then?"

She laughs now: "Correct! Without Zapdos nothing interrupted you that day and as you have already guessed, yes, after the procedure is as you have mated her already. Congratulation Jaden. I don't feel too well: "D-Dragonite, G-Garchomp n-no, i don't wont this!"
