Really!? "For a moment- What does mean a specific few?"

"It mean that only pokemon with a strong affinity with their elements will be attracted to you, not many, also they must share at least part of your mindset, in short they must be mentally compatible with you. The probability to find such combination are quite slim"

Also if Zapdos get another gifted expect Raikou and Articuno to follow. Rai and Zekrom had quite the..disagreement a century ago, i don't think it will take less then another to calm them both down"

The blast of energy seems to dissolve everything around you and replace it with a seemingly transparent reality. "I agree, altering the time stream can be most interesting. As probably noticed you've been allowed to retain your original memories." "y-yeah it's actually kinda confusing" "sorry, but don't worry, it will pass." "yeah, anyways what now?" "well you should probably go see your mates." "oh right, yeah" you tentatively take a step, followed by another and another until you are walking normally to the group.

You see that the legendaries that Dialga had mentioned were indeed still there. Surprisingly you see that Uxie was here. "Uxie why are you here?" "I had wanted to see which path your life would take. Beside you are quite attractive." "umm thanks" "Jaden, are you sure everything is alright? Mewtwo clasped onto your side "your memories are in disarray" "please stay out of my mind, except for telepathic purposes" " alright Jaden. I'll honor your request. By the way, when will we get to mate?" you flinch slightly. "Wow you really don't give up, I don't know honestly. I was actually hoping to have a night with Sylvia, with all that's been going on we haven't had any time together." "oh I see, you would prefer her." "that's not what I mean and you know it! Sylvia is my first mate and I love her! She deserves my attention just as much as you." "I-I know but, I really wanted to have some time with you." "Hey! I want some time too!" Victini cried hugging your other arm. Soon you were surrounded by the legendaries, all of whom wanted a piece of you.

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Before the beginning of my journey I have always believed that sleeping meant rest, recover you strength for the upcoming trial that both life and your choice, impose on you. Now after tonight I know that my concept was...incomplete to say the least. Why the change in opinion? Simple, finding yourself floating over the whole region with clouds but a meter from you may have such effect, or at least the idea as a whole gave me the time to think about it, in a sense

A voice embedded in my memory delicately call me in the distance, a voice I now recognize as Cresselia: "Good morning Jaden, slept well?"

Now you are just making fun of me, or worse, she is actually teasing me: "Interesting way to tease someone Cressy, next time I'll make you pay the ticket"

Cresselia seems confused by my words: "Thicket? Do I need to offer you something in exchange for our conversation?"

A Conversation? But...oh, she doesn't know?! Evasive maneuvers, now! "No! I just...ehm, nothing, merely joking, Hehehehe"

What a pathetic excuse, oh man "I not sure to understand the humor behind it, do I require to laugh now?"

"No, just. Feign I said anything, please?"

She is obviously unconvinced, but understanding that talking about it will lead to nothing, she just let it go: "Very well, if there is any topic you wish to discuss do not hesitate to ask, your call was very hazy and unclear, but I understand that being your first time trying to use your ability you still lack the focus necessary to speak to me clearly"

My confusion must be quite obvious given her response: "Oh dear, Jaden focus please, did you remember calling me?"

I try to seek for an answer in the tumultuous sea that are my thoughts right now, when I am awake all the frustration and resent ^my condition^ is giving me are easy to suppress, but here, here it's difficult and I can barely keep myself from screaming my anger to azure sky above me, an old music speaking of vengeance and betrayal that I know far too well is playing from every inch of this strange world, I remember to have that song on repeat in my stereo for a whole afternoon after I heard of father unjust demise

I try to force out a semblance of coherent thoughts, an effort that required most of my available strength: "I....I...don't know, me....no...I…believe so"

The world around us is rapidly changing, the azure sky is becoming blood red while the clouds begin to turn pitch black: "Jaden please focus, keep your emotion in check"

I try, I am really trying but: "I can't! I...want it pay...I want them Pay FOR THEIR MISTAKES! HE....JUST WANTED...BASTARDS!"

The unmistakable rumble of a storm is rapidly approaching our piece of sky, the land under me, once green and peaceful, transform into a place of madness and chaos, the smell of burnt grass immediately fill my senses as thick black smoke begin to appear everywhere I look

My emotions, my need for vengeance and hatred are fueled by the injustice that my father, that our land has been subjected to since Team Shadow creation years ago. Why I... We must suffer for Their Incompetence, Their Stupidity...I...just want it back, the time stolen from me, from all of us. From my dad...

My emotions are slowly calming down, the clouds begin to happily return withe, and the land under me recover its healthy green. With my anger ebbing away, the feeling of my 'body' are returning to me, I feel hugged and looking down I see Cresselia gently hugging my form as a mother would do to a child

"It's all right, it's alright Jaden, I am here. I will not leave you to the whims fate, shhhh"

I should be offended by her attempt to shut me up but, we both know I needed that, I needed the reminder that I am not alone, even if most of my family members want me to dick them more often than not, sigh

As the sky recover it's azure hue, I find my will free to focus and flow once more: "I am sorry Cresselia, I just, needed some, to vent"

She gently release me: "Of course, we all need to in a way"

Some are more physical than other, I'm sure: "My team has a very 'direct' way to do so, if I may say it"

Her tone remains curiosly neutral, like i have just said an incredible common thing: "Many trainers could say the same, although usually is just one or two that... well. To the matter at hand, Jaden, do you remember calling me?"

Nope, not a clue: "No I don't. But what do you- The feather right?"

"Correct, you still have my feather close, probably just before going to sleep"

Or just after my last night activities: "Well, since you're here, can you tell me anything about what TS are doing up north? I mean the pass, you know the for Unova?"

She seems secluded in thoughts for a while, then: "Most of them didn't slept much, as such I have little details on what is really happening there, however one of the 'leaders' have dreamt about capturing a whole group of Pokémon, he seemed particularly interested in a very specific exemplar but, I am not sure, he was woken up before the end of the dream. I am sorry Jaden, to be unable to help you more"

"Thanks anyway, just a curiosity if I may?"

She nod: "You really can enter the dreams of any creature you desire to, human or Pokémon?"

She seems embarrassed: "Well, not really. Have you ever heard of dream catchers?"

Uncertainly I answer: "Sure"

"Hmmmm, I don't know exactly how but, how such simple object can be so effective, no matter. They can prevent me from seeing a person dreams, or at least it make it unclear and confusing to me, just like that"

A little incredulous: "You mean that a simple dream catcher can prevent you from entering someone dreams?"

"It make it difficult yes, it does bother Darkrai too, him much more than me"

Good to know: "Thanks Cresselia, for everything"

"You are welcome Jaden, and good day"

The world suddenly become withe and I find myself awake on the bed with both Lyrica and Sylvia sleeping at my sides, Mewtwo floating as seated on an invisible chair

"Good morning Jaden, was your activity exhausting?" Her tone is so neutral and devoid of..well anything even remotely resembling an emotion

I sigh: "Not as the day is going to be, probably"

Grammar and spelling checked by The Ever Burning Pheonix
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: You are what you dream?

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Mewtwo sank down from her invisible perch. Landing on your lap. "You stood me up" She said in her blank voice

"Look Mewtwo I'm sorry, they didn't give me a choice"

"It's okay, but you're going to make it up to me. Count on it" she orated, punctuating her words with pokes in the chest.

"I had planned on it" you reply, pulling her into a hug. "I wouldn't want to disappoint one of my mates"

"That wouldn't be wise" she laughed, snuggling up to you.

Her fingers absently brushed your chest as she closed her eyes, laying her head on your chest. "Let's get some privacy"

"sure thing"

You recall the sleeping Sylvia and Lyrica into their balls, leaving you alone with Mewtwo

"Aww isn't this sweet?" With a jolt you pull Mewtwo behind you and roll towards the voice, swinging a leg violently

Your body stops moving mid-kick, as it was halted by an unseen force. "Hey you're not gonna be one of those abusive males are you?"

"Victini!? It told you to wait with the others!"

"What are you doing here!"

"I have just as much right to be here as you"

"You were supposed to wait your turn!"

"Why should I wait my turn when you get him right now?"

"Because its her turn" you exclaim agitatedly. "All you're doing is proving that I can't trust you"

Hearing this she flinched and instantly dropped to the floor. "I'm sorry please forgive me" You rub the back of your head awkwardly "I only said that to scare you, really. But if you don't listen to me I really won't be able to trust you as my mate or comrade!"

"Of course Jaden, I just wanted to be with you"

"It's okay just try to listen me from now on please?" She nodded, climbing onto the bed and curling up at your side.

"Well now that we're here..." She ran her small hands up your leg giggling cutely

"Not a chance squirt, he's mine right now" She reached out and grabbed Victini's head.

"Get out of here" she floated over to the window and tossed Victini out slamming the window afterwards

"Now then, where was we?" She said in a seductive tone.

Chapter credit to Gosune

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I have heard people speaking about sighting of Mewtwo even before wishing to become a trainer, every time the word scary or dangerous were involved somehow, I always discarded the superstitions, ignorant notion that just because a Pokémon looked scary it must automatically mean dangerous

Now that I know, in a sense, Mewtwo, I can freely say that both the argument weren't completely without merit, the scary part in particular. The artificial Pokémon floats toward me with intent, her eyes betray both eagerness and curiosity in equal measure

"I never mated before master, care to explain the mechanic to me?"

Explain? What there is to explain? You just, I mean…"W-well, there isn't much to say and- wait, none of the other legendary has mated before either so, why asking about...that?"

Mewtwo remain mostly unperturbed, only looking at me quizzically as saying 'What, you don't know?', then a small glint of understanding appear in her eyes "I presumed. No, it was obvious they would not"

Before I can ask anything, Mewtwo gently levitate me on the bed and make me sit, she slowly touch the floor with her feet for the first time since I knew her "As I am sure you already know, I am not a natural Pokémon, I am not the result of thousands of years of evolution. Instead I was…created by a group once known as Team Rocket, my only goal should have been further the expansion of the organization and be their super-weapon when necessary"

I nod and she continues "I…escaped my confinement and…did something I should not have, or at least not in way I did. I was confused, my vision of the world was incorrect, flawed and for a time I thought that if my reasoning was flawed, so was I"

I silently watch and listen as one of the most powerful Pokémon ever known reveal her secrets to me, not sure if felt honored of her trust, or scared of what she is going to tell me "My design was not flawed however, merely my limited knowledge of the world was, deciding to rectify the problem i began to traveled for a time, hidden in plain sight from greedy trainers and avid corporation far more similar to TR then they realized, soon I discovered that the only difference between them was...initiative, TR has more, simple as that"

"At the time no merely bodily need tainted my reasoning, my freedom. When I was created TR wanted a machine, something unable to identify itself in anything, something incapable of developing a personality. As such, I was created genderless, no reason to waste resource on the unnecessary. If my design was flawed they would have simply destroyed me and begin anew"

What?! but how-

Mewtwo use her hand to signal me to stop "Patience, I will explain everything"

I bewilderedly nod

"Team Rocked was not famous for letting precious resources leave their grasp so easily, it took them years, but in the end I was captured, returning into their possession once more. I am...not willing to discuss what it happened in the month I remained confined in my cell, but before I was able to escape their 'scientist' injected me with hormones and mutagen intending to...giving me a gender. Unable to control me their intention was to reduce my aggressiveness and transforming me in a breeder for their sick experiments"

I knew TR was composed by a bunch of bastards but...

"The change nearly took the whole month, I experienced pain beyond my imagination as my organs resettled themselves, I found myself unable to control certain...urges"

Mewtwo remain impassible the whole time, beside a few words pronounced with spite, her voice remain...empty "I killed them, most of them. Used their own experiment to change them into the monster they wished me to be, many died painfully as their bodies rearranged in impossible ways, others still live but, changed"

"I escaped with my body still 'pure' as you humans sometimes say, it took time to finally be able to control my bodily urges, but I managed, mostly. I understand that after your last performance, your body is not at peak condition and I am unwilling to stress my master more than necessary"

Thank-

"Know however, that I am developing a move, as you human call it, specifically designed to regenerate physical and mental stamina to a target living creature, and I intend to use such methods on you, Jaden, so that any statement of tiredness in the future will become false when needed"

I gulp loudly knowing how she intend to use her new move when ready, it remind me of Sylvia mother, she too was able to adapt a move to work harmlessly on human but the procedure seemed both tiring and difficult, I look around, hoping that none of my mate has heard what Mewtwo just said, then I realize how stupid it is, as a psychic she can 'talk' without walls or physical barrier to limit her

"Can you please keep that information to yourself? I would really like to sleep sometimes"

Mewtwo express a clear emotion for the first time since the beginning of our conversation, a wicked smile "Perhaps, it will depend on how effective your ability to quench my urges will be, or if you find a reasonable reason for me to do so, I would welcome a mental challenge"

"Hmm, I am your trainer and I ask you to not speak about it?"

"I am still un-mated, free from your or anyone demand, unless you wish to rectify the situation right now?"

"I need rest"

"I know and I will respect your desire of recovering, but I will be the next of your mates, to be mated, am I clear?"

Now it's my turn to smile "Perhaps, it will depend on your willingness to not speak about your developing ability"

Mewtwo seems happy of my answer "That's a worthy reason, shall we depart? Stopping TS is of paramount importance"

"Let us get breakfast first, then we all go, and no heroics ok? I need a cohesive team not a bunch of horny females trying to impress me"

Grammar and spelling checked by The Ever Burning Pheonix
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: But all end in understanding, or begin so

choices: More news on TS by TV
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
As we walk, or in Mewtwo case float, toward breakfast a sudden pop can be clearly heard behind me, I don't need to turn for guessing who is my stalker

"You just don't know when to give up I see"

As expected I feel my stalker embrace the back of my head, the familiar energy of Victini invade my senses as she rub her body on me

"You know that I won't give up, no matter how many time I get throw out, I will always return for you!"

I nearly feel flattered by her determination to stick with me no matter what, or at least I would be if it wasn't for her sex rubbing my back, or the tone she said it for the matter

I continue undeterred from Victini annoying enthusiasm toward my goal, Mewtwo doesn't seems bothered too much from her presence, although from my sponger small shiver I can guess that she isn't happy of her appearance either

Ignoring the mental conversation they have likely having I didn't even realize we reached the main hall where Joy is busy at work, another young trainer is monopolizing her attention with some blabbering about poison, I think

As I get closer I can clearly see that Joy wearing a very calm expression as she try to calm down the worried trainer "I am happy to see a trainer taking his charges health so seriously, but there is nothing to worry about young one, your Vaporeon will return up and running in no time"

The trainer meekly reply "Thanks Joy, I feel lost without her"

Joy smile appear to get even bigger if that is possible "Would you like to help me treat her?"

The young trainer seems to jump with joy at her suggestion "Can I? Really?!"

"Sure, every trainer should know how treat a Pokémon injury properly after all, didn't your teacher explained the how at school?"

The trainer expression sadden "No, he left the whole class alone for hours, working somewhere else I think"

Joy is able to maintain her winning smile, but I can clearly see the fire of just vengeance igniting in her eyes "Ahh, unfortunate, do please wait inside with Vapy, I will come shortly"

The trainer doesn't event thank her as he literally run behind the counter and enter the room behind Joy, she maintain her expression a little longer before her smile transform itself into a frown, she doesn't even notice my presence as she pick up the phone and dial a number with haste, as I get closer Mewtwo intentionally stop levitating and land heavily on the clean floor, causing a noise that echo in the empty hall and attracting our nurse attention

She is clearly happy at seeing me up, a not-so-friendly grim spread upon her feature, I already know how this will end

"Greetings Jaden, how are you feeling today?"

I give her a small series of nod "Do you know the so called teacher name? I'll send one of my team to…educate him in the correct way to fulfill your duties"

Her grin deepen for a moment "I'll send word up so if something happen HQ won't begin a poke hunt on the responsible"

At this point I don't know if grinning like her, or being worried about what she just said "I am not planning an execution Joy, beside I am confident in Mewtwo competence"

My psychic partner turn her attention towards me, I feel her eyes on my skull "Why are you intending to send me, master? Did I have displeased you?"

I turn towards her and look in her purplish eyes "Of course not, I merely want an angry Lucario to visit our dear professor, if I am not mistaken your move set can easily match a Lucario and they can speak with human not unlike you do, also I want him to remember why he got what deserved and what will happen if he continue to neglect his duties"

Victini on the back of my head trembles slightly, I know what she has in mind, and I have a plan of my own to make her stop behave like a whore

Mewtwo then ask "What do you wish me to do?"

I let my imagination run wild and tell her the first idea that come in mind "Teleport there and use your illusion ability to fool any human or Pokémon in believing you a Lucario, then breaks down the door and accuse the professor of being responsible of an injury you sustained because it's master wasn't able to treat her properly in the wild, tell him that you are not the first of his team to suffer because of this and that her master had to take repetition course to avoid the event from occurring again"

Mewtwo nod "You wish to humble him then, very well. What do you wish me to do with him afterward?"

I breathe deeply, and surprise myself of what I say "Whatever you wish, as long as it's painful. Don't kill or maim him however, I don't want his worthless soul on my conscience"

My partner doesn't even flinch, just nod again "Very well master, I will do as you ask"

Despite having heard only my side of the conversation Joy understood perfectly what I asked Mewtwo to do, maybe because I suggested everything, despite this she just deliver a pad to Mewtwo and resume her normal compassionate expression all Joy naturally seems to have, completely unaffected by our recent conversation

"Breakfast?"

It's my turn to nod eagerly, I try to turn towards Mewtwo but she already vanished effortlessly without any sound, I am not worried for the so called teacher fate, he brought it upon himself, also I know she will heed my request on not harm him too seriously, I don't even know where the anger towards that unknown person came from, I felt similarly before, like the first time I faced Nysa but, I feel so cold and lucid this time, it's a sort of cold rage I never felt before

Joy recapture my attention with food, not surprising really "Hello Jaden, you there?"

"Mmh, what? Oh, sure, lead the way"

Joy and I begin to walk toward my deserved breakfast, with Victini still on the back of my head of course, she seems quite happy right now, me however, well, I don't know what I feel. Joy interrupt my internal monologue before even begin, seems to happen often around females, not matter the species, not necessary a bad trait, annoying maybe

"I received word about TS operation up north, they have installed some sort of device, we don't know what it's supposed to do, soo, be careful okay?"

I think for a moment, I suppose it's time to see how powerful a team of legendary really is, I don't doubt on their prowess but make them working together will be a challenge on its own I wager

"I will"

I guess I will discover it soon enough, after breakfast
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Just another day, with hell on it's way

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Joy turns away and enters the back room where the boy had dissapeared to earlier.

"Well now that we're alone" Victini projected in your mind. "No" you cut her off before she takes it too far. "Mewtwo gets me next" "But" "No, and thats final."

You return to your room, and lay down on the bed, removing Victini from her perch. She pouts for a moment before turning on the tv and settling into the crook of your arm.

The newsreel plays for a few minutes before something cathes your eye.

Reporter: "Thats right, just north of Durian city an unknown group has been sighted. They appear to be building a device of some sort. Details are unknown as all attempts to infiltrate have been met with extreme resistance. The police have put out a request for competent trainers to assist them.

You continue to watch but there is nothing you didn't already know.

"When Mewtwo gets back we should probably go investigate."

Victini looked up at you and yawned showing off her small fangs. "Do we have to?" you chuckle and rub her head. "Yeah we probably should. A good deal of legendary pokemon would be willing to assist me. That makes me one of the most powerful trainers in the world."

"But when would I get to be alone with you?" She gazed up at you piteously. "I promise, you'll get your turn, but you have to wait untill Mewtwo has her turn."

Victini rubbed her small paws against your crotch for a second before stating "Alright, but once Mewtwo is done nothing will get in my way"

You groan "Yeah I figured you would say something like that." you give her one last head rub, before Mewtwo reappears with a pop. "Jaden I-i cant wait any longer. I need you NOW!"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: More news on TS by TV

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Mewwto wear an half desperate, half needy expression as she bring her face an inch from mine, naturally this is perfectly normal according to the book entitled 'Legendary and you', under the chapter 'Breeding and Bred'

Well, at least that it's what i would like to say, in truth i just say "What in Tartarus happened Mewtwo?"

She look around frenetically before rudely grabbing Victini, stun her with a low powered psychic pulse of some kind, then dematerialize the window and throwing her out, again

At least the window reappear a second later

"There are handles you know"

I don't have the time to say anything else before she lay herself on me with her eyes staring in mine, she is quite heavy btw, even while levitating

"He was not in class"

She must be referring to the teacher i sent her to...educate

"I tracked him down following his students memories of his office, when i got in i found him..mating an Absol"

So that's what the dear professor do during his pause? Wait, the memories of his student's?!

I try to smile and ask "Did you, hmm, do something else with his student's minds?"

She look at me quizzically "I simply took the most efficient path available to me, and no, i have not showed myself to them so no other action where needed"

"Ok, and, what you did to...you know"

She blush, unbelievable Mewetwo can blush? So she can feel emotions, to a point "I appeared disguised as a Lucario, as you ordered, i was..shocked but i still subdue them both without problem and proceeded to express my dissent by broking his ribs and throwing him out of the window without his pants and underwear, as he was"

Ouch, i felt that

"He landed safely on the grass just under the window with minimal damage where he was quickly discovered by both students and teachers walking in the main courtyard"

She must have a fetish for launching people and pokemon out of windows or something, i suppose unique pokemon..

"I forced the Absol to stand down and examined her for additional injuries, i found only minor scratches and nothing serious until i reached for her...genitals. She was evidently mated repeatedly in different small periods of time, also she was leaking was i assume was her master seed"

Oookaaaay, i didn't requested such details, but i suppose she is nothing if not meticulous

"I...asked if she was subjected to abuse, she vehemently denied my accusation and proceeded to tell me why she was letting him use her body for pleasure, it can all be resumed in: I was alone and hungry, he took me in, he cured and feed me, in exchange he only wanted sex, i like having sex"

"Very exhaustive of her"

Mewtwo gently grab me by the collar "I didn't believe her so i asked her to share her memories with me, she agreed"

Ho ho, that's not..wait! Absol are Dark type! How-

"I felt was she felt when they mated, she apparently love to mix pain and pleasure at the same time, i am not sure to understand as i felt the two sensations distinctively, and pain was..un-pleasurable"

How articulated of her, but i get the meaning "So you..liked it?"

She bring her face to mine "Yes! I want that! I want to feel penetrated and fucked and..filled!"

....is her gender messing up her reasoning? I mean it do it to everyone to a point but, she is new at this. Make sense now, i think

"And you-"

"Want to be mated" Her expression harden "Now"

I gulp down "I..well no i can't, but i really want to understand you, to help, but i can't. I am still tired by Sylvia and Lyrica demands, i need to recover first, also we must depart to ensure that whatever TS is doing, fail, badly"

Mewtwo continue to stare, her eyes soften after a while and let me get up "I am sorry Jaden, i haven't...forgive my-"

"No, there is no need to forgive anything, i promised and i will keep my word, but not now okay?"

She nod briefly "I will. Only one thing, master"

Why when my pokemon want something they call me master all the sudden?

"Yes Mewtwo?"

"I claim double the time for refusing me, master"

With that she literally vanish without a sound, leaving me with a question

"Did i have prohibited her to use her recovery ability on me?" I think over it for a moment "Nope, i haven't. Good, I'll ask Joy if my license includes a penis insurance"




Departure and Rubica. What now...
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Not yet, not for free(dom)

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Ugh" you rise from the bed and collect your pokeballs, clipping them to their customary spots on your belt. Your door drifts open from a light shove and you proceed into the hallway.

Your path goes uninterrupted down to the lobby. Still mostly empty, Rubica and Sally are the only ones in the room.

"Oh hey Jaden" Rubica greets as you turn the corner. Sally enthusiastically rushes over and invades your mouth with her tongue.

Having gotten up on her rear legs most of her weight ends up on your shoulders. You fall with a grunt, Sally landing on top.

You allow the kiss to continue for a moment before pulling away. You slide out from under the large dragon and get to your feet, ignoring her lusty gaze.

"Did you have fun?" "What?" "With Mewtwo? Did you have fun?" "Why are you even asking those kind of questions? Besides nothing happened, not yet at least" "Then would you care to explain why your window vanished and Victini came flying out?" "Not really, anyways did you hear about the suspicious activity up north?" "Yeah, I was going to check it out, unless you have a better idea"

you shake your head "Not really, I don't think there's much else to do" Rubica returns Sally to her ball. "Alright, then lets go!"

choices: A wild pokemon interrupt the mating and try to join in the action
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
After a quick checkup done t my team, i leave the pokemon center with Rubica in tow, of course Joy do not let the opportunity of teasing me about last night activity going to waste

"Hope you Enjoyed your stay mister Jaden, i am eager to Hear from you again"

You let out a sigh of frustration as you remember her bad concealed pun, at least she didn't make any referring to activity or counseled me about how to improve my sleeping pattern or something, annoying creature that Joy. Not that the others have demonstrated any particular sign of insanity or anything..

As you contemplate what to do next, or more precisely, what to do once you reach TS improvised device, whatever that things does, Rubica decide to creatively interrupts your line of thoughts by releasing Sally

You turn your head at the noise and barely have the time to react as the she dragon jump towards you with joy, fortunately she find herself suspended in midair just and inch before touching you, an event that doesn't evade her notice and evidently annoy her to no end

Mewtwo appear at my side, revealing herself as the culprit and savior of the day, however the calm expression she usually wear is somewhat tarnished by a floating and, judging from her expression, annoying presence of Victiny on her shoulder

The voice of the purplish pokemon echo in my head "I clearly stated who will be the next among us to benefit from your attention, Master, have i not?"

I feel my guts tighten at her cold statement "Ehm, yes?"

"Then why this dragon is actively trying to mate with you?"

You sigh again for the second time in few minutes, these are one of these days isn't it? "I am trying nothing, but remember that Sally is one of my mates, not that she let me forget that"

Victiny lacking Any sense of judgment whatsoever interrupt Mewtwo reply "Sooooo, can i-"

"No" you reply resolute

"Oh come on!"

Rubica amused "Do both of you realize that i can hear everything, right?"

Sally agree to her mistress by trashing left and right attempting to free herself, but as expected, Mewtwo doesn't seems even minimally disturbed by the dragon antics

"Your wriggling attempt are useless dragon, no amount of physical strength is gonna free you from my grip"

I don't like the superpowered psychic tone, she seems quite frustrated, and i believe to know why

"Mewwto, i would like to speak with you, in private"

She nod and release Sally, that promptly fall to the ground. Undamaged she immediately get up, only to find you both vanished


The disorienting experience of being teleported take a few seconds to disappear, the feeling of being pinned with your back on a tree does not

"I am frustrated Jaden, very much so"

The point do not elude your keen senses "I kinda noticed, can yo-"

"No. The memory of that Absol mating is...unnerving me, i need to feel what's it like, Jaden. I want feel what means having your mate breeding and filling me, i...forgive me"

"Wh-"

She kiss me roughly, her body is burning up and i can feel her shoulder muscle twitching, she use her right hand to grope my crotch as her left keep me close to her, i don't resist her pull as i know how unstable such a powerful pokemon can be, and probably i had it coming

Her hand easily slide inside my ants and underwear sliding them down, i feel like a cheap whore as my organ get exposed to the air "I saw something marked as necessary on the Absol memories, i will attempt the procedure now"

He somewhat angry reply "Yes!"

It take a few seconds for him to calm down "Yes. Sorry, it's just.."

He seems quite angry and frustrated "What i saw in those laboratories was, monstrous. Team Rocked didn't care how many people or pokemon would have suffered if their ultimate plan would have worked, in a sense what Team Shadow is doing is far more 'humane' then what TR ever did"

A certain resent carry across my voice, despite my attempt to keep it in check "Humane? Have you seen what they did back there? They-"

He sound calm, annoyingly calm right now given the argument "Yes, i know. We know. But as i have said, it's nothing in comparison of what Team Rocked wanted to do, to both our species, you see Jaden, despite my resent, my hate for them, i must admit that Team Shadow tend to care for their pokemon, they are cruel sometimes yes, and they couldn't care less about our opinion, but they would never tolerate a trainer abusing his own pokemon, well, beside use it as a cum dumpster i mean, it's bad, but it's far from the worst fate one of us could encounter. They also severely prohibits beating or otherwise mistreating a pokwmon without reason, which is far more then some official of the league enforce as rules"

He continue "Also, keep in mind that many of us are..somewhat interested in having an intimate relationship with our master or mistress. It..." He gesticulate frenetically "make sense, to us. It's difficult to explain"

I am not sure on how correctly answer to the conversation we just had "So, if your sister was strapped down a bed by his trainer and fucked silly all night, you would be 'Happy' for her?"

".......If she wanted her trainer that way, yes. I don't think she would need to be strapped tough. Well, maybe if he don't satisfy her things may get, difficult but...oh, you were joking?"


I didn't even know he has a sister! Oh dammit "....no"

"Ah, ok. Do you wish to meet my sister then? She did have mentioned her interest in getting a trainer, not sure if you'll end up breeding her but, you may-"

I hastily answer "No!" I then realize that my tone could be misinterpreted as an offense and rectify "No thanks, i believe to be occupied enough as it is"

He nod "Fair enough, if you change you mind just call, she is a very skilled fighter but with her temper it may take quite the stroke of luck for her to find a willing trainer that take her along, and if what i have heard about you is true then you are just the dominant male type she need, both in bed and in the field"

Lucky me, wait how does he know how i am in bed or i behave on the field, conjecture based on my pokemon? Ah forget it "Isn't it weird for you to offer me your sister like that? It's, kinda strange no?"

He shrug "No it's not, As i have said, she need a strong dominant male to keep her in line, Cresselia know if she hasn't caused quite the trouble already, a trainer is the perfect solution for her, and the rest of my family, believe me"

Ooooookeeeey, i got another weird one "I'll, eh, think about it"

No, not really

He nod again "I hope so, she is really starting to get on my nerves. Now about the mission, as i have mentioned it may be a trap, and probably he is prepared for trouble but, i don't think he'll stand a chance against your team, do please try to get him back in one piece, i know you hate him for being a TS member and for what he may have done but he was not the lead scientist nor he had any real decision power if the information we got are exact, in fact we believe he was little more then an archivist, so go easy on him. Just a few bones ok?"

Don't tempt me little mon, don't...little mon? Where did this come from?! Argh, Mesprit that damn bitch and her boon! I bet it's all her mind altering shit!

It was that why i had those spike of anger in the past? Why i suddenly acted so dominant over my pokemon? Did she already knew i was-

The Lucario voice recall me back to the present "Are you alright? You seems tense"

I breathe slowly and calm myself down "I am fine, do not conc- do not worry, it was just the stress"

He doesn't seems fully convinced but he drop the argument anyway "If you say so"

My curiosity come back as i notice the 3d map again "What are those black areas?"

He look at the map "Those? We don't now yet, those room posses a small version of the inhibitor field generator that covered the whole base before your assault, we are unable to force the door open or otherwise crack the security code, no override attempted until now has worked. We believe it may contain their most valuable specimens or maybe even a few successful hybrids, although the latter is highly unlikely. Leave it to us, we will find a way, and besides you have far more important matter to attend to"

I feel my anger spike for a moment, how these puny pokemon dare to tell me what i should and what i shouldn't care about?! Insolent-

Another spike. Dammit it all to Tartarus!

"Calm down Jaden, he did not mean to disrespect us, nor he did i believe"

"I know it's just.."

The Lucario look at me strangely "It just what?"

Only now i realize that i have answered Mewtwo telepathy with my voice, shit

"Jaden was merely thinking about the possible traps that may await us on our pursuit, I offered myself and Victini as volunteers to scout the area ahead and he was merely expressing his disappointment in finding that despite the danger of letting his mate do such attempt, the above mentioned action is necessary"

He nod happily "Of course, scouting ahead is a good idea and apparently the voices on you being a skilled and caring trainer are founded. You sure you don't want to meet my sister? Her fighting type and skills would it be a tremendous boon to your party"

I exhale annoyed, my annoyed expression pass unobserved by him however "Thanks but no thanks, i think to have gotten enough 'boon' for the moment"

Hardly truer words were ever spoken. Now, where the heck is Rubica?

"Jaden, we still have to confirm a few details but feel free to relax, we've got a temporary bunk set up for you. It's over here" Lucario led you outside of the tent and to a small cave. "Inside you'll find a bed, food, and fresh water." "Oh yeah I almost forgot. Here is one of the pokemon recovered in the TS base. She seems to have been subjected to accelerated growth. She's only two weeks old, but has evolved into a Dragonair." "Here, we'll take care of her." You thank him and walk inside. As he said there was a small collapsable bed and a bag filled with various foods and bottles of water.

You spread your arms and flop onto the bed face-first. "Jaden, the other legendaries wish to convene and discuss the actions of TS. I will return later." "Alright" You respond and remain in the bed. She teleports away, leaving you with Mistra.

Your Sneasel crawls onto the bed next to you, snuggling up close. You allow her to stay untill you feel her begin to reach towards your crotch. "Nope" you roll away from her and grab her pokeball. "Not now, I need to rest" You return her to her ball and fall back onto the bed. "Damn, they never quit"

You fall asleep only to wake up to someone crawling into your bed. "What in tartarus?" you quickly roll out of the bed and see a dark figure in your bed. "So you're the great Jaden. I thought you would be taller" The figure speaks in a rather feminine voice "Who the fuck are you?" "I'm sure youve heard of me, perhaps from my brother? No? Maybe this will help." One of the figures arms flicks out, cloaked in a pale blue flame. The glow cast by the flames reveal a Lucario with definate female curves "Get the picture now?" "He just doesn't listen" you grumble to yourself as you sit down on the cave floor. "Well since you're here, I don't suppose there's anything in particular you wanted from me?" "From you? Hmm, Well I have been looking for a trainer, but maybe we could be a bit closer than that"

You get off the floor"Sorry, but I have to go strangle someone" "Aww don't you want to spend time with me?" she pouted "Thats not it" you continue on your way out. "Then what is?" "Your brother tried to drop you off with me, I said no thanks. But instead of respecting my decision, he has you come and try to not only become part of my team but also one of my mates." you head back towards the tent. "I'm gonna make myself clear this time."

You throw the entrance open startling Lucario "Oh J-jaden, you're up. I hope you slept well." You remain silent slowly approaching the now nervous fighting/steel type. You get right in front of him look him dead in the eyes and growl in an irritated tone "I said no" punctuating each word with a sharp poke to the chest, before turning and leaving the tent. "That was great!" The female Lucario bounds excitedly up to you. "I've never seen him cower like that. You must be really strong! Please take me with you, I wont be a burden. Just let me show you what I'm capable of"

"This day is getting better and better"

She smile, the sadness vanished from her voice "In a manner of speaking, i can shield you from your nightmare and at the same time help you by strengthening your personality when necessary. Cresselia then should be able to help you face your darker emotion and put them to rest, her skill in dealing with nightmares are legendary, literally"

I shake my head at her bad pun "I presume you wish something in exchange?"

She nod "You bet, as you know we legendary cannot exactly choose our own mate, it must be assigned by Arceus or by element affinity" I nod "As you have probably guessed, i have been left with no possible match at all, condemning me to leave alone without any chance to find a mate to love. "Anyway, as i have said i cannot Choose a mate, but if He claim me as his own, well in that case the rule can be invalidated, IT put this measure in place to ensure that no pokemon worthy of evolving with an human could be erroneously left alone"

"He is called Luka while his mate named herself Elisa, Master"

I smile "Thanks Mewtwo, i...why are you snooping in my thoughts again?"

"I merely provided you assistance Master, and i will do so any time you will require it, as for methods this is surely the most efficient"

"...Right" I breathe deeply and calm myself down, a small flash of memory remind myself of what Mespirit told me while dreaming and i have no intention to discover if any ranger here has a female with my affinity in tow

"I thank you for your help Mewtwo, but please do not invade the sanctity of my mind unless i really require it ok? Please..."

"But of course Master, as you desire, i will limit myself to monitor your psychic waves for distress and and critical instabilities, providing assistance only if required"

I graciously approve "Thanks, at least you are trying"

She nod briefly and resume her neutral posture, i instead turn toward the Lucario once more "Luka right?" He nod confused, make sense after all he haven't heard my private conversation with my mate "What do you expect to find in this room?"

He recover quickly "Well, as i have said before, we are not sure what these room may contain, whatever it is it's important, but beside that.."

"Was Elisa the one you was talking before?"

"Yes, happy to see you remembered our names even after all you probably went through"

Hehe sure "No biggie, so how long-"

The 3d map blink red for a moment and the black room is now represented in yellow, Luka place his paw on the receiver on his hears probably having just received a call

"Yes...good, that's a relief. Hm? How many?...That many?...No i...wait a moment"

He look at me "Jaden have you encountered anything that may suggest what a vial marked as ZZ-TX could be?"

I answer apologetic "No i..wait, what if it's that drug they used on their subjects? Could it be the compatibility drug they have mentioned?"

He look pensive for a moment before nodding eagerly "Could be, there are a whole room full of it, hundreds of vials so it would make sense, hopefully our professors will be able to discover what kind of substance it composed off, and maybe with luck we could retrace the basic components required along with their supplier"

I unconvinced, point out the obvious flaw in his reasoning "I am not sure it would help, someone capable of obtaining the materials necessary to build a base like this, and probably others like this, must have many different supplier and more then a few influential person embroiled, i don't see how they could have pulled this off otherwise. I mean, hight quality construction materials, complex chemical substance probably restricted and laboratory equipment i can't exactly buy at the supermarket, and what? How did you find this base? By chance?"

He seems ashamed now "...yes, sort of. Their psychic inhibitor spiked a few times while we was investigating on a possible kidnapping in this area and one of our Psy felt suddenly weak so, an accurate examination showed how a small part of the mountain was completely undetectable by active psychic scans while the map clearly stated otherwise and-"

"I got it, none suspected anything till now?"

"Not really, beside a few minor events nothing hinted at something of this magnitude and...our reports on controlled substances come out empty as always, same for unauthorized selling of lab equipment or any other advanced material on the black market, nothing and- a moment please"

He place his paw on the speak again "Hm hmm, yes he is here, he think it may be the drugs TS used on the test subjects..yes make sense....what?! Are you sure?!"

"What's happening?"

He frenetically "The vials-drugs missing!" He calm down a little, still remaining evidently distressed "A whole shelf of drug is missing, fifty vials at least. Damn it, seal the chamber and come out..yes I'll be there. Forgive me Jaden i must-"

"Wait! You told me to have information on that archivist what-"

"Yes! Right, hmm what it was, ah sorry" Seriously man, you are far too sorry for my taste

"We are certain at least one pokemon is a Ghost type, the other one should be a Bug, maybe a Yanmega we are not sure, we also suspect he have an Eeveelution with him, no idea what type, Good Luck Jaden!"

"...Haven't even have the time to told him i used his sister as a bait, ho well. Mewtwo do please check out two improvised hunters, i don't want to have them on my conscience if i can avoid it"

"Of course Master"

In a flash Mewtwo disappear, Victini instead chose this exact moment to make her entry, what are the chances this wasn't planned? Zero i think "Jaden! I was just-"

"Yeah you may come, just try to behave. Which translated means 'do not attempt to do what you are planning to do', clear?"

"Wh-"

"Clear?"

"Fiiiine"

"Let's move then, we lost enough time as it is. Tierra! Pyrie!" They both snap at attention "take point, try to evade any unnecessary battle, let's go!"

"Maro!" "Plo!"

Come on girls, make me proud of you
