The whole world reshape before my eyes, rapidly transforming in what i recognize to be a beach, deserted but for me and Cresselia comfortably laying on her back in a similar deckchair as mine, the sun high in the clear sky, and with only the soft murmur of the sea to keep us company on what seems to be a pleasant afternoon

Despite having the feeling of missing something important, crucial details the would make the scene feel real, true, i cannot deny the peaceful sensation this relaxing environment is having on me

"We meet again at last"

I turn towards my gracious host, only to find her wearing black shades and sipping an unknown purplish concoction from a levitating cocktail glass

"The last time we meet wasn't in the best of circumstances, and i see that old habit die hard young trainer"

I decide that is pointless to look directly at her here, and it still give me a slight sense of annoyance speaking with someone directly in my head, or her head or...whatever it works

"Not by my choice i assure you"

"Perhaps. Tell me Jaden, have you meet Mespirit yet? I mean, intimately"

I raise my eyebrow at the question, or at least i think it's my eyebrow, me being a projection and all "I had the displeasure, of nearly had yes"

Even if i cannot see her, i know she just removed her shade and is looking at me intently "As a nearly meaning-"

"Her spread pussy on my face? She inciting me to fuck like a toy? Why yes, and for what i can tell she should be able to take my if we consider her womb as part of her canal...now i am becoming rude..or is having a person showing you her cervix and attempting to blackmail you into fucking her is considered rude...not sure i can relate anymore"

I can sense Cresselia throwing away her shades and gulping down the rest of her drink, before speaking again

"You seems to have a knack for attracting trouble Jaden, i can't leave you alone for a few days that half legendary psychic population want a piece of you, my you must be quite good in bed"

This time i cannot ignore the sarcastic remark and turn towards her, looking at her amused expression with a certain amount of distaste, like someone just salted my pudding cream

"So my mother liked to say, the first part i mean, damn, i am really begin to miss my boring old days, with nothing better to do then choosing my next plaything. Same as now really, just that now I am the plaything, and the legendary my owners, i am their master only in title, i may be able to order them around in battle but for the rest of the time..."

She wait patiently for me to continue "Rubica was right wasn't she? I am merely a medium for them, something to use to gain back Arceus favor, important because irreplaceable"

I feel a force on my cheek that force me to turn my head towards Cresselia, then she slap me in the face with a glove i didn't know where it came from. I Feel the need to hold my offended jowl but despite the impact i sensed no pain

The glove disappeared in the same way it came, from nothing "I am sorry for this rough treatment Jaden, but you left me no choice. Self-pity is the last thing you need, the last thing i need" I begin to watch her intently "Your title is not merely a colored belt keeping your pants on Jaden, You are their master in all sense, you have no right over their life obviously but you have it over their actions, not only in battle but while living and yes, even mating with them as well"

"You Jaden are their focus point, the very reason they suffered for so long and now the only cure for their loneliness, their ache and needs, a need that no other creature of this world can satisfy to it's fullest. Not because your are a god in the bedroom Jaden, but because of what you are"

"A medium? A small fragment of Arceus power incarnated?"

Another slap hit my other cheek faster that i can see, and damn i felt this one "Ouch!"

"You are no incarnation Jaden, you are a human, partially transcended into what Arceus believe to be the next stage of human evolution, everything forced on you using the limited power over creation that the pokemon some of you human refer over as god twisted and manipulated for it's own purposes, for the benefit of his more beloved creation"

I caress my cheek "If he., love them why it make them suffer so much?"

Cresselia sigh "Because sometimes is necessary, because life needs a choice, many choices and all given to the one who made them, it's complicated but essentially Arceus has no choice over the matter, unless it want to cause a series of events that will end up destroying it's power and everything it represent"

Hesitant i ask "Wou-would that include the world?"

"Part of it. Returning to your problem, well s, how do you intend to deal with Mespirit?"

"Can't you help me with her? Make her reason or-"

"She is not crazy Jaden, well not mad at least. You see, despite being wrong in saying that you are not their master, the part of using you to avoid oblivion is true, in part, no pokemon will end up in the abyss without a partner, but certainly the one that have one will live a lot better if Arceus idea come to be a reality, and it's servants while blind to the consequences are quite competent so it may even happen in a way"

"You mean.."

"I mean that basically you have two choices. One, you can take her as your mate. This will give you a certain degree of control over her actions and you may pull rank on her when she misbehave, also she will never do something directly against your orders or that would somehow harm you in any way, or any significant way anyway"

I shake my head "Pass"

"You may not have the chance to pass this one Jaden, but if you really don't won't her maybe you can try to trick her. If your impression of Mespirit is correct she is simply trying to save her hide at your expense, even if the trade is still advantageous for you technically speaking, it's binding and permanent. However while you are definitely the best candidate for a psychic, you are not the only one, in fact between your mates there are pokemon who do not share your element affinity right?"

I nod

"In theory if you make Mespirit believe that another gifted, or at least a trainer that Arceus has it's eyes on and that it consider important can be a better candidate then you, then she will probably go and torment him instead, simple no?"

I think on her idea for a few moments "But what if she doesn't want another? What if she want Me?"

Cresselia smile sheepishly "Well Jaden, if she wished for you to be her mate or if she genuinely find you attractive and your gift merely empower her feeling towards you...then nothing will ever dissuade her, nothing. She will end up hatching a scheme that will leave you no choice but to mate her and seal the deal, sorry"

"Can't...i don't know, Dialga help me?!"

"Dialga is not supposed to interfere with the timeline, but if you ask convincingly enough, and you being her mate and most prized possession perhaps"

I blink "Possession?"

"Hm-hm, dragon type pokemon tend to think their mate is their most prized possession and believe themselves to be the same for their beloved. Now Jaden i know it's abrupt but it's time to wake up, call me again if you need counsel, i am but a feather away.."

With those words the world suddenly turn blank again and i woke
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Going north? Well i try

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Warm.

That was your first coherent thought. You were surrounded by warmth. Your eyes open slowly, adjusting to the harsh white light. A quick search reveals that you aren't alone.

On your left Sylvia lay sleeping soundly, using your chest as a pillow. On your right, you found Zoroark clutching your arm tightly. On your stomach was Victini, curled up and snoring softly.

*"Greetings Master"* Floating quietly in the corner was Mewtwo. "Hello Mewtwo" the powerful psychic-type levitated over your prone form and placed her lips to yours. At that moment the door to your room opened and the nurse who opened it shrieked in fear.

Her scream was cut short as Mewtwo shot her a paralyzing glare before slamming the door shut telekinetically.

*"I'm sorry Master, I won't let her interrupt again"* "Don't apologize it's not your fault. But anything you might want will probably have to wait until tonight. We need to head north"

*"North, my love?"* Sylvia says as she wakes. "Yeah, there's something going on and it needs to be dealt with"

*"What, or who, do you need to deal with Master?"* Victini said as she rubbed your chest. You pick her up and rub her head. "Mesprit"

*"Oh so it's not me?"* she asked in a pitiful tone. "Well I can't deny you forever, so" Victini squealed in delight and threw herself around your neck. *"Thankyouthankyou! Finally, we will be together"* her voice faded into a whisper as she snuggled into your neck.

Joy burst through the door followed by the nurse from earlier. "See there's no problem here, these are all Mr. Jaden's pokemon" the nurse bowed and apologized profusely for her mistake."I'm terribly sorry Mr. Jaden it was all my fault, it won't happen again" "It's fine"

The nurse quickly left, keeping a wary eye on Mewtwo.

Joy sighed after the nurse was out of earshot "You can't go a week without getting into a hospital, can you?" "Screw you Joy" you wake Zoroark as you get up from your spot, and she snuggles up to you refusing to let go.

You manage to slip out of her grip and capture her, before you recall the rest of your team and prepare for a journey.

"Hey where's Rubica?"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Hospital bed or somewhere else, not alone

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Joy answer playfully "Eh, she got bored and decided to take her pokemon out to train, and by the way, the ranger gave me this Dragonair to examine in your name" I cringe a little remembering this particular pokemon "Beside sporting evident sign of recent sexual activity she is in perfect health, here"

Joy offer me the ball containing the pokemon that practically forced itself on me not a day ago, and i accepted it back by reflex, realizing only later when Joy had left that i once again placed my mental sanity, and maybe my physical health in possible jeopardy. But my more tactical side recognize the possible value a pokemon like a Dragonair can do for my team, and admittedly it's evolved form is universally considered quite powerful, one of the most effective pokemon a trainer can master

Realistically with so many legendary at my back and call this addition to the team could have been considered unnecessary, however i doubt most gym or even tournament judge would allow a powerhouse like Lugia or Mewtwo to compete, maybe the elite section would, but those tournaments are invitation only and they reward skill more then raw strength

Problem is, no matter how retrained, even Victini could probably easily blow up a whole stadium with all pokemon and human within with a reasonable contained effort, if she get the chance to build up enough power of course, so it wouldn't matter anyway, any move they use can be considered overpowering strong, no matter what. As such, i still need a good team of 'normal' pokemon to compete, and a Dragonite would definitely be a good choice, and hopefully, a sensible one

I tighten the grip on the ball as i prepare myself to release the pokemon contained within, i know that the rest of my team could help in case she decide to become too amorous, but i need, i must being able to control my team by myself, without having the rest of the group acting as enforcers as i was a petty dictator

So, after a good, steady breath, i return to the spacious room i was sleeping in and open the ball with my fingers, releasing the Dragonair as far as possible form me

The light quickly dim and the Dragonair look around disoriented for a few moments, then she look at me intently and reveal her toothy grin. She lose no time and rapidly cling herself around my body, with her muzzle barely a centimeter from my face, looking at me as mesmerized by my eyes

"Hello Dragonair, how do-"

She interrupt me by placing her lips on my own. Surprised i use my hand to delicately push her away, and she let me, but her wicked smile rapidly return as she bring up to my level the underside of a part of her i now know quite well, her vent rapidly becoming visible as the lips redden

"Look i just want to.."

She managed to silence me by beginning to lick her own vent, she sensually use her tongue to spread apart her lips and showing off her willing tunnel, already moist from her arousal. I blink and ask myself how such horny creatures as pokemon can even exist, by the speed their body get ready to mate you could easily mistake their whole race for succubus or something

My small distraction end quickly however as she use the same trick as last time and use the tip of her tail to slightly penetrate her sex, conveying me her readiness to mate, and just like before she place her now quite ready vent on my lips as asking me to sample the quality of the goods she is offering

Differently from last time however my hands are free, and i manage to push away her offering and firmly grasp her winged head

"Look Dragonair, i understand that..something of me make you feel all giddy, but i need you to focus ok? Focus and-"

She try to use the rest of her body to slip down my new pants, fortunately tightening my grip on her head make her stop and seems to have somewhat restored that flicker of intelligence i had hoped to find in her black orbs, even if it's barely a rowboat in a raging sea of lust

I must now play my part carefully if i want to get out of this room with both her obedience and all my stamina still intact "Do you want me Dragonair?" She doesn't even let me finish and nod "Do you Want me as your master?" She once again nod "Then if your master would told you to stop...would you?"

She look conflicted and in doubts, but still nod "Then your master is demanding you to stop" she tremble slightly as scared "Now"

She stand still for nearly a minute as if in doubt or awaiting the final line of a joke she hasn't realized i was telling. But eventually she release me and uncoil herself from my body, she still keep her sex close to my mouth tough, as hoping i change my mind on the subject

"Lower it please" i say referring to her sex, a command she slowly obey "Good, now, i want you to know that i am not refusing you" She speak her name for the first time since the beginning of our 'conversation' "No, i am not. But you have to understand that you cannot simply immobilize and and fuck the living sh..thing out me. If you want to remain with me then a few rules must be respected, clear?"

She nod eagerly "Alright, first rule, no mating unless i agree BEFORE we begin"

She seems confused but nod nonetheless, not sure if being scared or laugh at her doubting this rule, but maybe strong pokemon just come out and mate with any willing, or at least available mate? Anyway..

"Rule number two, when i ask you something, i expect my order to be carried out at the best of your ability"

She smile cutely as telling me that that's was obvious, tell that to Mespirit "Rule number three, don't expose yourself or otherwise try to seduce me in public"

The confused expression on her face make me understand that common pokemon do not have the same idea of modesty we human have "How to...don't show off your vent around unless we are alone or with the rest of my team ok?"

She look at me quizzically but still nod

I smile "Good, now i need to recall you back in the ball and meet a friend, i will let you out later and we can continue our discussion"

I recover her pokeball that only now i realize has fallen on the floor and prepare to recall Dragonair in, only to realize that it's undignified keeping a pokemon in your care without a name, it's like treating them like slaves

"Before returning, can i chose i name for you?"

She squeal in happiness, obviously understanding what such things mean "Ok, how about Laria?" She remain silent but seems to like the name "Come on then, get in" The pokeball recall my new team member in, leaving me finally alone to think

"That has gone a lot better then i expected" But my more cynical part remind me that now i had another pokemon to feed and care for, and pleasure, of course

"At least i am finally getting some measure of control over my life...i hope"

I recover my belt that right now only having the Zoroark ball attached as the other are probably with Joy for a check-up, or outside training with Rubica

"Good to know Joy know her craft at least, a few up points for being crazy at least"

I check up my gear one last time and recover my backpack, checking if i have everything to continue traveling north, and noticing how my pokedex is missing
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Otherwise i say...

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
You search the room once more but to no avail. So, unable to find it, you decide to ask Joy.

You find her in the lobby speaking with a young trainer. You wait politely for her to finish the conversation. While she was speaking the girl's eyes flicked towards you, a fact not unnoticed by Joy.

"HIIIIIIIII-YAAAAHHHH" She quickly spun around and threw a backhanded strike. You block the swing with an arm, before you respond "Lay off the caffeine Joy, seriously!" She drops her arm and breathes a sigh of relief. "Oh Jaden! I was afraid Team Shadow was attacking!" "Paranoid much?" "You can never be too careful" she huffed. "Now if you'll excuse me, I'm working with someone"

Joy turns back to the trainer only to find her cowering and utterly terrified. You step over and pat her shoulder, "Don't worry she's a little, how should I put this- insane, but she's a good nurse. Your pokémon will be in good hands" The girl nods slowly and stops shaking. "Oh yeah, Joy have you seen my pokédex?"

"Uhh Sylvia had it" "Thanks" You rub your chin as you step outside, wondering what Sylvia could want with your pokédex.

The sounds of battle draw you to the training field behind the center. Rubica and Vulcan were engaged in a mock battle with Lyrica. You glance around the area and see that most of your team were sitting off to the side, either resting or talking quietly. You see Sylvia sitting in a tree scrolling through your pokédex.

You make your way over to her, avoiding the battlefield and come to a stop beneath her tree. *"Hello my love"* "Hello Sylvia, what are you doing?" *"I had a nagging suspicion that there was something else"* "Something, else?" she nodded and dropped from the tree *"Yes something that we needed to know, so I used your pokédex to gather information. I think team shadow has more than just hybrids and trainers on their side"* she showed you the pokédex *"this is Yveltal, he is the very incarnation of destruction. There have been reports of him attacking trainers on the roads. They say he was accompanied by a man in all black, with a gold medal on his chest in the shape of the TS emblem"*

Your fingers tighten on the tree "So a powerful pokemon has sided with TS. We have to be prepared to stop him." *"I agree he is extremely dangerous, but we are strong"* She wrapped her arms around you and hugged you tight.

"C'mon we should get going"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Sylvia has it?!

choices: Challenge Rubica to a friendly match
Delay the idea, plenty of fight later anyway
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I am not sure where Sylvia has got the nwe information about this..Ya..yoha...

Grabbing the dex i scroll the recently visited voice and found this Yveltal, a brief scrolling of the information available to trainers say that this particular pokemon was recently discovered after a small village was wiped clean of life, a flashing warning advise any trainers and civilians to keep their distance from this pokemon as it's marked as highly dangerous. No further details are available on the matter, nor even the type as it's marked as ?

Or at least that what is told to the public. A small link under the pokemon name is available on my dex, and pressing it a whole new screen opened where certain private information where requested to authorize my access

I gulp down as after requesting for my fingerprint on the display, i reply the question about Lugia apparent genital size and remind myself to ask Joy how in Tartarus they acquired This particular kind of information, and possibly ask her Why they couldn't just ask for a personal ID or something. Nonetheless my answer proven to be correct and a new window appear, revealing a police report about the event

It seems that the part told to the public is true, but in these report much more details are present, it seems that the village was investigated after many citizens where unable to contact their relatives living there, no one was answering the phone or any other attempt of communication after a particularly vicious storm

The authorities, here reporting the name of two gym leaders and a bunch of other police officers, where dispatched to verify why many pokemon in the area where wailing in what seemed to be pain and acting aggressively towards each other far more then usual, reports of unprovoked attacks follow with all the relative links, apparently checking out the village was merely a cover for the operation, which explain why league officials where sent to lead the operation

Skipping this section i scroll down to the pith of the main report and discover that this Yveltal as it has been named due to it's shape, was present at the center of the village and was, based on the witnesses, absorbing some kind of energy from a swirling, wailing vortex over it's head. The reports of every witness is available for consultation but the gist of it is, that all agree that this pokemon was rejuvenating while the vortex became smaller and smaller

Any attempt to contact the pokemon where vain and any attempt to disable this exemplar where deflected by the strange vortex of energy looming over them. After more then half hour of failed attempts, the pokemon simply spread it's wings a flew away faster then any of the officials pokemon where able to and vanished without leaving a trace

The autopsy carried on the number 2 body recovered did not point out any evident cause of death, but most internal organs where shriveled and some part of the body has evident sign of necrosis

It was concluded that this newly discovered entity was probably responsible for the event, and that somehow among it's capabilities there is one that permit the creature to absorb the life force of living being in a limited radius of approximately 1.2 kilometers, slowly depriving the victims of their energy and causing their premature death

It's also assumed that the range of the ability is proportional to the strength of the victims, as stronger the target, smaller the radius

Exam on the body with ghost type pokemon revealed that it's not the life force of the body to being assimilated as originally theorized, but rather the soul of the victims is being drained out from the body, and then released once emptied of energy to the distortion world of Giratina directly, causing the physiological effects reported in the autopsy

The report contain many more technical data of little use to me but the final assessment recommend extreme caution when encountering this particular pokemon and to avoid a direct confrontation if possible, another note indicate that this pokemon ability of drain away soul energy seems to be available to it only when grievously injured as reported in another two encounter from league officials, apparently a powerful attack with so called 'Fairy' energy is capable of disrupting Yveltal charge of it's deadly ability, and force it to flee

The general report on this pokemon end with the note of it's probable type, Dark/?

The ? is hypothesized to be Ghost or Flying, as Fighting type moves where not as effective as expected when fighting the creature and no psychic field where detected during the confrontation


I close the dex, terminating any connection with the service database and walk toward my team lazing about. It's Sylvia that once again come to me and ask

"Master! Are you ready?"

I want to say yes, but seeing most of my team seated doing nothing give me an obvious idea "What about a sparring match before we go?"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Yveltal, the soul reaver pokemon

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Sylvia smiles slightly as she takes your hand. You help her to her feet and hold her close to your side. "Hey Rubica"

"Hmm? Oh Jaden you're awake, I was afraid you'd died" "Ha-ha. Now how about a quick battle before we go?"

She blinked twice before grinning "Now that I think about it, you did promise Sally a battle didn't you? I guess you've got yourself a battle"

You make your way to the position adjacent to Rubica, and gesture for your team to join you. Your fingers brush across Laria's pokéball as you reach for Zoroark's. You were about to call her out when you realized something.

"Wait, you know every member of my team," Rubica shrugs "So?" "So, I only know two of yours" "Alright alright, fine here's the rest of my team," she tossed several pokéballs into the air where they burst open, and released Rubica's pokémon.
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Challenge Rubica to a friendly match

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Four balls impact the ground before Rubica, releasing the usual flash of light i am now quite used to, the lack of personalization in any of her pokemon presentation is uncomfortably similar to what we male usually do, mostly uncaring about the first impression our partner make, and far more interested in the power our pokemon can exert

Usually woman are supposed to care more about impression and beauty, or so i have always been told, but apparently Rubica is different. Nonetheless the flash of light dim to reveal the rest of her team

First to the left there is Sally, the Salamence i already know quite well, considering we mated a time or two, which was a little awkward her being trained under another master, and i still can't understand how such a big pokemon can have such a snug and tight vent

Dispelling further thoughts about Sally genital area i look toward the second pokemon released, only to find nothing where the i was sure another light materialized barely a few seconds ago

Seeing me more then a little confused is Rubica that shed some light on the matter "Ignore him, Shadow has always been a prankster at hearth, he will probably reappear in the shower or something"

I turn to her "Shadow? What is it, a dark type?"

She smile "Close, Gengar"

"A Ghost?!"

She smugly reply "Yep, was father favorite pokemon, still is i think, more then once i suspected he saddled me with him not as much for my protection, but more for his amusement" She shake her head in denial "He played more prank on me, mother and a few friends that i dare to remember but he never hurt anyone, well sometimes their pride sure, but nothing serious"

I raise my eyebrow "Like materializing in the shower?"

"Not anymore, but before? Yeah, a time or two. But he quickly found out that a human punch do not ignore Ghost type physical resistance particularly well"

I look again at the position the ghost type should occupy, and for what i know still do, but it will be a matter for another time i suppose, hopefully not for the bathroom, or bedroom

Before i can return to check out the rest of Rubica team, i find myself fiercely hugged from what i rapidly recognize as an over affectionate Sally, that apparently decided that i have ignored her for too long, a minute, i think. Rubica of course completely ignore her pokemon actions, deciding to mock me instead

"You are such a charmer Jaden, merely your sight make even the strongest pokemon fall in love with you now"

I simply ignore Rubica vocal jab and focus on how to get out of my position without end up under, or over an aroused dragon type. Knowing my limited options i opt for hugging her back, and caress her side wherever my hands i could reach. She respond to my caress by purring softly, before i manage to make her release me and tell her to return in line, from her expression and her whine it doesn't take a genius to figure out she wanted more then a few cuddles, but i think i am safe from further avances for now

Finally free from interruption, i return to examine the fourth member of Rubica team, considering Sally first, Vulcan second, and the mysterious Gengar as third, ignoring how Shadow is such a clichéd name for a ghost

My eyes fall on the next member, revealing as one may expect that she posses a Grass type to balance her team out, namely a Grovyle, that remain there still as a statue and intensely looking at me, as expecting me to attack it or something

"Don't worry Jaden, he always do that to people he don't know"

I pause for a moment "Looking at me like i am a dangling piece of meat?"

She giggle "That one, if he wasn't vegetarian at least"

I nod, more then happy to hear that and focus on her next pokemon, and discover that i don't like this, not even a little bit. While Rubica seems to have figured out most of my so called affinity, apparently she must have let one slip, because the creature that stare at me from the ground completely mesmerized by my presence is a Dewgong, an Ice type

My memory remind me that actually it's a Water/Ice combo as it's shape clearly is made for swimming with as little resistance as possible in the water, but frankly even my Sneasel as Ice as secondary element and that did not reduced the affinity effect on her by even an inch, on the contrary this Dewgong seems positively smitten by my very existence, a problem that need to be cleared out before it's too late, and by too late i mean finding myself relaxing in my bathtub after a long journey, only to find an horny Dewgong jumping in and trying to impale herself on my staff

"Hmm, Rubica?"

"Yes?"

I point at her Ice type "It's a she"

Rubica come closer to me and reply with a confused tone "Yes, what's the problem" Her tone become playful "Want to add another notch to your belt?"

I turn toward her "My last affinity is Ice Rubica, that's the problem"

Rubica stare at me for many interminable seconds before making the connection, her eyes widen considerably at the revelation "Dewgong, return!"

She breathe a sigh of relief "Sorry Jaden, i was merely joking about-"

"I know, just, keep her away from my room or sleeping bag and we will be fine"

She nod and replace Dewgong ball on her belt "You sure the ice-"

"Yes, Psychic, Dragon, Electric and Ice, i had Fire too but i managed to remove at least that, was assured that removing another affinity is possible but it would make the remaining ones practically impossible to resist so, yeah"

She seems surprised by this knowledge, i thought she already knew that, wasn't she paying attention? Also..

"Why only five pokemon, the restriction was reduced to 8 since the cataclysm"

She smile "10 for elite trainers actually, even if i am not one yet. Well, differently from you, being a female is not a sufficient prerequisite to enter my team, Mr Secret Agent"

Yeah yea, rib me a little more, then she ask

"So, still want to spar?"

I remain still as what could have happened if i haven't mentioned my Ice affinity to Rubica..

"Sure, i leave you the first move, who do you wish to challenge first?"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Getting to Know her Team

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
You look over Rubica's team trying to judge their various strengths. "How about Grovyle?" Rubica looks at the pokémon in question who nods in response. "Alright, Grovyle it is"

You pull Zoroark's pokéball from your belt and pop it open. the moment she materialized she had your arms pinned to your sides in a huge hug. "Jaden!" she crooned "How can I please my master?"

You struggle to escape her grip, but your meager human strength shows you just how little resistance you could put up if one of these powerful beings decided to take you by force. "You could start by letting me breathe" her grip instantly slackens, allowing you to slip free. "We're having a friendly battle with Rubica, and I haven't seen you battle so I figured now would be a great time to see what you can do"

Zoroark smiles slyly "Do I get a reward if I do good?" "How about a pat on the back?" "Aww c'mon Master, don't play dumb you know what I want" "Yeah the same as every single other member of my team and then some. I haven't spent time with some of them in a while, I mated with you just the other day. Nysa and Tierra have a much better claim to my time than you, let alone Lyrica" you can almost see her spirit deflate as you speak. So you step closer to her and kiss her deeply. "But never forget, you're a part of my family now, and I'll always love you. Now are you ready? Because we've got a battle to win"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Choose the first challenger

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I prepare myself for the battle, recalling ll the information i remember on both Grovyle and my new Zoroark abilities and moves. Sadly while Grovyle pokemon are pretty well know, Zoroark are some sort of a mystery to most trainer, unfortunately i have to include myself in that whole as even the dex doesn't seems to have much on them

Grabbing the above mentioned device from my belt, i open it and use the scan function hoping to obtain more information now that Zoroark is charging her energy to attack, admittedly i am not sure it will make any difference, but it doesn't hurt to try

Rubica walk a few meters away from me and my pokemon as her grass type obediently follow her like a shadow. It take nearly a minute for Rubica to choose an appropriate distance in her opinion, before finally turning towards us and order her Grovyle to remain on the defensive. I believe she committed a mistake in revealing her main tactics before our confrontation even begin, but admittedly Rubica is simply being cautious, as just like me even she know very little about my new partner and i will probably need one of my psychic pokemon assistance in reading Zoroark thoughts and inform me of her possible moves, unless of course i stupidly remind myself that i could just simply ask?

"Zoroa-" She interrupt me

"Liliana if you will, master" She put an emphasis on the word master by feigning to stretch her legs and bending over, causing her fur normally covering her sex to part just enough to reveal her the outline of her sex. Of course as if wasn't sufficient, she feel the need to use one of her 'hand' to expressively part her lips open, in a very unsubtle attempt to make me reconsider the reward thingy i bet

What however end up shaking me a little is not her crass imitation of the attract move, despite i bet more then one trainer would say that this is the correct way to use such move, perverts, but it's that her attempt it's actually working, i really begin to find myself attracted from her exposed form, and i feel a little ashamed to admit how an action such as this, that would have provoked a mixed reaction at worst before the beginning of my journey, is now clearly exciting me, as i realize to have stared only when Zo- Liliana recall my attention on her head

"Why master, if you like we can postpone our match and you can.." she use once of her claw to penetrate her moistening sex "train me in obedience. Teach me what happens to unruly pokemon such as me, that just question their master opinion so directly..."

Once again i find my attention focused where i shouldn't even look, i think at least a trainer shouldn't..or should? I don't anymore...anyway. With an effort of will i managed to look away and my eyes fall on a unhappy looking Rubica, who is nervously beating her left feet on the ground with more then a little distaste lingering on her feature

Her voice managed to break the monotony of the small clearing "If you two are done.."

I calmly breath in and out, attempting to focus my attention to the battle once more and promising myself to look out my renewed attraction on pokemon later. Liliana meanwhile recover a more dignified combat stance now that the chance to get an early 'reward' slipped right trough her clawed fingers, and evidently glare at Rubica for a few seconds to no effect before choosing to adopt a neutral expression for our fight, for now at least

Meanwhile i finally managed to recover a semblance of mental fortitude and sufficient focus to think somewhat clearly again, which bring me to inevitably notice the annoyed expression some of my team is understandably directing at Liliana, Lyrica and Victini are understandably livid at the dark type seductions attempt. Disturbingly however, Pyrie seems to ignore most of the present events, and simply remain there, painting as she has just run a Pokeathlon all day non stop

Just as i ask myself why my Typlosion seems so tired about, i feel the distinctive presence of Sylvia gently asking permission to speak in my head. I look toward my lover and nod

"I am sorry do disturb your concentration Jaden, but Pyrie mental conditioning is overbearingly pushing against her will, demanding her, i am paraphrasing, ''to take it like the good little slut she is''"

What? what the..."oh fuck"

I realize to have spoken with my mouth only after i did it, not sure what Rubica is thinking now, seeing me cursing like this for no apparent reason

Nonetheless the memory of what Joy told me about Pyrie when she dropped her in my permanent custody are resurfacing from the depths of my mind. Pyrie was abused and probably trained to be a slut for her ex trainer and all his team since the day she hatched. The mental programming instilled in her head force her to behave like a nymphomaniac in need of her fix if she isn't mated regularly, and apparently nearly daily, and it passed nearly two days since her last..activity

I reply back to Sylvia using her mental link "Try to...soothe her as best you can, i will..help her as soon as i am done here"

"Yes Jaden, as you wish"

Sylvia cut the telepathic link, making me feel alone again in head, witch is a good thing actually, but her reverence toward me as her master is somewhat annoying now that we have become closer since that day, but i suppose it's inevitable given the situation, i am still her master and she is still my pokemon despite anything that may happen between us

I wonder if her father has found himself in the same situation once or twice, but i digress. I need to focus on the now, after all i still have a battle to win
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: A match called: Jaden life

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
You hold up your pokédex, focusing the camera on Lilliana. You nearly drop the dex in exasperation as she bends forward and exposes herself. "Oh my god, can you please focus" You raise the dex once again and get a scan. According to the screen, she knew most of the moves you would expect, with one surprise: Focus Blast

"How the hell did you learn that?" you mumble to yourself. "Doesn't matter. Lilliana use Night Slash!"

The Illusion-Fox pokémon rushed forward, claws cloaked in darkness. Her first strike was easily dodged and Lilliana found herself wide open for an attack.

"Grovyle, Bullet Seed!" Lilliana used her arms to absorb most of the shots, but a few still managed to get through.

"He's too fast, use Agility. Then Hone Claws." Lilliana closed her eyes and her body glowed pink for a moment. "Bullet Seed!" Her boost in speed allowed her to dodge the flurry of seeds that were flying in her direction.

Red claws scraped against each other as Lilliana sharpened them. "Alright lets try this again: Night Slash" "Leaf Blade" Both of the pokémon charged towards each other, Lilliana with sinister black claws, Grovyle with a glowing blade on his arm. Lilliana scored a glancing blow across Grovyle's stomach while receiving a slash directly across her chest. Lilliana stumbled slightly as she ended the attack holding her wound.

"Are you okay?" you call as she stands breathing heavily. She smiles weakly, giving you a thumbs up. Grovyle was wincing and staring at your pokémon "Alright try X-Scissor!" Lilliana turns around and leaps into the air. She comes down on Grovyle bringing both sets of claws across him with great power. Grovyle fell backwards crying out his name.

He lay on the ground for a moment before...
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: The match begin

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
As Grovyle touch the ground and use his leaf like appendages to hold the area where Liliana attack hit it's mark, i hear Rubica spitting out an hilarious series of profanities that make even the lust induced daze of Pyrie regress for a few seconds, just enough to look at her in what i can only assume is another form of stupor, that unfortunately doesn't resist her all consuming lust

"WHAT!? Even girls curse from time to time!"

Feeling somewhat brave, and deciding to ignore Pyrie now renewed lust gaze on my lower body, i decide to give my traveling companion a simple hint regarding etiquette

Not that i know anything about it, or care more then necessary, but when even the wild pokemon hidden between the trees suddenly go silent, you know that something must have gone wrong somewhere

"Eh..Rubica?"

She turn towards me, metaphorically slapping my face with a glare that would have make even a Golem freeze in place and rethink it's decision, whatever it may had been "There is no need to.."

Now, i wanted to conclude the phrase with 'be upset', but her intensifying glare open me new options to conclude this brief battle intermission with, and considering this new fact, i like to name this new opportunity 'don't get strangled in my sleep option', and rapidly to apply this new plan before it's too late

"...use such outdated curses..yes, there are so many more...forget it"

Rubica glare relent, as she attempt to refocus her attention on the battle. I shrug off the awkwardness of the situation and simply do the same, or at least i tried to, until Liliana decided that this battle must have been too boring for her taste and i find myself embraced from behind by the illusion pokemon, as she completely disregard our opponent and the ongoing battle, speaking of which i can clearly see Grovyle recover his strength and return to a somewhat intimidating combat stance, or it would have been intimidating if he wasn't slightly bleeding from his chest

I feel Liliana muzzle slowly caress my ear, removing most of my concentration from the battle once again "Come on master, can't we do something more fun?"

She of course lose no time in clarifying what she mean by fun, grabbing my right hand and placing it on her moist lips of her sex. I manage to pry myself from her weak embrace and without removing my sight from the improvised battle ring i reply

"No Liliana. Fight this match for me and prove to be a poke..no, a member of my team i can rely upon, or...."

She try to 'hug' me again, managing to escape her clutches by mere inches "Or...?"

I steel myself, and answer her in with all the confidence i can muster "Or i will leave you at the next breeding center we find. If you can't control your urges, not even in battle, then i will find a way to give you all the sexual relief you crave in the most constructive way i can manage"

She remain silent after that, and without saying a word she walk towards her still ready opponent, a loss that the seriousness of the moment is ruined by her choosing to use a battle stance that involve being on all four with her hips raised towards me

I feel the irresistible urge to slap my hand in my face for some unknown reason, but i resist the temptation as Liliana briefly turn her head towards me an say in a tone i am unsure if it's dark or huskily

"I love when my Jaden take charge of his humble pokemons, hoping he reconsider the idea of fucking me silly at the end of this farce"

What? what she is talking about?

Her tone return sweet and seductive as before "After all, our happiness And satisfaction should be one of master main priorities right? It's funny how most trainer thinks to have us bending to their will, when in truth the opposite happen far more often.."

I don't have the time to ponder what Liliana just told me, that Rubica order another attack and force me back to the now and our battle..but why she called this a farce? Is she so sure of her victory or just...there is something else i am still unaware of...or maybe she is just playing with me..

My focus on reality return when the smell of something foul smash through my nose and make me recoil in disgust. Looking on the battlefield i notice how Liliana and Grovyle have exchanged place, and a still seethe purple mark on the ground just a meter or so from the grass pokemon, along with another bad looking slash just under his arm

Liliana too sport a small cut just above her muzzle, but not even remotely serious as the poor Grovyle wounds...why i am fighting again?

I hear a voice calling me from the other side of the battlefield, and i need a moment or two before i manage to push away all distraction and focus on Rubica voice, she look more concerned then angry for some reason

"Jaden, what happened? Are you feeling alright?"

I look at her confused "Sorry? What.."

The i finally realize from the position of the two battling pokemon that the battle has stopped, and from the not anymore boiling toxic attack on the ground, has so fro a good minute or two, at least

Was i distracted for so long? How couldn't have i noticed?

"I am fine Rubica, let's continue"

She evidently doesn't agree with my statement "You sure Jaden, did the Toxic attack hit you or-"

"No!" I found myself replying with far more emphasis then i wanted to, my eyes looking at the ground as i realize what i just did "I am fine"

I don't even look at her and just, deciding to ignore the nagging feeling in the back of my head, telling me to behave like a man and excuse myself for my somewhat erratics actions as of now. Instead, i look at the improvised ring and grunt in mental pain as the now ever increasing pile of question accumulating in my head, and given my position, i know that revealing anymore then already aper to my psychic team would have been a bad ideas, i even doubt they understand what it mean to be...human?

Shrugging off the weird, senseless train of thoughts that had led me here, i look at Liliana and her knowing smirk just before Rubica order her Grovyle to use Swords Dance, a wasted effort so long after the beginning of this match, and Liliana grin deepen as she probably think the same

"Finish it off Liliana, use Foul Play!"

Rubica seems to spit out half her lungs when she hear my choice of move

"No! Grovyle use-"

A moment later Liliana reappear in my side of the battlefield and Grovyle lay out in the grass at her feet, out cold, with no visible form of additional physical injury beside the one taken before this move, how the heck this move even work?

Bah, i have enough things whirring in my head as it is, i should just, drop it for now

Liliana calmly walk out of the 'ring' and stop just before touching me

"Was i good my Master? Does this pokemon satisfied you with her performance?"

I am not even sure what i should, want, do to her, not that she doesn't have a few suggestion on the matter

"Yes Liliana, now please acting like a broken CD and tell me what you meant before"

She purr as she get closer, touching her nose with mine "We are what we are, Jaden. I am a pokemon with needs and desired like anyone else, and just like many of them i wished for something, more then being breed during my season, eat and drink to continue living, and sleeping to continue walking"

She press her hot furred body closer to mine, the heat of the battle still linger on her form, like her quicker heart beating or the more elaborate breathing "What i wish for, like many others before me Jaden, is someone that complete us, that make us feel whole" She doesn't lose the occasion to caress my genital area with her claws "Something, or someone that can quell our needs, without renouncing to what we are"

She recover a perfectly erect posture a walk by me "I am pokemon Jaden, and conflict is our language, battle our breathing, strength our intent...and mating, our fire. What better to give us all of this, if not a trainer, Master"

She then walk away and joining the rest of my team, all the while Lyrica look at her like she want to fulminate the illusion pokemon where she stand, but relent and prefer to cont the leaf in the tree or something, anything but assaulting her team member and smashing her somewhere painful i bet

Frankly i am not sure how to feel, if what Liliana say is true, then i am hardly using my pokemon, it's them that use us, the human race to fulfill their purpose, and in exchange permit us to do much, nearly anything in return...turn out fucking the brain out your Arcanine in heat is exactly what she wanted all along....it's creepy, and a somewhat scary thoughts too

It's that why a pokemon rarely rebel to it's master or mistress will? It's because we have a mutual exchanging most of us didn't even knew we agreed upon?

Fuck, must be those damn fine-prints none even bother to read, or something

The noise of a balls getting open remind me once again that introspection is all good and dandy, when you re Not in the middle of a fight, and as i look up i notice that Rubica has called out
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: When you preferred not knowing it

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
The hellhound was crouched low to the ground, prepared for battle. "Lilliana I'm pulling you out" "huh? But why master?" "I don't know much about Vulcan, and you've already taken damage. You also don't have any particular advantages, so it wouldn't be wise for you to remain in battle." You say as you watch Vulcan. Lilliana looks up at you in surprise before pressing her body against yours "Master doesn't want me to get too tired for later I see" "that's not it. I just don't want you to get hurt"

Your hand finds a specific pokéball on your belt and releases it from its clasp. The ball twitches slightly as it sits in your hand. You toss it into the air and it pops open releasing Tierra. The bone keeper Pokémon calls out its name and gives you a hug before turning her focus to Vulcan. "Lets get this started! Vulcan, use nasty plot." Vulcan grinned and mumbled to himself for a moment before returning his focus to the fight. "bone club" Tierra charged towards the dark-fire type Pokémon her bone held high.

Vulcan leapt out of the path of the bone wielding Pokémon, who quickly turned and rushed to where he landed. Her bone slams into Vulcans head as he hits the ground knocking him off his feet. Rubica yelled "Bite!" and vulcan snapped his jaws at the ground type. Tierra leapt out of range of the slightly stunned canines teeth and held he club in front of her in a defensive posture.

"Focus energy, then Headbutt." "Mar!" Tierra cries out and charges at Vulcan, head lowered. "Smog!" Vulcan sidesteps the attack and blows out a thick cloud of purple mist. Tierra coughs heavily and staggers out of the cloud wincing in pain.
"Vulcan, beat up" the Houndoom let's out a howl and Rubica's Pokémon come out of their balls and each land a blow on Tierra, one after another. The blows knocked her to the ground and sent her rolling towards you. You catch her and help support her as you call her back. "You did good Tierra, get some rest"

You return her into her pokéball and place it back on your belt. The next pokéball you grab contains...
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Vulcan(Hondoom)

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Despite being one of the first pokemon i got, my Milotic could have really called me forgetful, or uncaring, at least from her possible point of view, and it's somewhat true i am afraid, not that i do not care, but that i have avoided her, in a certain sense

Despite what happened the first and only time we had an intimate contact, i cannot let a few past misdeed poison my vision of the future, nor as a responsible trainer let this chance pass untested. Now resolute and confident in my decision, i remove Nysa ball from my belt, wondering for a moment why she wasn't relaxing with the rest of the team, then i push away any distraction and stray thoughts until the end of battle

"Nysa, come out!"

I throw the ball to the ground at my feet, and as expected a beautiful Milotic rapidly take shape from the amorphous energy escaping the ball. Then when she finally fully materialized a few seconds later, she rapidly turn around to notice me and decide to hug me, (although strangle would have been more appropriate)fiercely enough that for a moment I'd would have swear to have seen Giratina with a purple colored scythe ready to...yeah

When i am finally released from my affectionate Milotic, i rapidly try to recover from the impromptu hug i just received , only to find myself nearly turning red from having my left cheek licked affectionately. After a brief struggle, i managed to pull my self up and push Nysa cool tongue away from my face

"Ok ok, i got it you hare happy" i gently pat her head "feel better now that you have hugged me?"

Nysa nod happily, before returning to face her opponent with a stoic professionalism i never expected to see in a pokemon. At least she merely wanted an hug and not, ok enough, let's focus on the battle


Vulcan remain perfectly calm despite having now to face an element that can easily spell his figurative doom, Rubica too seems to have calmed down after our last round, how curious, was maybe her small success against my team to have put her back in a more manageable mood?

Rubica decide to have lost more then sufficient time waiting and order Vulcan her new orders

"Get ready Vulcan, use Double Team!"

The horned quadruped waste no time to obey his mistress order and rapidly begin to run between two close position until two distinct copy of himself stand on the improvised ring, i cannot avoid to notice how different his method of using this particular move in comparison to Sylvia, but i guess it had to be expected given he cannot simply project an image or afterimage with pure mental power

Despite me finding Vulcan method a little barbaric, it's nonetheless effective as no matter what, i am unable distinguish anymore the real Vulcan from the copy, and given how Nysa is growling in annoyance neither can she

"Alright Nysa, let's cool him down, Rain Dance!"

As my water type begin her strange 'dance', Rubica angry scream attract my attention

"What!? You little, i only have this shirt clean you damn-!"

Due to Rubica chosen method to express her disapproval with my battle tactics, i was unable to see Nysa perform her move, but it must have worked because it was impossible to miss the thunder clap that just interrupted Rubica rant

The air around us rapidly become humid and the light of the sun is quickly obscured by a few ominous gray clouds that appeared just above the battlefield and it immediate surrounding area, but leaving the rest of the forest and the pokecenter completely undisturbed. It's incredible what powers pokemon seems able to posses, i know the legendaries declaring themselves my mate are capable of doing even more, but i never seen such finesse an control over such a thing as whether, after all the last time Kyurem decided to improvise a little distraction a whole city suffered a snowstorm

For a moment i wonder how can responsible adults leaving creatures capable of such a feat in the hands of ten-twelve years old boys and girls with little to no training whatsoever, with a very limited knowledge of act and consequences baffle me

Another small scream of agony attract my attention back to Rubica, whose shirt is now completely wet and due to the her choice of fabric, rapidly becoming transparent and revealing her lack of bra, fortunately for her, her jeans like pants are mostly unaffected by the curiously perfectly temperated water now hammering our bodies, at least trasprent-y wise

How in Tartarus this rain can be anything less then chilling cold is a mystery to me, but perhaps it has something to do with the energy used to 'conjure' this phenomenon, it's not natural rain anyway

Rubica angry glare at me while using her hands to cover her upper torso, manage to send a small shiver down my spine, seriously that girl has issues. I raise my hands in sign of peace, trying to make her understand that her half nakedness side effect wasn't in my plan, which is true but i doubt she care anyway. Once again fortune seems to be on my side as a small purple like dome begin to appear above our heads, big enough to cover our human body but leaving the rest of the battlefield and the pokemon in the rain

Turning towards my team i notice how a similar colored cover seems to shield my whole team from the rain, and the soft glow emanating from both Sylvia and Lyrica hands make pretty easy to understand the pokemon i have to thanks for their efficiency. I nod towards them both, them replying in kind, before returning my focus to the battle at hand. Much to my and Rubica relief, it seems that her shirt is now perfectly dry, probably still thanks to one of my two psychic, even if still a bit crumpled

Rubica wisely decide to ignore any further comments and prefer to resume our battle instead
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Why i never used you, part 1

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Vulcan rears up onto his hind legs inhaling deeply. "Safeguard, and dodge if you can" Nysa emits a soft cry and a pink glow, a transparent barrier covers her for a moment before fading from view.

Vulcan slammed his front paws back onto the ground and released a huge stream of purple gas. Unable to get out of the way Nysa is caught up in the cloud. "Water pulse" an orb of water shot out of the cloud and hit Vulcan square in the head. The attack pushes him back but doesn't knock him out or confuse him.

"Vulcan, Dark pulse" "Twister Nysa" Vulcan opened his maw wide and a burst of black energy shot towards the serpentine Pokémon. The blast hits her midsection and she cries out in pain, but continues to fight. Nysas eyes flash and she lets out a deafening roar. The wind began to pick up and soon a small vortex had formed in the middle of the field.

You could feel the twister pulling at you but it was nothing compared to how it was pulling on Vulcan. He slid for a few feet before he was lifted off the ground and sucked in. The vortex progressed and you could see small rocks and debris were also hurtling around in it, colliding with each other and he hellhound.

After a few moments Nysa allows the small but powerful storm to dissipate allowing Vulcan to crash into the ground, where he remains unmoving. As the storm cleared so did the rain, retuning the sky to its former sunny glory.

Nysa finds her way over to you and gives you another hug. "Alright Vulcan get some rest you did good. Well this is a great match, Jaden. I haven't had this much fun for a while. You'd better not ease up because I sure won't!"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Come on Vulcan, use Smog!

choices: Refresh the team at the center and boldy go, where no man ever..yeah
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Rubica smile wickedly as she grip one ball from her belt, she seems quite sure of herself and the glint in her eyes exude the feeling of restlessness that once again give me a feeling of uneasiness, i begin to seriously believe that Rubica must have some serious issue about competitiveness, or maybe she just want to get me back for the rain

That may have something to do with that, yeah

Rubica nearly theatrically launch the ball to the ground, with a glee more fitting to a predator on the verge of jumping her prey, then a trainer preparing to a new match

"Come out Shadow, show....Where the Heck are You!?"

I am not sure if i should laugh or feel pity for her, of course the pity part quickly vanished when i see how she is glaring at the empty ball on the ground, her anger is so palpable that i find myself surprised the ball didn't melted itself in shame, not that the ball has feelings, i think

Rubica continue to stare down the offending, empty ball for a good minute or so, scheming the nefarious end of the former occupant in the most gruesome and painful way she can imagine no doubt, then she begin to turn around herself and proceed to glare to every shadow, every small hidden hole she think her ghost partner could be hidden, but frankly, i don't believe that all this extension will help her achieve her goals, or anything really, if her Gengar is even remotely similar to the 'species' stereotype, Shadow is probably pranking some unaware passer-by, that is unlucky enough to find itself in the wrong place at the wrong time

Namely near Rubica next target for annihilation

Rubica face contort in anger as she probably reach the same conclusion i have, and proceed to curse the heavens so loudly and with such creativity, that managed to attract the attention of a passing child seemingly returning from school from his attire, which after blushing at her words, promptly stop walking and release his backpack on the ground, then calmly grab a book that definitely look like a dictionary and compulsively begin searching for a word i am not sure it really existed until five minutes ago

Deciding to ignore the child new learning experience, i instead focus on the problem, only to find out Rubica already holding another ball in her hands, completely ignoring the one already on the ground at her feet

Her expression grave, with a small hint of insecurity in her voice "Ok Jaden, i am really, really sorry about this.."

I once again feel that chill running down my spine "A-about what?"

Rubica hold her ball hight, ready to throw it on the ground "I have only one pokemon left, i will not simply give up...Never!"

What the...oh shit!

"No no no no on on no! Sally, Sally hasn't fought yet!"

My opponent hiss in distaste "Sally? Sally will never fight you, she will simply...aurgh!"

She breath a few times, evidently trying to calm herself a little. After a few deep breaths "Sally will never fight you Jaden, she may be My pokemon, but she really, really..Really like you"

Her next words carry a small hint of sadness in it "It doesn't matter what i do, despite having cared and helped her through most of her life, she would never choose me over you Jaden, we both know that, not unless i give her something to bite as an incentive for her trouble"

I find myself more then a little confused by her statement "What? Why? What do-"

"She consider you her Mate Jaden, her lover. Dragon type never fight their mates on purpose, not unless you manage to focus their attention on something else, why do you think most trainer do not own Dragon type pokemon?"

The scene i find myself in is surreal at best, Rubica with her arm raised and ready to unleash her ice type menace upon me, my team looking at us intently while thankfully the child has left, and me here asking myself questions about...what?

"Because they are stubborn?"

I hear Lyrica melodious laugh echo in the silent clearing, and while the sound seemed innocent enough, the implication do nothing to calm down my nerves

Rubica eyebrow raise for a moment "That too sure, but mostly because they value their mates as the precious thing ever, and as a species they will do anything in their power to protect and help their mate in any way they can, sometimes counter productively as their instincts are usually too strong to ignore and make them do stupid things"

Stupid things? Like...oh, ah ok "So, they may not obey if.."

"If they chose a mate that oppose you directly, there is no guarantee they will follow your orders. As such, the only way to ensure their loyalty is usually finding them a mate you can control, or one they don't see too much, like any pokemon in the breeding centers or another member of your team"

She sigh "I hoped to match her with father Arbok, but.." Her face become grim for a second "it didn't work"

I gulp as i process what Rubica just told me, of course an idea easily form in my mind, i don't like it but...

I figuratively grab my balls and "What if..we offer her something to bite then? A prize if she, win, or at least fight as she mean it?"

Rubica look at me incredulously and for the first time since the beginning of this awkward conversation lower the ball in her hand "...You just want to fuck my pokemon don't you?"

A full blown laugh can be heard coming from my team, but as soon as i look in their direction, everything become return quite

I look at Rubica again "Look, i..i am not sure if this i a good idea, but the only two pokemon you have left are both eh, affected by my ability right?Yeah sure, curse more like, anyway, i would prefer to face Sally that is a pokemon i know, if my other only choice is one i do not know, make any sense to you?"

She look at me suspiciously for an uncomfortable length of time, i swear i feel myself sweating a little

"Yes, it make sense, but this way you'll end up bedding one of my pokemon anyway, no matter how you look at it, You'll end up getting the 'prize' Jaden"

I find myself quite disturbed by her allegations "You think i enjoy having sex with pokemon?"

She nod "Yes, definitely"

I hear my team mumbling in approval..what the fu-

".......I never said i dislike it Rubica, i merely liked to have a Choice in the matter"

She shake her head "And as soon as you get one, your first idea is to go for it uh?"

Her words leave me flabbergasted "Of course not, i....don't think so"

She nod this time "Right" She then shrug "Fine by me Jaden, look like you'll need do decide what you really want from the looks of it, but whatever"

Rubica remain still for a few moments "Jaden, can i ask you something, seriously i mean"

What now, first you accuse me...ok let's drop it, it's...why everything in my life must be so complicated?

"Uh, sure?"

She look at me with a neutral expression, one that transpire seriousness "Did you even like human womans?"

My mind become blank, all my thoughts painfully grinding to stop".......What?"

A loud ringing coming from my pockets timely interrupts our conversation, truthfully i am not sure to understand what kind of question Rubica asked me, i mean i do like human girls, why should i not? Damn if i understand them tough

Grabbing the poke gear form my pocket, i press the answer button pulsing under the call symbol, i am so distracted i don't even look at the caller ID "Yes?"

The figure appearing on the phone is definitely a nurse Joy, but i fail to recognize the pokecenter symbol on her uniform, i am not ashamed to admit that i don't remember most city symbols anyway, and this one look like a spider with an egg symbol over it, a little creepy to be honest

"Hello Mr Jaden, i am sorry to have called you directly instead of going through the proper channels, but this is an emergency and we are in desperate need of an agent of your clearance"

My thoughts begin to freely flow in my head once more, but even my restored awareness i still fail to recognize the symbol, then i inadvertently press my finger on the brooch image as i try to get a better grip of my device, and a small window appear just under the nurse face

Reading this new source of info, i now understand why this symbol looked so strange

The nurse on the other side of the line continue "Can you help us Mr. Jaden?"

My attention remain focused on the small window under Joy image, it must seems a little strange from her prospective "I..need to know the nature of the problem first, miss.."

She appear mortified for a moment, she sheepishly continue "Yes, sorry"

Joy manage to recover a more natural expression "One of my college speak highly of your ability to calm down violent or otherwise uncontrollable pokemon, she also told me you had experience with some of the controlling methods used by Team Shadow during another personal errand"

...........I don't like where this is going, no, no i definitely don't

Once again my eyes fall on the window under Joy image, and a cold, chilling feeling pervade my body with unnatural easiness

"I am not sure to be qualified for this job miss, i am not sure what your colleague told you but pokemon Breeding is not a filed i know much about"

The nurse smile "I know Mr Jaden, but i was assured that Dragon and Electric type are somewhat your specialty, or was i misinformed?"

I gulp as i inexplicably feel the loose collar of my shirt tighten for absolutely no reason "Yeah..you could say that"

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:

"It seems like they need some help, but I think that my presence may just stir the females up"
