The doors open again as Rubica returns from the training field, apparently having found Shadow.

"So?" "So what?" Rubicam sighs in an exasperated fashion. "Are we gonna go help them?" You look down at your knees "I don't know. I might just make it worse" "Well you won't know until you try" she says as joy removes your team from the machine. You gladly return the myriad of pokeballs to your belt finding comfort in their presence. "Well girls what do you think? Should we help them" several of the pokéballs wriggle in their clasps as if nodding vigorously. "I guess it's settled then, let's go"

"Wonderfull" Joy says as she returns Rubicas Pokémon. "I knew you would help them. The center is a two hour walk up the main road" "I'm not sure how but you played a part in this" you say as you walk out the door, finger pointing at her in accusation. She giggles and waves as Rubica pushes you out the door.

True to Joys instructions two hours later you find yourself in front of a somewhat large building labeled as a breeding center. "Well this is the place, but it seems fine" no sooner had the words left your mouth than a
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Refresh the team at the center and boldy go, wh...

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
I sigh for the...i think the eleventh time in the last hour, i still don't even know why, or even what i was called for exactly and here i am, facing the standard automated double doors so common in pokemon center or any other commercial building really, unsure on how, or where, i put my last vestige of courage i have left for today

I am not a coward, but i am not exactly an action hero either, as such my reserve of the precious emotion capable of giving me the recklessness i need to face everyday adversity that is now the daily events i now call my life, is quite limited in nature, and i am pretty sure reaching the doors of a breeding center where both male and female pokemon are kept day and night aroused by who know what kind of substances are given them by the so called scientists slash breeders feed them, And where most of above mentioned pokemon share my so called affinity That has the bad habit of making such kind of pokemon frisky towards me...

I am pretty sure i exhausted today courage reserves, and entering the automatic double maw of doom will indubitably require more then i usually need for in week or so

Give or take an electric type, sort of

Of course, as always, my precious companion slash only friend that followed me till now is ready to give her full and unadulterated emotional support in such difficult time..

My musing is admittedly, expectedly interrupted by my friend Rubica, who attract my attention by gently tapping my right shoulder, i of course turn to face her with a smile on my face

"...the heck you smiling about?"

....yeah, i am thankful for having such friend in time of need...

"Co me on! What are you waiting for?" She tap the ground evidently annoyed "An official invitation?"

I remain still for a few moments, before nodding vigorously towards her

Rubica raise her eyebrows, then simply grab my shoulder and begin to push me towards the maw of doom

As a surge of nervousness raise from the pit of my stomach and rapidly reach my neck, my instinct react immediately and make my body reflexively push back against the force that would inevitably spell my demise if left unchecked. So, as any normal living being, i decide to use whatever countermeasure at my disposal to avoid my preordained fate

Not so normally i decide to do so by slipping my hand on my belt and grabbing Pyrie ball, letting it fall to the ground

"Pyrie! Come out!"

The ball impact the ground soundlessly and open, releasing my best bet to deal with a nervous slash infuriated woman or soon to be anyway

By releasing another one against her that want exactly the opposite. Why? Simple, Pyrie dependency problem has made her needy of a male attention, her mate attention to be more precise, and Rubica action are precluding such attention by forcing me to be shared with who know how many lust crazed female that surely inhabit this center, or at least that is my unbiased opinion

Not that Rubica has anything to do with this breeding center or my so called duty with my 'organization', but i have all the intention of making my lust crazed pokemon think otherwise......know that Rubica revenge will be probably swift and merciless, but right now i frankly just don't care

The releasing of Pyrie manage to create a diversion and make Rubica step back confused, or at least try to because evidently i must have underestimated my fire type tenacity or maybe just her lust, causing her to jump towards my waist and missing only by an inch due to Rubica involuntary intervention as she fall back due to the unexpected pokemon action, and reflexively grip my shoulder as the closer thing around to avoid falling on her ass

Of course a woman in white coat decide to come out to greet us in this very moment...

The scene must have been hilarious to her, a trainer with an over affectionate Typlosion rubbing herself up and down it's leg, a girl that seems awkwardly embracing the boy from behind, all the while the lad try desperately to shake off the pokemon and get his leg back

I don't even notice her presence until she manage to clear her throat loudly enough for us to hear. I look up from my yet to be ransomed leg, and finally notice the new presence in our midst, to her credit she manage to not laugh at the scene and manage to tone down her reaction to an amused smile

The blond woman smile at us sincerely amused as she recover an electronic pad not different looking from the one i have seen Joy use....by the way, why are all Joy look alike?

The woman begin to calmly speak "Good day young ones, how can New Nuvema Center help you?"

Rubica rapidly recover a more dignified stance, blushing all the while, and Pyrie of course don't give a damn and continue undeterred ignoring everything but me, at least i manage to make her stop rubbing her hips on my pants by beginning to petting her as best i can given my the circumstances
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: A Good First Impression Is Better Then 1000 words

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
You quickly pull yourself to your feet, despite the extra weight of Pyrie holding onto your arm. "Um hi, my name's Jaden. This is my friend Rubica and my Typhlosion Pyrie. Nurse Joy asked me to come down and check things out." You say while extending your hand.

"Oh so you're the exceptional trainer that Joy told me about." She shook your hand with a relieved expression. "We've been waiting for you." She firmly guided you through the doors of the building and into a reception area. Pyrie remained at your side and Rubica wasn't far behind.

"Chris!" The researcher called to the man sitting behind the desk that occupied a corner of the room. "He's here" immediately the man sprang from his chair and shook your arm furiously a huge smile on his face "Oh thank Arceus you're finally here" you grimace inwardly at he mention of the alpha Pokemon, but put on a smile. "I was told that you had some unruly electric and dragon types" Chris's smile faltered slightly "I wish it were as simple as that, some of them are unruly while others are completely docile. And then there's a couple that are extremely aggressive." He stopped smiling completely as he spoke. "But the part we're really worried about is that they weren't always like this. Most of them were well behaved and got along well with most of the other inhabitants.

"But recently they seem to have become entirely different Pokemon" the researcher interjected" Chris nodded "it's as Angie says, they are like different beings. Some grew aggressive while others simply seem to lose any desire to battle"

You process the information for a moment, both of the employees watching you with hope in their eyes. "I'd like to see some of them" Angie nodded and led you through a door "I think it might be best if you returned, Pyrie was it? To her pokeball" you see the wisdom in her suggestion and return her after a quick apology.

With the fire type contained, Angie leads you down the hallway to some windows. "These are made of one way glass, so we can keep an eye on them" through the first pane you saw a Mareep simply lying in the center of the room. You watched for a moment before asking "How many are like this?" Angie checked something on her device. "About thirty, and there are an additional seven that are extremely aggressive. "Can I see some of them?" "Sure, which ones would you like to start with?"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Quick Tour, Easily Done

choices: Sigh, fine, let's continue shall we?
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
Why i was even asked? Seriously, do this duo really believe that i am some kind of miracle worker, or, don't know, that i can simply agitate a wand in the air and bam! Everything fixed

Not sure i would like that actually, will end up with me having to run left and right just to fix someone else mess all the time...

Not that this isn't already happening

"I would prefer to begin with the more calm one if possible, although i am not sure what to look for, i am not a specialized caretaker or a breeder, not sure i can even find anything really"

The researcher, Angie, smile honestly "Don't worry, we have already tried every conventional method we could thought about, with little to no result, at this point a more unconventional approach is probably the best possible option we have right now, and the only one available to us as well, the league refused to send a specialized caretaker despite this center is theirs and so far we haven't be able to understand why" She shake her head as confused "Your name came highly recommended as our only option, we hoped you could explain why"

I scratch my head absentmindedly "Not really, i have a certain affinity for Electrical, Dragon...Psychic.....Ice" I try to clear my head by reminding myself why i am here, well if i knew it at least "but anyway, can i get a little more data on what you are actually researching here? This is a Breeding and Research center right?"

Both employee nod "For what?"

Another voice temporarily interrupt our conversation "Angie! Can you came here a second? Need help with the Dittos"

Angie sigh dejectedly "Well, it seems my answer has to wait" She turn toward her coworker "Chris, do please accompany our guest and show him whatever he want, the league cleared him already, full access"

Chris eyebrows raise in surprise for a moment "Alright" He then turn towards me and Angie hastily leave

"So, what do you wish to see first? I would recommend starting with a small tour of our subjects, but it's up to you, i can explain everything on the way"

I nod briefly, feeling a little dejected already "Lead on"

I decide to consult my pokegear while i am being lead to my begin my 'tour', i don't even want to wonder want kind of tour i am gonna get in a breeding center, figure, nonetheless as long as i am not getting too friendly with the subjects as impersonally they was called, I'll be fine with it. Of course when i notice the plaque restricted area in the last door we passed as i tried to get a stable signal for my gear, i knew i was just gonna get in trouble again, why? Call it gut feeling, plus as soon as the normal looking door closed behind us, the signal bar on my gear instantly dropped to zero

This whole section must be the 'real' research center, where the..whatever they do is really done

As we calmly pass a few others researcher on our way, i notice how many of them seems quite interested in my person, i manage to hear one whispering a few words about, "young" or "who in tartarus is this kid", and i think i heard one say something like "it's Him?"

Him what? Special agent and all that league affairs? Or Him about something else i don't know yet?

At this point, probably both

Chris lead me to another more spacious corridor then the one with the Mareep, same purpose too i think, complete with reinforced viewing windows, and of course, my tour cannot begin more expediently

In the window, i can clearly see a not so spacious room, must be 7x5 or something, barely 1m meter tall, inside an Eevee on her back is restrained and completely surrounded by a ditto, giving us an unrestrained look of the above mentioned Eevee cervix, as he, well at least it's acting as an he, fuck her silly with a transparent cock definitely thicker then necessary, and pushing with enough force to endanger even her last barrier of defense

I blink, not only at the situation, but i also asking myself why the ditto is fucking his mate so close to the window. Not sure why i cannot divert my attention from the spectacle before me, especially seeing the Eevee more then a little disgruntled with her position, not that she can do anything about it, but at least the first question find an answer when my guide press a button on the side of window and nearly scream

"Come on Ditto, it's more then an half hour already, finish her off!"

My eyes widen as the ditto suddenly stop, then resume thrusting itself in and out of his unfortunate mate with wild abandon, until finally a few seconds later with a silent cry from the Eevee, he manage to just just as told. From this distance i can clearly see as the ditto manage to widen the the Eevee small cervix, how he stop thrusting and instead push part of his 'cock' inside the Eevee womb, then still keeping his mate leg wide open and pushing her hips a little forward to give us a even better spectacle, he begin to form a white viscous liquid from inside it's body and push it inside the womb he just claimed

The Eevee stop her struggle as her mouth remain open with a small rivulet of drool coming out from her lips, not sure if in pain or pleasure given my experience with pokemon, it should be painful but at this point i am not so sure anymore, and let her mate finish unloading what probably is his seed in her for a good minute or so, before unceremoniously pull out of her body, and letting her form fall on the soft looking ground with little to no care about her wellbeing

Chris manage to attract my attention back to him by weaving his hand in front of my eyes, his wicked smile make me feel dirty for a moment giving his evident joy at the scene before us "Like the show? Just one of many to see everyday, a loss we reach them this late, but i can locate a new pair that haven't yet started if you wish"

I look at him with a mix of disbelief and...and something else, then simply ask "What? It's that what you do here all day?"

He shake his head and chuckle "Of course not, this is merely the breeding section, the actual research happen down below us, but it's always entertaining to see them" his smile become even bigger, using his hand to indicate the exhausted Eevee trying to catch her breath, her sex still parted from the stretching she took and dribbling the ditto semen in a steady rivulet "Play"

I have trouble understand this, man, logic, if i can even call it man, he is really enjoying seeing their subject getting pretty much raped everyday? I decide to not mention him this particular line of thoughts, and instead continue with my questioning as calmly as i could

"What exactly are you trying to accomplish here?"

His smile diminish somewhat "Well, try is the right word i am afraid" He pass his hand on his hair in evident frustration "Our research is focused on how exceed the pokemons actual physical limitations using a less invading procedures as possible, you see, there are many kind of pokemon in the world, some posses only a single element to call upon, while other have two, but despite the type nearly all pokemons can focus with elements that are not their own while using what we have come to call as Moves"

He sign for me to follow "For example, a Buzel which is a pure water type, can use a few Moves that are neither water nor normal in nature, like Agility, true it may only be our classification to be wrong, could very well be that Agility is actually a..Body type move instead of a Psychic one, altrought such class dosen't exist, but what about Toxic then? Or even Blizzard?"

We stop at another viewing screen and this time i am actually not sure i want to look through

"Once again one can explain it that both those move are not learned naturally, but i, we, as the league, do not understand how that could justify it's use, after all not all pokemon can learn Toxic or Blizzard, even with the right TM. So it's pretty obvious that there is something else that allow certain pokemon to learn and use certain Moves while other cannot, Arceus limited them for a reason"

I gulp down and pick up the courage to look at the room i know being behind the reinforced glass, only to find the glass missing completely, pulled open in the middle by two mechanical arms and revealing a calm looking garden with a Lucario, no, a pokemon that look like a Lucario but..but it's reddish and it's staring back at me!

The pokemon in question literally vanish from sight in a blur and reappear not a meter from me, startling me and nearly making me fall back on my ass

Chris immediately help me remain on foot and glare at the not Lucario "Luka! how many times we told you not to do that?!"

The not Lucario get even closer and bow jokingly at me, completely ignoring Chris "Sorry for have startled you Master, but i was really excited to know about your arrival!"

Master? Master?! Who in the....oh shit!

Chris clear his throat "This pokemon claimed to be yours Mr. Jaden, and while we had no confirmation for her claim, we thought it was better wait for your arrival before using her as a test subject, in case you didn't agree with our, ehm, policies"

I remain still, and try to clear my eyes with my finger with mixed result "Luka, as like..."

She smile and come so close her nose touch mine "Yes master, i told you i would come back to you, haven't I?"

She gently lick my nose while i ponder how my guts feeling where right

"Fuck"

The not Lucario finish my phrase "Feel free to me whatever you want, Master"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: In which you should listen to your guts

A sphere pressed into your hand, looking down you see it was a pokéball. Luka smiled and pressed her muzzle against your neck, cuddling up to you "I'm yours Master"

Chris chuckles "hey we have rooms for that sort of thing!" You manage to pull away from the red-pawed Lucario, but not before you receive a couple licks on the cheek. As you separate you take a closer look at the unusual Pokémon. She still looked much like a traditional Lucario, but with exaggerated features. Her arms and legs were tipped with red fur and and smaller extra spikes behind the originals. Her cream fur had grown longer on her back, giving the illusion of a cloak. Two of her aura sensors extended to about her waist, and were also tipped with red. The black marks on her head and body spread out in rough patterns.

She smiles as you look her up and down, enjoying being the center of your attention. "I want an explanation later" you say as you follow Chris down the hall. Her smile doesn't falter "Of course Master" Chris leads you down through the hall looking through the windows every now and then. You did your best to avoid looking into the windows, it felt wrong to watch. After a short walk Chris stops in front of a plain grey door labeled: Sam.

"Here is one of the Pokémon that have stopped doing anything" Chris said as he unlocked the door. "I've got to check up on something, there's an intercom button in the room. Just press the button and speak, I'll be able to hear you" you nod and thank him before slowly opening the door and looking around.

Curled up in the corner is a(n)
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Sigh, fine, let's continue shall we?

choices: Finally to the towards lab, saw enough 'playing' for today
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
The first thing i notice about this room, it's the ceiling height, easily 3m or more, something that obviously attracted my attention given how low was the last room i have seen till now

I suddenly find myself focusing on the ground as the images of what happened to the Eevee in the adjacent room, images i have trouble forcing out of my head. I try to close an open my eyes a few times, hoping that forcing my brain to refocus my vision a few times could somehow help to free me from this distraction, but this methods prove to be mostly ineffective, and more then a little annoying as well

I am so distracted by both the event i just saw and my own incapacity to understand why i can't those memory out of my head, that i didn't even noticed when something gently tapped my shoulder

As a reaction i literally bolt forward with a not particularly manly "eep" and turn to see my aggressor wanna-be

I let go of a breath i didn't had realized i was holding when i see Luka amused face with her paw still at my right height. Se evidently try, and mostly fail, to keep herself from laughing at my, in her opinion probably, an excessive reaction given the stimuli i received, but if She was the one to enter a cage, because no matter how pretty the grass and clean the air is this room Is still a cage, without even having the common sense to know what kind of creature is contained within....

Yeah, last room experience didn't helped, and Dittos are more then a little creepy in my opinion, not necessarily in a bad way but...damn, those image again...anyway

Finally calming down as i see no other pokemon around beside Luka, i take control of the situation once more "What the fuck Luka! You nearly gave me an hearth attack!

Seeing her using the same paw that touched my shoulder now used in a doomed attempt to cover her mirth, i add with a little spite "And change your name for Cresselia sake, it's so cliché it hurts"

It's my turn to grin as all her mirth seems to disappear so quickly that the air all around me seems to freeze. Then after looking at me with enough intensity to drill an hole in solid steel, she simply sbuff with an irritated tone

"Like you can give better names, look at my sisters, what the heck does even mean Pyrie or Sylvia? Hm?"

Now i know she is mocking me, and for her information those names has a meaning, actually why she mentioned Sylvia? Isn't it a more then decent human.., right, human name

I shrug "I haven't chosen Pyrie name and Sylvia was named by her parents, beside while i can understand Pyrie name can be confusing, what Sylvia has wrong as a name? It's because it's a human name?"

Luka attempt to reply is thwarted by a loud grinding sound, so improvise and irking that i am tempted to use my hand to shield my poor ears when the noise vanish as quickly as it came, then a rather large door i haven't even noticed, being the same identical color of the wall, split open on the far side of the room, revealing a well lit corridor completely covered in reinforced tubes of various sizes at the sides and walls/floor with what seems to be cold steel

Without even realizing it i say "A service tunnel, but why-"

A loud, dull sound reverberate around us, it take a few seconds before i both realize and accept that what i am hearing, are merely steps

The electronically distorted voice of Chris coming from the speaker reassure us "Don't worry, we have allowed the mother to visit his child in the hope to improve his mood and hopefully, cure him. It's one of the attempt we spoke earlier, unfortunately, didn't helped much"

While Luka attention remain fixed on the tunnel, i turn towards the viewing window were i can see a perfectly calm Chris with his finger still on the intercom, the reverberating sound become louder "This subject mother is a.." He look at a tag somewhere i cannot see from here "Tenea, female Tyrantrum"

Tyran what?

I place my hand in a pocket and retrieve gear, quickly i call the search function and digit Tyrantrum and confirm, i find myself distancing from the gear in reflex as the pokemon image appear

There isn't much to say about the photo, it look like a big lizard with massive jaw for it's size and frontal 'arms' so small they appear to be merely ornamental, the description say that this creature, is usually very territorial but for some reason, not directly confrontational with humans, apparently this particular species find an human a quite curious little thing, something that inspire apprehension but not to the point of fear

All these details point out that the Tyrantrum is a far smarter species then it look, despite having a very limited brain power in comparison to others poke. In short is mostly brawl and limited brain instead of all brawl and no brain as it appearance would suggest. I skip the diet and recommended food info and try to look at this creature attitude and generic behavior, finding out that there isn't much about this pokemon habits, mostly scientific information on how this creature was reintroduced in modern times after it's extinction a not yet determined period ago, and how it readapted badly with modern pokemon without human supervision, till now at least

A few mumbo jumbo about future project and blah blah blah, nothing else. I just scroll up again to the photo, in search of something more useful about the poke i am about to meet, when my eyes fall on the type classification, apparently the experts classified this pokemon as Rock/Dragon

Dragon..

A loud sound and a small suction feeling on my back forcefully take away my attention from my gear and towards the source of the distraction, of course given my luck, could have been anything else that the pokemon in question looking at me with curious eyes? Yes? Yes it could have been, a lusty monster wanting nothing more then me ravaging her, or it was the opposite?

Nonetheless the creature before me is all but lusty, she actually seems curious more then angry, a little on edge maybe, but not aggressive or anything

I am even not sure why, but i find myself raising my hand on her snout, an action she follow closely with her big curious eyes but allow without fuss.Tthe first this i feel when my hand reach her scales is how pleasantly warm they felt, curiously very uniformed and smooth, not jagged or rough as i expected

She close her eyes briefly as i caress her snout and she gently push her muzzle towards me as encouraging my touch, i feel a sort of connection with her, a pure lust-free feeling much different that with other dragon type i have yet met, something more akin to a hole, to an empty shell that desire nothing more then affection and respect

The Tyrantrum open her eyes again and awkwardly walk back, then she simply turn away from me and walk somewhere else in the room, of course given her size, it's pretty easy to track her form approaching a small obviously fake shrub. She growl playfully at the object, and when no response come from the inanimate thingy, she carefully put her muzzle inside an forcefully push whatever creature was hiding it it, out

A not particularly small yellow creature roll out the shrub, and with my gear already in hand i simply point toward the poke and press the identify button

A small window open over the Tyrantrum bio, telling me that this pokemon name is Heliolisk, an electric type pokemon that result far stronger then it seems, apparently it can generate a constant flux of electricity sufficient to power a not so small laboratory by itself, or multiple habitations without problem, apparently someone really did try and the notes mention how doing so is severely detrimental to the pokemon health

Did some trainer really require a note to remind them that pokemon are Not portable electrical generator? Yes, apparently so

Other info claim that this pokemon has a very precise control of his powers, permitting it to empower itself significantly for a short time, and move so fast it can even rival the Extreme Speed move that seems unable to learn, although only for a small amount of time

Remarkable if a trainer wish for a sweeper member in it's team, but definitely not my first choice

A small warning window appear on my gear now that i kept pointing it at the Heliolisk without even realizing it, the smaller window say that the Aura energy of the pokemon is desynchronized. Not sure what it means, but it can be a good argument to start the conversation with my newest tour guide

I close my gear and leave the mother to nuzzle her child in peace, the door open automatically as i approach it, no doubt Chris unlocked it for me, but before reentering the corridor i turn toward a distracted, smiling Luka as she silently observe the mother-son bonding expirience

With a tone that leave no doubt about my irritation i ask "Well?"

Luka finally focus on me "Well what?"

I resist the urge to facepalm "Why didn't you warned me she was practically on my back?!" I immediately place my hand on my mouth and look at the Tyrantrum, hoping to not have bothered her or her child, seeing that i haven't i continue "Why you didn't warned me?!"

She simply grin like a fool "There was not need Jaden, just like i don't need to use my aura to speak with you anymore, i know when something that wish you harm come close, and she was merely curious, and had no intention of causing you or me any harm. Because you did notice i was not using 'aura speaking' anymore, did you Master?"

I remain still for a few moments, then rapidly recover "O-of course, how can i not notice that? Come on, we have still much to see"

She quickly reach me and grab my arm possessively "At once Master"
1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.title: Becouse even dragon need more then humping

1413222221121111212111111121121222111111.content:
"Hey Chris, I'd like to head over to the lab now" "Yeah sure, just follow the hallway and take a left after three rooms it's at the end of that hall" "thanks" the door ground shut after you as you followed Chris' instructions. Luka clung tightly to your arm like a lover would, resting her head on your shoulder.

The door you found at the location he had indicated was not unlike the other doors you had encountered save for the fact that it had yellow and black stripes set at an angle to the ground along the bottom. You rapped softly on the door and it slid open, this time without the terrible grating sound.

The lab itself was mostly filled with rows of computers and strange machines that you couldn't identify. Chris was sitting at a computer going over some data. "So, what are your first thoughts?" "Master there is a Noivern aproaching our position" "Would you mind trying to get it to leave? We don't have time for me to get raped" With a nod the fighting type stands and goes to confront the dragon type Pokemon.

"Alright get ready to move" you move into a cruch and focus on the glass pane. Sure enough there appears to be a human figure on the other side. They slowly move to the doorway and out of view. The door slides open with a pneumatic hiss, allowing us to see the culprit. A middle aged man wearing a lab coat over all black clothes steps into the room. You tense as he reaches into the interior of his coat. He pulls out a semi spherical device and places it on the ground. It slowly opens like a flower and the man presses a series of buttons on the inside.

"Go" the two Pokemon at your side rush out of the grove and towards the man. In a panic he abandons his device and sprints out the door. You charge after them and out the door. The door slides shut at the press of a button preventing any of the inhabitants from wandering out, and the alarms go off as you slam the large red button on the wall.

Having done that you follow the sounds of running footsteps to see the man simply running back and forth down a hallway, a terrified and bewildered look in his eyes. He doesn't react to your presence as he dashes past. Luka and Liliana are just watching him as he runs.

"You've got him in your illusion" Your Zoroark nods happily "good job, both of you"

You look closer at her side where the gash had been. Fortunately it looks much better, although it isn't fully healed yet. You nod absent mindedly as you examine the wound. Finishing you examination you allow your eyes to wander over her form. While watching her the random thought "she's pretty cute" pops into your head. The realization of what you just thought shocks you back to reality. "That was, weird" you say as you stand up. "Its probably too much sleep making my head fuzzy." you stretch your arms behind your head and walk to your bedroom. You turn the tv near your bed on at a low volume. From your position you have a clear view of the sleeping Pokemon, or so you thought. In reality the Zoroark was standing at the window whispering to a figure outside. Who is this mysterious figure?
1511112.title: Let her sleep (get another sandwich).

15111121.content: (temporary Pokemon translation) Zoroark leaned out the window and whispered to the shadowy figure. "well? Is it working?" "it's too early to tell we've only been doing this for ten minutes!" the figure stepped slightly forward revealing if to be a Gothitelle. "He probably won't take notice of the alteration for at least a week" Zoroark slumped down on the sill with her arms outside. "But I want him now!" she whined "it can't be helped Z it's a procces it'll take time. Goodnight" "Bye" she stayed at the window as Gothitelle walked back into the forest, soon fading from view. Zoroark turned and curled back up on the couch, and dropped her illusion. Looking at you through the door she fell asleep dreaming of fulfilling her desires.
15111121.title: A Pokemon

15131.content: You kept looking out the window to see the trainer slowly pickup his tepig and quickly run out of there you can't see the other Pokemon so you slowly open the door and peek out but, all you saw was black. Just then the door burst open to show a Hydreigon standing... well floating on top of the porch. You quickly fell back on the floor. You looked and saw that it was...
15131.title: Hydreigon

151312.content:
You looked and it was female the hydreigon slowly looked around, then looked at you. You had already gotten up but didn't move at all out of fear for the beast floating right in front of you. "Hydrei Hy..." The hydreigon said stretching out one of it's hand less arms out to you. You looked and saw a long burn mark running across her arm "Dang..." Was all you could say you moved closer only to get your neck clamped by the other. "AARRRGH" 'I guess she doesn't want me near her...' You thought panicking but one of the only things that ran through your was 'What would the neighbors think' Your dying but your wondering what the neighbors would say after this day is over a brief imagination came up in your mind. ' "I knew that Ethen was no good got killed by them Hydreigons I heard." "I heard his head got chopped clean off!" ' But your imagination didn't last long realizing your situation you quickly say "I-I'm not gonna hurt you trust me..." That's when you notice your up in the air it took a few seconds but the hydreigon finally let you go you went to go get that full heal, and max potion from your room. You then come back and move in to help...


But is she cooperative?
151312.title: Female

1513121.content: You slowly approach the dragon type with your hands in the air. Hydriegon growls as you near her glaring at the bottles in your grip. Trying to dissuade any fear she might have you extend your arms and show her the medicine. She extends her head forward and sniffs them for a moment, before deciding they weren't a threat. You reach for her arm and tell her that this will sting. She nods her head in understanding and grips a tree branch in her jaws. When you see she's ready you spray her burn with first the full heal relieving the burn and then with the super potion to repair the damage. "There you go, good as new!" Hydriegon inspects the arm that had been injured before cooing happily and nuzzling you affectionately. "Driegon! Hy! Hydriegon!" " Woah your welcome!" you try to pry her off you, but to no avail. Her grip was like iron. "Now that your healed you should probably get home" you grunt. She responds by clutching you tighter and shaking her head. "You don't wanna go?" she shook her head "You want to stay with me?" she nodded vigorously. "Well umm" you looked away for a moment and when you et her gaze again she have you puppy dog eyes until you groaned "Alright you you can stay" " Hydriegon!" she cried hugging you very hard slightly depriving you of oxygen. Placing you on the ground she licked you on the cheek causing you to blush slightly. "O-okay um. This is my house." you gesture over to the small building. "It's not much but it's home" Hydriegon picks you up and carries you over to the porch bridal style. "You don't need to carry me" her only response is to nuzzle your cheek and coo softly. To your surprise she opens the door with no problems despite not having thumbs. Walking into your living room, she places you on the couch and curls up around you. "Hey, Hydriegon are you hungry?" she nods her head excitedly. "Well then lets get you some food" you extract yourself from her grip and open your pantry, revealing all the food stored there. You grab some ingredients and quickly have a meal prepared for the dragon Pokemon. "Here you go, I made it specially for you" after a small taste she dove into the food devouring it in mere minutes. "Wow you were really hungry." you grab the dishes and place them in the sink to be washed later. "What would you like to do now?" She wants to...
1513121.title: Yes

choices: Go to bed alone ( hydreigon sleeps in the living room.
15131211.content:
You decide it's time to go to bed, but hydreigon was nudging up against your shoulder for some reason.

" what's wrong ?" You ask

" drei hydreigon" she said before she nips at your face, unintentionally hurting you in the process.

"Ow!" You exclaim. But you did't scold her because you've studied dragon pokemon, and you knew that this was a hydreigon's way to say it wants something.

"Hydreigon..." She purred, pulling you in closer for a hug.

You then decide to...
15131211.title: Cuddle

choices: The next morning.. Continue with my story
151312112.content:
You slowly push hydreigon away from you and say

" all right hydreigon, I'm off to bed." You say, yawning.

When you get to your room, you look back to see hydreigon looking into your room from the doorway.

You ask her " oh, do you want to sleep with me tonight?"

She nods happily and lies down next to you her head.. Uh ... Heads on your shoulder' and your stomach.

Right before you fall asleep, you look over and see hydreigon is snoring quietly.

You then fall asleep, wondering what will happen the next day.
151312112.title: Go to bed with hydreigon.

choices: Introduce you to my party! All dragon pokemon ( my story and my actual party)
1513121121.content:
You wake up, knowing it's a Saturday. According to your schedule, today is training day. You get up, get dressed and grab your bag and poke balls.

You then turn around and wake hydreigon.

" drei..." She said drowsily, turning over.

" hydreigon, do you want to join my party?" You ask holding up a poke ball?

Suddenly, she is wide awake and nodding.

" ok" you say throwing the poke ball.

There is no resistance from inside.the light turns off immediately.

All right hydreigon, let's...
1513121121.title: The next morning...

1513121122.content: As i said, readers choice
1513121122.title: Split path to Reader's choice.

153.content: New region, New Pokemon, This should be interesting.
153.title: Welcome To Kalos

1532.content: Now... Where do we start?
1532.title: Fennekin Line

1533.content: How about some ninja frog love?
1533.title: Froakie And Beyond

15331.content: Fully evolved or a pre-evolution?
15331.title: Froakie Line

154.content: You had woken up shrunk in the Alola region, so you had to find a way to get back to your normal size. Unfortunately, only one Pokémon could help you. That was Lunala. You've read about her before. She was known as 'the beast that calls the moon'. Just when you got to the Altar of the Moone, you heard a familiar voice say, "Oh hi there. Why are you so small?"
154.title: Alola

1541.content: "Lunala, I honestly don't know what happened. One minute I was walking to the Altar of the Moone, and then for some reason... I was shrunk down when I reached the top." you said. "I understand, but at your current size, it's not safe out here. I can't let you out of my sight, so I will give you two options. You can either stay in my mouth, or go into my belly. What do you think would be best for you?" You knew that you didn't have a 3rd choice, so what next?
1541.title: Lunala

15412.content: You decided to let Lunala eat you, as you thought that this would be the best way for her to protect you. While you were in her belly, Lunala took great care of you. After all, she turned out to be very friendly. You knew that now you can trust Lunala, since she would never hurt you in any way.
15412.title: Go into her belly

info.brief_description: A pokemon falls in love with you! Which one? You decide!
info.description:
This is my first submission here so (crosses fingers).
This story revolves around you. You are a human in the pokemon world. you live in one of the six regions(Kanto Jhoto Hoenn Sinnoh Unova Kalos). You can be male or female, as can your "mate" but you must remain human! You can have as much blood and gore as you like( if you must you may kill the main). Sexual content is encouraged, just don't be stupid, I've had people add x-men chapters to this interactive. Try to use actual words. Other than that have fun with it. =) I do not own pokemon, pokemon is owned by gamefreak or whatever.
